baseFeats.name: Aberration Kinship
baseFeats.benefits: Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate.

baseFeats.name: Acrobatic Performer
baseFeats.benefits: Use Acrobatics to Perform.

baseFeats.name: Acute Vision
baseFeats.benefits: Your sense improve when you are raging.

baseFeats.name: Adapted Cantrip
baseFeats.benefits: Through study of multiple magical traditions, you’ve altered a spell to suit your spellcasting style.

baseFeats.name: Additional Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Become trained in another Lore subcategory.

baseFeats.name: Adhyabhau
baseFeats.benefits: You descend from the rare psychic vampires known as vetalaranas.

baseFeats.name: Adopted Ancestry
baseFeats.benefits: Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry.

baseFeats.name: Adrenaline Rush
baseFeats.benefits: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

baseFeats.name: Adroit Manipulation
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve fiddled with knots, locks, and blacksmith’s puzzles since you were a child to give your hands something to do.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Weaponry
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon's attack evolves.

baseFeats.name: Ageless Spirit
baseFeats.benefits: You remember more about your previous incarnations than most leshys.

baseFeats.name: Alchemical Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Craft alchemical items.

baseFeats.name: Alchemical Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood.

baseFeats.name: Alchemical Savant
baseFeats.benefits: You can identify alchemical items quickly.

baseFeats.name: Alchemical Scholar
baseFeats.benefits: You learn formulas more easily.

baseFeats.name: Alghollthu Bound
baseFeats.benefits: Although you may not even be aware, the alghollthus your ancestors once served maintain a stranglehold on the deepest, tethered parts of your mind.

baseFeats.name: Anadi Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to provide for your community, be it through hard-earned sustenance or useful crafts.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Blood Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Insight
baseFeats.benefits: You have extensive knowledge of your ancestors' ancient origins.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Linguistics
baseFeats.benefits: Over your extensive lifespan, you've studied many languages.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Longevity
baseFeats.benefits: You have accumulated a vast array of lived knowledge over the years.

baseFeats.name: Android Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You have a keen interest in the origins of your people.

baseFeats.name: Angelkin
baseFeats.benefits: You descend from an angel—a winged messenger from Nirvana or one of the other celestial realms—which gives you a knack for cultures and languages.

baseFeats.name: Animal Accomplice
baseFeats.benefits: You build a rapport with an animal, which becomes magically bonded to you.

baseFeats.name: Animal Companion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you.

baseFeats.name: Animal Senses
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: darkvision, low-light vision, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Fists
baseFeats.benefits: Your physical training encompasses unarmed combat forms.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Sense
baseFeats.benefits: Cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate spell.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Tattoos
baseFeats.benefits: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic.

baseFeats.name: Armor Assist
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Athletics or Warfare Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Don armor more quickly.

baseFeats.name: Armor Proficiency
baseFeats.benefits: Become trained in a type of armor.

baseFeats.name: Assurance
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in at least one skill
baseFeats.benefits: Receive a fixed result on a skill check.

baseFeats.name: Avenge in Glory
baseFeats.benefits: You honor your ally’s life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

baseFeats.name: Axiomatic Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You possess a strong understanding of process among mortals and lawful outsiders alike.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned the history and origins of your people and how to connect to both your land and sea heritage.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater.

baseFeats.name: Bardic Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Your studies make you informed on every subject.

baseFeats.name: Bargain Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: Earn Income by searching for deals.

baseFeats.name: Battle Medicine
baseFeats.benefits: Heal yourself or an ally in battle.

baseFeats.name: Beast Trainer
baseFeats.benefits: You have an impressive innate ability to tame and command ferocious beasts.

baseFeats.name: Beastbrood
baseFeats.benefits: One of your ancestors was a rakshasa, the corrupt and aristocratic reincarnated souls that call Golarion home.

baseFeats.name: Blessed Blood
baseFeats.prereqs: bloodline that grants divine spells; you follow a deity
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

baseFeats.name: Bon Mot
baseFeats.benefits: Distract a foe with a witty quip.

baseFeats.name: Bone Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones.

baseFeats.name: Bouncy Goblin
baseFeats.benefits: You have a particular elasticity that makes it easy for you to bounce and squish.

baseFeats.name: Breath Control
baseFeats.benefits: Hold your breath longer and gain benefits against inhaled threats.

baseFeats.name: Brightsoul
baseFeats.benefits: The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light.

baseFeats.name: Brine May
baseFeats.benefits: Your mother was a sea hag, granting you one sea-green or blue eye.

baseFeats.name: Brinesoul
baseFeats.benefits: Your elemental ancestor's legacy asserts itself as brackish water, like the seawater of the ocean.

baseFeats.name: Buckler Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection.

baseFeats.name: Burn It!
baseFeats.benefits: Fire fascinates you.

baseFeats.name: Burrow Elocutionist
baseFeats.benefits: You recognize the chittering of ground creatures as its own peculiar language.

baseFeats.name: Cackle
baseFeats.benefits: You can extend one of your spells with a quick burst of laughter.

baseFeats.name: Callow May
baseFeats.benefits: You are among the most common of changelings—those born to green hags—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage.

baseFeats.name: Canny Acumen
baseFeats.benefits: Become an expert in a saving throw or Perception.

baseFeats.name: Cantorian Reinforcement
baseFeats.benefits: The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies.

baseFeats.name: Cat Fall
baseFeats.benefits: Treat falls as shorter than they are.

baseFeats.name: Cat Nap
baseFeats.benefits: You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly.

baseFeats.name: Catch the Details
baseFeats.benefits: You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Dance
baseFeats.benefits: You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Growing up among catfolk has taught you the traditional values of freedom to travel, stewardship of the land, and quick reactions when your curiosity lands you in trouble.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You favor weapons that you can use with quick, darting slashes like a cat's claws.

baseFeats.name: Cat's Luck
baseFeats.benefits: You instinctively twist away from danger.

baseFeats.name: Cauldron
baseFeats.benefits: You can use the Craft activity to create oils and potions.

baseFeats.name: Cel Rau
baseFeats.benefits: You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You can see through darkness.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You were raised with an aasimar or celestial relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the celestial realms.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Protection
baseFeats.benefits: You manipulate your exoskeleton to overlap itself.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of the Evened Hand
baseFeats.benefits: You have cultivated your exoskeleton's form for close combat, using knots, whorls, and reinforced branches.

baseFeats.name: Chance Death
baseFeats.benefits: Your previous life ended due to sheer poor luck, struck by lightning or choking on a fish bone.

baseFeats.name: Changeling Lore
baseFeats.benefits: All too aware of your true nature, you’ve studied hags and their powers.

baseFeats.name: Charlatan
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to mimic the abilities of spellcasters by studying their flourishes and words

baseFeats.name: Charming Liar
baseFeats.benefits: Improve a target's attitude with your lies.

baseFeats.name: Cheek Pouches
baseFeats.benefits: Your cheeks are stretchy, and you can store up to four items of light Bulk or less in these cheek pouches.

baseFeats.name: Cindersoul
baseFeats.benefits: The fire of your elemental ancestor manifests like dying embers of a blaze, and your inner charcoal helps staunch bleeding, purify simple poisons, and absorb acid.

baseFeats.name: City Scavenger
baseFeats.benefits: You know that the greatest treasures often look like refuse, and you scoff at those who throw away perfectly good scraps.

baseFeats.name: Clan's Edge
baseFeats.benefits: By moving your clan dagger with rapid precision, you can protect yourself more effectively.

baseFeats.name: Cleansing Subroutine
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites help purge your body of harmful chemicals and toxins.

baseFeats.name: Combat Assessment
baseFeats.benefits: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

baseFeats.name: Combat Climber
baseFeats.benefits: Fight more effectively as you Climb.

baseFeats.name: Concealing Legerdemain
baseFeats.benefits: Conceal an Object using Thievery instead of Stealth.

baseFeats.name: Conrasu Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned about your history and your people from shapers.

baseFeats.name: Conrasu Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector.

baseFeats.name: Consult the Stars
baseFeats.benefits: You find wisdom in the movements of the heavens.

baseFeats.name: Cooperative Nature
baseFeats.benefits: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness.

baseFeats.name: Corgi Mount
baseFeats.benefits: The smallest of fey have ridden corgis as mounts since time immemorial, leading to a pattern on corgis' backs called a “faerie saddle.

baseFeats.name: Counterspell
baseFeats.benefits: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it.

baseFeats.name: Courteous Comeback
baseFeats.benefits: You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit.

baseFeats.name: Courtly Graces
baseFeats.benefits: Use Society to get along in noble society.

baseFeats.name: Crafter's Appraisal
baseFeats.benefits: Use Crafting to identify magic items.

baseFeats.name: Crane Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.

baseFeats.name: Creative Prodigy
baseFeats.benefits: You have a powerful creative drive, useful for prevarication and performance.

baseFeats.name: Cringe
baseFeats.benefits: With pitiful posturing, you cause your foe to pull back a deadly attack.

baseFeats.name: Critter Shape
baseFeats.benefits: Once per hour, you can use Change Shape to enter a critter shape.

baseFeats.name: Crossbow Ace
baseFeats.benefits: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow.

baseFeats.name: Crunch
baseFeats.benefits: Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor.

baseFeats.name: Cynical
baseFeats.benefits: You've been approached with suspicion and distrust throughout your life and return these sentiments back to the strangers you encounter.

baseFeats.name: Dangerous Sorcery
baseFeats.benefits: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

baseFeats.name: Deadly Simplicity
baseFeats.prereqs: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity’s weapon is especially powerful in your hands.

baseFeats.name: Deceptive Worship
baseFeats.benefits: Pass yourself off as a member of a religion.

baseFeats.name: Deepvision
baseFeats.benefits: Your vision is suited for night or the underground.

baseFeats.name: Deity's Domain
baseFeats.benefits: You embody an aspect of your deity.

baseFeats.name: Deliberate Death
baseFeats.benefits: Once, you died because someone—murderer or monster, soldier or executioner— chose to strike you down.

baseFeats.name: Demonbane Warrior
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against demons.

baseFeats.name: Desperate Prayer
baseFeats.benefits: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

baseFeats.name: Devil's Advocate
baseFeats.benefits: You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe.

baseFeats.name: Diehard
baseFeats.benefits: Die at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

baseFeats.name: Different Worlds
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to select ancestry feats from multiple ancestries
baseFeats.benefits: Create a second identity for yourself with a different name, history, and background.

baseFeats.name: Dig Quickly
baseFeats.benefits: Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole.

baseFeats.name: Disarming Flair
baseFeats.benefits: It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to remain hidden by using larger folk as a distraction to avoid drawing attention to yourself.

baseFeats.name: Domain Initiate
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

baseFeats.name: Double Slice
baseFeats.benefits: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

baseFeats.name: Draconic Arrogance
baseFeats.benefits: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

baseFeats.name: Draconic Sycophant
baseFeats.benefits: You have an affect that dragonkind find unusually pleasing—and when that fails, you know when to duck.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Spit
baseFeats.benefits: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true—you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.

baseFeats.name: Dragon's Presence
baseFeats.benefits: As a member of dragonkind, you project unflappable confidence

baseFeats.name: Dream May
baseFeats.benefits: You are the child of a night hag, making one of your eyes violet or even black.

baseFeats.name: Dual Studies
baseFeats.benefits: You and your eidolon have some skills you practice on your own.

baseFeats.name: Dualborn
baseFeats.benefits: Your suli heritage can be traced back to two geniekin ancestors of opposing elements, or to an elemental ancestor that embodied two combined elements.

baseFeats.name: Dubious Knowledge
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action
baseFeats.benefits: Learn true and erroneous knowledge on failed check.

baseFeats.name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
baseFeats.benefits: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Duskwalker Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You either found another duskwalker who taught you the secrets of your kind, or you managed to research your unusual heritage.

baseFeats.name: Dustsoul
baseFeats.benefits: Your earth elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as dust and dirt, like the soil of a field or the hot desert sands.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Doughtiness
baseFeats.benefits: You are either naturally calm and collected in the face of imminent danger, or you are very good at faking it.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You eagerly absorbed the old stories and traditions of your ancestors, your gods, and your people.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: Your kin have instilled in you an affinity for hard-hitting weapons, and you prefer these to more elegant arms.

baseFeats.name: Earned Glory
baseFeats.benefits: Elves are often skeptical of their half-elven kin, and you are experienced at telling stories of your accomplishments to gain their respect.

baseFeats.name: Eidetic Ear
baseFeats.benefits: You have an amazing memory for sound.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Embellish
baseFeats.benefits: You can summon a harmless but impressive elemental display.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You can see in the darkness as easily as an elemental.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the Inner Sphere.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Trade
baseFeats.benefits: You have a strong connection with stone and metal.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

baseFeats.name: Elf Atavism
baseFeats.benefits: Your elven blood runs particularly strong, granting you features far more elven than those of a typical half-elf.

baseFeats.name: Elven Aloofness
baseFeats.benefits: As much as you might care for them, you've come to terms with the ephemeral nature of non-elves, and it makes their threats feel less troublesome.

baseFeats.name: Elven Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve studied in traditional elven arts, learning about arcane magic and the world around you.

baseFeats.name: Elven Verve
baseFeats.benefits: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds.

baseFeats.name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You favor bows and other elegant weapons.

baseFeats.name: Emberkin
baseFeats.benefits: A peri's roaring spirit burns in your soul.

baseFeats.name: Ember's Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: Your eyes blaze with inner flame.

baseFeats.name: Emotionless
baseFeats.benefits: Your malfunctioning emotional processors make it difficult for you to feel strong emotions.

baseFeats.name: Empathetic Plea
baseFeats.benefits: The way you cringe or use those puppydog eyes you've been practicing elicits an empathetic response in the attacker.

baseFeats.name: Energy Heart
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon's heart beats with energy.

baseFeats.name: Eschew Materials
baseFeats.benefits: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

baseFeats.name: Esteemed Visitor
baseFeats.benefits: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust.

baseFeats.name: Evanescent Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You've manifested wings that can flutter for brief spurts.

baseFeats.name: Everstand Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

baseFeats.name: Exacting Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You make a controlled attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

baseFeats.name: Expanded Senses
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon evolves more acute senses.

baseFeats.name: Experienced Professional
baseFeats.benefits: Prevent critical failures when Earning Income.

baseFeats.name: Experienced Smuggler
baseFeats.benefits: Conceal items from observers more effectively.

baseFeats.name: Experienced Tracker
baseFeats.benefits: Track at your full Speed at a –5 penalty.

baseFeats.name: Express Rider
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your mount’s travel speed.

baseFeats.name: Extend Boost
baseFeats.benefits: You can increase the duration of your eidolon's boosts.

baseFeats.name: Extra Squishy
baseFeats.benefits: Your rubbery physique makes it easier for you to wedge yourself into tight spaces and more difficult for your enemies to dislodge you.

baseFeats.name: Eye for Numbers
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to Decipher Writing about math and count items quickly.

baseFeats.name: Eye for Treasure
baseFeats.benefits: You know good artisanship when you see it and can wax poetic about crafting techniques and forms.

baseFeats.name: Eyes of the Night
baseFeats.benefits: You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire.

baseFeats.name: False Faith
baseFeats.benefits: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

baseFeats.name: Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Fang Sharpener
baseFeats.prereqs: Irongut Goblin heritage or Razortooth Goblin heritage
baseFeats.benefits: You have filed your teeth into jagged points and have an unusually powerful jaw, making your mouth a dangerous weapon.

baseFeats.name: Fangs
baseFeats.benefits: Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood.

baseFeats.name: Far Lobber
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance.

baseFeats.name: Fascinating Performance
baseFeats.benefits: Perform to fascinate observers.

baseFeats.name: Fast Recovery
baseFeats.benefits: Regain more HP from rest, recover faster from disease and poisons.

baseFeats.name: Feather Step
baseFeats.benefits: Step into difficult terrain.

baseFeats.name: Fetchling Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned obscure lessons about your fellow fetchlings.

baseFeats.name: Fey Cantrips
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial.

baseFeats.name: Fey Fellowship
baseFeats.benefits: Your enhanced fey connection affords you a warmer reception from creatures of the First World.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You can see in the darkness as easily as a fiend.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You were raised by a tiefling or a fiendish relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the fiendish realms.

baseFeats.name: Fire Lung
baseFeats.benefits: A lifetime of proximity to flames has inured your lungs and eyes to smoke.

baseFeats.name: First World Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the First World grants you a primal innate spell, much like those of the fey.

baseFeats.name: Fleet
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your Speed by 5 feet.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Studies
baseFeats.benefits: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks.

baseFeats.name: Flying Blade
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

baseFeats.name: Focused Fascination
baseFeats.benefits: When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to fascinate your target.

baseFeats.name: Folksy Patter
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at disguising coded messages as folksy idioms.

baseFeats.name: Forager
baseFeats.benefits: Forage for supplies to provide for multiple creatures.

baseFeats.name: Forensic Acumen
baseFeats.benefits: Rapidly examine a body and Recall Knowledge about it.

baseFeats.name: Forge-Day's Rest
baseFeats.benefits: Your unusual rest cycle allows you to recover faster.

baseFeats.name: Forlorn
baseFeats.benefits: Watching your friends age and die fills you with moroseness that protects you against harmful emotions.

baseFeats.name: Form of the Fiend
baseFeats.benefits: Part of your body has an obvious, fiendish appearance.

baseFeats.name: Foxfire
baseFeats.benefits: A crack of your tail sparks wisps of blue energy.

baseFeats.name: Fumesoul
baseFeats.benefits: The air inside you asserts itself as a toxic miasma, inuring you to most poisons.

baseFeats.name: Ganzi Gaze
baseFeats.benefits: You have unusual sensory abilities passed down from your chaotic forebears.

baseFeats.name: Gemsoul
baseFeats.benefits: The earth inside you asserts itself as crystallized gemstones or metals, like a cluster of quartz or veins of iron and gold.

baseFeats.name: General Training
baseFeats.benefits: Your adaptability manifests in your mastery of a range of useful abilities.

baseFeats.name: Genie Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors.

baseFeats.name: Ghost Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the Boneyard ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings.

baseFeats.name: Glean Contents
baseFeats.benefits: Decipher Writing even when you can’t see the document well.

baseFeats.name: Glean Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into the collected lore of the divine, accessing a variety of potentially useful information.

baseFeats.name: Glider Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon evolves wings, a buoyant body, or some other means to control descent.

baseFeats.name: Gloomseer
baseFeats.benefits: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light.

baseFeats.name: Gnoll Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You paid attention to your senior hunters to learn their tricks.

baseFeats.name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You were taught to be a hunter and a raider.

baseFeats.name: Gnome Obsession
baseFeats.benefits: You might have a flighty nature, but when a topic captures your attention, you dive into it headfirst.

baseFeats.name: Gnome Polyglot
baseFeats.benefits: Your extensive travels, curiosity, and love of learning help you to learn languages quickly.

baseFeats.name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You favor unusual weapons tied to your people, such as blades with curved and peculiar shapes.

baseFeats.name: Goading Feint
baseFeats.benefits: When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve picked up skills and tales from your goblin community.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Scuttle
baseFeats.benefits: You take advantage of your ally’s movement to adjust your position.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Song
baseFeats.benefits: You sing annoying goblin songs, distracting your foes with silly and repetitive lyrics.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp.

baseFeats.name: Goloma Courage
baseFeats.benefits: The most important thing you've learned living with fear is how to overcome it.

baseFeats.name: Goloma Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You lived an insulated life focused on avoiding danger.

baseFeats.name: Gorilla Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance.

baseFeats.name: Grasping Reach
baseFeats.benefits: You can extend a tangle of vines or tendrils to support your arms and extend your reach.

baseFeats.name: Gravesight
baseFeats.benefits: You can see in the darkness as easily as a psychopomp.

baseFeats.name: Gravity Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

baseFeats.name: Grim Insight
baseFeats.benefits: Others’ attempts to scare you often grant you insights about your would-be bullies that you can then exploit.

baseFeats.name: Grimspawn
baseFeats.benefits: Your lineage traces back to a daemon, one of the manifestations of horrific forms of death that devour souls within their foul home of Abaddon.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You are well versed in grippli culture and tactics.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests.

baseFeats.name: Group Coercion
baseFeats.benefits: Coerce multiple targets simultaneously.

baseFeats.name: Group Impression
baseFeats.benefits: Make an Impression on multiple targets at once.

baseFeats.name: Hag Claws
baseFeats.benefits: When you came of age, your fingernails grew long and sharp.

baseFeats.name: Hag's Sight
baseFeats.benefits: You've nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve dutifully learned important skills passed down through generations of halfling tradition.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Luck
baseFeats.benefits: Your happy-go-lucky nature makes it seem like misfortune avoids you.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You favor traditional halfling weapons, so you’ve learned how to use them more effectively.

baseFeats.name: Halo
baseFeats.benefits: You are surrounded by a halo of light and goodness at all times.

baseFeats.name: Hand of the Apprentice
baseFeats.benefits: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.

baseFeats.name: Handy with Your Paws
baseFeats.benefits: You can easily craft objects.

baseFeats.name: Hard Tail
baseFeats.benefits: Your tail is much stronger than most, and you can lash out with it with the strength of a whip.

baseFeats.name: Hard to Fool
baseFeats.benefits: You're accustomed to seeing through shifting darkness and bewildering magic.

baseFeats.name: Harming Hands
baseFeats.benefits: The mordant power of your negative energy grows.

baseFeats.name: Harmlessly Cute
baseFeats.benefits: Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm.

baseFeats.name: Haughty Obstinacy
baseFeats.benefits: Your powerful ego makes it harder for others to order you around.

baseFeats.name: Heal Companion
baseFeats.benefits: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds.

baseFeats.name: Healing Hands
baseFeats.benefits: Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative.

baseFeats.name: Hefty Hauler
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your Bulk limits by 2.

baseFeats.name: Hellspawn
baseFeats.benefits: Your lineage descends from devils, the conniving schemers of Hell's malevolent hierarchy.

baseFeats.name: Hobgoblin Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent.

baseFeats.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You are trained with composite longbows, composite shortbows, glaives, longbows, longswords, and shortbows.

baseFeats.name: Hobnobber
baseFeats.benefits: Gather Information rapidly.

baseFeats.name: Holy Castigation
baseFeats.benefits: You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk.

baseFeats.name: Hunted Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You take two quick shots against the one you hunt.

baseFeats.name: Hunter's Defense
baseFeats.benefits: Your canny understanding of natural and primal creatures helps you predict and dodge their attacks.

baseFeats.name: Hydraulic Deflection
baseFeats.benefits: Drawing moisture from the atmosphere, you create a disc of hovering water that deflects attacks.

baseFeats.name: Hyena Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Hyenas serve gnolls as pets, trackers, and in your case, vessels for spirits.

baseFeats.name: Hymn of Healing
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the hymn of healing composition spell (page 228), which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.

baseFeats.name: Idyllkin
baseFeats.benefits: Your wild, unique features betray your agathion birthright.

baseFeats.name: Illusion Sense
baseFeats.benefits: Your ancestors spent their days cloaked and cradled in illusions, and as a result, sensing illusion magic is second nature to you.

baseFeats.name: Impressive Performance
baseFeats.benefits: Make an Impression with Performance.

baseFeats.name: Improvisational Defender
baseFeats.benefits: You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times.

baseFeats.name: Improvise Tool
baseFeats.benefits: Craft basic tools without a basic crafter’s book.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Initiative
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to initiative rolls.

baseFeats.name: Inner Fire
baseFeats.benefits: You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand.

baseFeats.name: Innocuous
baseFeats.benefits: Halflings have been unobtrusive assistants of larger folk for untold ages, and your people count on this assumption of innocence.

baseFeats.name: Inoculation
baseFeats.benefits: Grant patients +2 to saves against getting a disease again.

baseFeats.name: Internal Cohesion
baseFeats.benefits: Axis's order suffuses your body and helps it maintain coherency.

baseFeats.name: Internal Compartment
baseFeats.benefits: You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms.

baseFeats.name: Intimidating Glare
baseFeats.benefits: Demoralize a creature without speaking.

baseFeats.name: Intuitive Cooperation
baseFeats.benefits: You are accustomed to working alongside others, relying on each other to get by.

baseFeats.name: Intuitive Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan.

baseFeats.name: Inventive Offensive
baseFeats.benefits: You can jury-rig your weapons to perform in unexpected ways.

baseFeats.name: Iron Fists
baseFeats.benefits: Your fists have been forged by battle, your naturally tough skin and dense bone further hardened by conflict.

baseFeats.name: Iron Repercussions
baseFeats.benefits: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

baseFeats.name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)
baseFeats.benefits: Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice.

baseFeats.name: Jungle Strider
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles.

baseFeats.name: Junk Tinker
baseFeats.benefits: You can make useful tools out of even twisted or rusted scraps.

baseFeats.name: Keep Up Appearances
baseFeats.benefits: Taldan pride means you never show weakness.

baseFeats.name: Ki Rush
baseFeats.benefits: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit.

baseFeats.name: Ki Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.

baseFeats.name: Kitsune Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You excel at navigating social situations and keeping secrets.

baseFeats.name: Kitsune Spell Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You've picked up a few magical tricks.

baseFeats.name: Know Oneself
baseFeats.benefits: You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Know Your Own
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent countless hours studying the history of elves on your world and beyond and are a studied expert in your people's ways.

baseFeats.name: Known Weaknesses
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you Devise a Stratagem, you can also attempt a check to Recall Knowledge as part of that action.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Breath
baseFeats.benefits: You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies and mythology from your elders.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained with weapons ideal for subterranean efficiency.

baseFeats.name: Lavasoul
baseFeats.benefits: Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes.

baseFeats.name: Lawbringer
baseFeats.benefits: You trace your lineage to archons: embodiments of heavenly virtues, guardians of the seven-tiered mountain of Heaven, and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals.

baseFeats.name: Leech-Clipper
baseFeats.benefits: You are trained to capture deserters, or “leeches”.

baseFeats.name: Lemma of Vision
baseFeats.benefits: You've solved a tiny stepping stone in your self-discovery, awakening new depths in your sight.

baseFeats.name: Lengthy Diversion
baseFeats.benefits: Remain hidden after you Create a Diversion.

baseFeats.name: Leshy Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a leshy familiar, a tiny plant that embodies one of the many spirits of nature.

baseFeats.name: Leshy Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You deeply understand your people’s cultural traditions and innate strengths.

baseFeats.name: Leshy Superstition
baseFeats.benefits: You notice spirits that inhabit objects, learning which bring good fortune and which are unlucky.

baseFeats.name: Lie to Me
baseFeats.benefits: Use Deception to detect lies.

baseFeats.name: Life-Giving Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The upwelling of innate magic refreshes your body.

baseFeats.name: Lightning Tongue
baseFeats.benefits: Your tongue darts out faster than the eye can see to retrieve loose objects.

baseFeats.name: Lingering Composition
baseFeats.benefits: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

baseFeats.name: Living Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon.

baseFeats.name: Lizardfolk Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community.

baseFeats.name: Magus's Analysis
baseFeats.benefits: You make an assessment informed by your knowledge of how a creature fights.

baseFeats.name: Maiden's Mending
baseFeats.benefits: You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life.

baseFeats.name: Mariner's Fire
baseFeats.benefits: You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface.

baseFeats.name: Marsh Runner
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain.

baseFeats.name: Martial Performance
baseFeats.benefits: Your muse has taught you how to handle a wider variety of weapons than most bards, empowering you to effortlessly blend your performance into combat even with the most inelegant tools.

baseFeats.name: Medical Researcher
baseFeats.benefits: Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well.

baseFeats.name: Meld into Eidolon
baseFeats.benefits: Your physical form can combine with that of your eidolon, granting benefits but limiting your capabilities.

baseFeats.name: Miresoul
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the muddier denizens of the Plane of Earth from its border with the Plane of Water, and your elemental lineage manifests as clay or mud, reflecting that bond.

baseFeats.name: Mistsoul
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist.

baseFeats.name: Moment of Clarity
baseFeats.benefits: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

baseFeats.name: Monastic Archer Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow.

baseFeats.name: Monastic Weaponry
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school.

baseFeats.name: Monster Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You swiftly assess your prey and apply what you know.

baseFeats.name: Monstrous Peacemaker
baseFeats.benefits: Your dual human and orc nature has given you a unique perspective.

baseFeats.name: Moon May
baseFeats.benefits: Your mother was a moon hag, a handmaiden of Groetus, and you have a single scarlet eye and a sliver of her supernal foresight.

baseFeats.name: Mountain Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.

baseFeats.name: Multilingual
baseFeats.benefits: Learn two new languages.

baseFeats.name: Musetouched
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood sings with the liberating power of the azatas, living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of Elysium.

baseFeats.name: Nanite Surge
baseFeats.benefits: You stimulate your nanites, forcing your body to temporarily increase its efficiency.

baseFeats.name: Natural Ambition
baseFeats.benefits: You were raised to be ambitious and always reach for the stars, leading you to progress quickly in your chosen field.

baseFeats.name: Natural Medicine
baseFeats.benefits: Use Nature to Treat Wounds.

baseFeats.name: Natural Performer
baseFeats.benefits: Entertainment comes naturally to you.

baseFeats.name: Natural Skill
baseFeats.benefits: Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills.

baseFeats.name: Nestling Fall
baseFeats.benefits: You trust the strength of your wings and can spread them to glide safely to the ground.

baseFeats.name: Nightvision Adaptation
baseFeats.benefits: The nanites in your ocular processors have adapted to darkness, enhancing your ability to see in the dark.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Dodge
baseFeats.benefits: You deftly dodge out of the way.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Elf
baseFeats.benefits: Your muscles are tightly honed.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Hooves
baseFeats.benefits: Your legs end in hooves rather than feet, with joints and tendons that allow you to move with great haste.

baseFeats.name: No Cause for Alarm
baseFeats.benefits: Reduce creatures’ frightened condition values.

baseFeats.name: Nocturnal Charm
baseFeats.benefits: The supernatural charm of your vampiric progenitor hangs about you, and you've learned to use it on mortals.

baseFeats.name: Nocturnal Grippli
baseFeats.benefits: You tend to do most of your hunting and work at night and have adapted to the requirements of nocturnal life.

baseFeats.name: Nosoi's Mask
baseFeats.benefits: Many psychopomps wear masks when dealing with the living, and many cultures believe that seeing an unmasked psychopomp's face invites death.

baseFeats.name: Oddity Identification
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to Occultism checks to Identify Magic with certain traits.

baseFeats.name: Old Soul
baseFeats.benefits: Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way.

baseFeats.name: One for All
baseFeats.benefits: With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

baseFeats.name: Ongoing Selfishness
baseFeats.benefits: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

baseFeats.name: Orc Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries.

baseFeats.name: Orc Lore
baseFeats.benefits: The hold elders taught you your people's histories, told tales of great athletic feats, and shared with you the hardships your ancestors endured so that you can pass this wisdom down to future generations.

baseFeats.name: Orc Sight
baseFeats.benefits: Your orc blood is strong enough to grant you the keen vision of your orc forebears.

baseFeats.name: Orc Superstition
baseFeats.benefits: You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions.

baseFeats.name: Orc Warmask
baseFeats.benefits: You paint your face to create a warmask.

baseFeats.name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors.

baseFeats.name: Otherworldly Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your elven magic manifests as a simple arcane spell, even if you aren’t formally trained in magic.

baseFeats.name: Overextending Feint
baseFeats.benefits: When you trick a foe, instead of catching them off guard, you goad them into overextending their next attack.

baseFeats.name: Overlooked Mastermind
baseFeats.benefits: Many consider half-orcs little more than dumb brutes.

baseFeats.name: Pack Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack.

baseFeats.name: Pack Rat
baseFeats.benefits: Years of packing for travel have taught you how to cram vast quantities into small spaces.

baseFeats.name: Parthenogenic Hatchling
baseFeats.benefits: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother.

baseFeats.name: Pelagic Aptitude
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned special tricks to survive underwater.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Dive
baseFeats.benefits: You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall.

baseFeats.name: Pickpocket
baseFeats.benefits: Steal or Palm an Object more effectively.

baseFeats.name: Pierce the Darkness
baseFeats.benefits: Your eyes have adapted to see in all circumstances, even without the assistance of light.

baseFeats.name: Pilgrim's Token
baseFeats.benefits: A religious token lets you act ﬁrst on a tie for initiative.

baseFeats.name: Pitborn
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood bears the mark of a demon, a living embodiment of sin from the fetid depths of the Abyss.

baseFeats.name: Plant Evidence
baseFeats.benefits: You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing.

baseFeats.name: Plumekith
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors.

baseFeats.name: Point-Blank Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

baseFeats.name: Power Attack
baseFeats.benefits: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

baseFeats.name: Prairie Rider
baseFeats.benefits: You grew up riding your clan's shaggy ponies and riding dogs.

baseFeats.name: Premonition of Avoidance
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur.

baseFeats.name: Proximity Alert
baseFeats.benefits: You're unnaturally in tune with your surroundings and react instinctively to danger.

baseFeats.name: Quah Bond
baseFeats.benefits: You grew up among the Shoanti tribes, with the spirits watching over you, and they offer you guidance.

baseFeats.name: Quick Bomber
baseFeats.benefits: You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking.

baseFeats.name: Quick Coercion
baseFeats.benefits: Coerce a creature quickly.

baseFeats.name: Quick Identification
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Identify Magic in 1 minute or less.

baseFeats.name: Quick Jump
baseFeats.benefits: High Jump or Long Jump as a single action.

baseFeats.name: Quick Repair
baseFeats.benefits: Repair items quickly.

baseFeats.name: Quick Shape
baseFeats.benefits: Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance.

baseFeats.name: Quick Squeeze
baseFeats.benefits: Move swiftly as you Squeeze.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Circuitry
baseFeats.benefits: Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

baseFeats.name: Raging Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

baseFeats.name: Raging Thrower
baseFeats.benefits: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

baseFeats.name: Rain of Embers Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames.

baseFeats.name: Raise a Tome
baseFeats.benefits: You raise up the book you're holding and flip it open to defend yourself and expedite your studies.

baseFeats.name: Ranged Reprisal
baseFeats.benefits: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

baseFeats.name: Rat Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you.

baseFeats.name: Ratfolk Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten.

baseFeats.name: Ratspeak
baseFeats.benefits: To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense.

baseFeats.name: Ravening's Desperation
baseFeats.benefits: Your study of the Beast of Gluttondark has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness.

baseFeats.name: Razor Claws
baseFeats.benefits: Your have honed your claws to be deadly.

baseFeats.name: Razzle-Dazzle
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights.

baseFeats.name: Reach Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You can extend your spells’ range.

baseFeats.name: Reactive Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

baseFeats.name: Read Lips
baseFeats.benefits: Read the lips of people you can see.

baseFeats.name: Reassuring Presence
baseFeats.benefits: You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress.

baseFeats.name: Recognize Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Identify a spell as a reaction as it's being cast.

baseFeats.name: Reflective Ripple Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance of fluid grace as small amounts of water flow with your movements and attacks.

baseFeats.name: Remorseless Lash
baseFeats.benefits: You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking.

baseFeats.name: Reptile Rider
baseFeats.benefits: To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters.

baseFeats.name: Reptile Speaker
baseFeats.benefits: You hear the sounds of reptiles as language.

baseFeats.name: Retractable Claws
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage.

baseFeats.name: Reveal True Name
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in trained in Intimidation and at least one of Arcana, Nature, Occult, and Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt to get a creature to do as you wish by threatening them with your knowledge of their true name.

baseFeats.name: Ride
baseFeats.benefits: Automatically succeed at commanding your mount to move.

baseFeats.name: Riftmarked
baseFeats.benefits: Long ago, qlippoth marked someone in your lineage, most likely through their ancient runestones that dot Golarion's surface.

baseFeats.name: Rimesoul
baseFeats.benefits: The water inside you is cold and frozen, like sheets of ice and frigid glaciers.

baseFeats.name: Risky Surgery
baseFeats.benefits: Deal damage to a patient to gain +2 to Treat Wounds.

baseFeats.name: Rock Runner
baseFeats.benefits: Your innate connection to stone makes you adept at moving across uneven surfaces.

baseFeats.name: Root Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Create a token that grants a bonus against a spell or haunt.

baseFeats.name: Rough Rider
baseFeats.benefits: You are especially good at riding traditional goblin mounts.

baseFeats.name: Round Ears
baseFeats.benefits: Your elven lineage is subtle enough that you look barely different from other humans, and you’ve learned to use that to your advantage.

baseFeats.name: Ru-Shi
baseFeats.benefits: You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia.

baseFeats.name: Saberteeth
baseFeats.benefits: You have long fangs, natural or augmented.

baseFeats.name: Saoc Astrology
baseFeats.benefits: The ancient Saoc Brethren were the masters of astrology, and while your knowledge may be but a pale shadow of their wisdom, it still comes in handy.

baseFeats.name: Scamper
baseFeats.benefits: You instinctively know how to flee danger.

baseFeats.name: Scamper Underfoot
baseFeats.benefits: You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease.

baseFeats.name: Scavenger's Search
baseFeats.benefits: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables.

baseFeats.name: Scholar's Inheritance
baseFeats.benefits: Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy.

baseFeats.name: Schooled in Secrets
baseFeats.benefits: Gather Information about secret societies and mystery cults.

baseFeats.name: Seasoned
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Alcohol Lore, Cooking Lore, or Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: +1 to Craft food and drink, including potions.

baseFeats.name: Secret Speech
baseFeats.benefits: Learn the secret language of a society.

baseFeats.name: Seedpod
baseFeats.benefits: Your body produces a nearly endless supply of hard seedpods.

baseFeats.name: Sensitive Nose
baseFeats.benefits: Your large black nose isn't just for show.

baseFeats.name: Shackleborn
baseFeats.benefits: Your lineage shows the signs of velstrac tampering, including some curious quirk bequeathed by those shadowy surgeons of flesh and souls.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Blending
baseFeats.benefits: You draw shadows close to create a shroud.

baseFeats.name: Shadow of the Wilds
baseFeats.benefits: It’s difficult to notice your passage through wild areas.

baseFeats.name: Shapechanger's Intuition
baseFeats.benefits: A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises.

baseFeats.name: Share Thoughts
baseFeats.prereqs: Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity
baseFeats.benefits: You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers.

baseFeats.name: Sharp Fangs
baseFeats.benefits: Your teeth are formidable weapons.

baseFeats.name: Shield Block
baseFeats.benefits: Ward off a blow with your shield.

baseFeats.name: Shisk Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You hoard knowledge like a dragon hoards gold.

baseFeats.name: Shoony Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Growing up in shoony society, you learned the value of honesty, friendship, and hard work, even during trying times.

baseFeats.name: Shore Step
baseFeats.benefits: The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered.

baseFeats.name: Shrouded Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list.

baseFeats.name: Shrouded Mien
baseFeats.benefits: You're used to dealing with dangerous situations and sinister creatures.

baseFeats.name: Sign Language
baseFeats.benefits: Learn sign languages.

baseFeats.name: Sinister Appearance
baseFeats.benefits: You possess horns, a tail, or red eyes, or could otherwise be mistaken for a tiefling.

baseFeats.name: Skill Training
baseFeats.benefits: Become trained in a skill.

baseFeats.name: Skittertalk
baseFeats.benefits: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with spiders and other arachnids.

baseFeats.name: Skull Creeper
baseFeats.benefits: You wear skulls to demoralize foes.

baseFeats.name: Slag May
baseFeats.benefits: Your mother was an annis hag, known for physical prowess, and you have one violet or steel-gray eye.

baseFeats.name: Slink
baseFeats.benefits: You can move through gloom with the speed of darkness.

baseFeats.name: Slither
baseFeats.benefits: You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces.

baseFeats.name: Smashing Tail
baseFeats.benefits: You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon.

baseFeats.name: Smokesoul
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to smoke and haze.

baseFeats.name: Snagging Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

baseFeats.name: Snare Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Craft snares.

baseFeats.name: Snare Setter
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of trap making.

baseFeats.name: Sneaky
baseFeats.benefits: Stealth is an important tool in your arsenal.

baseFeats.name: Snow May
baseFeats.benefits: You're the child of a winter hag, with one blue-white eye and an affinity for rime and snow.

baseFeats.name: Sociable
baseFeats.benefits: You’re extremely extroverted, and you often spend your time carousing or otherwise socializing.

baseFeats.name: Speak with Bats
baseFeats.benefits: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with bats.

baseFeats.name: Specialty Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Gain bonuses to Craft certain items.

baseFeats.name: Spellbook Prodigy
baseFeats.benefits: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

baseFeats.name: Spelunker
baseFeats.benefits: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground.

baseFeats.name: Spine Stabber
baseFeats.benefits: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy.

baseFeats.name: Splinter Faith
baseFeats.benefits: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

baseFeats.name: Sprite's Spark
baseFeats.benefits: You can fling a portion of your magic at foes.

baseFeats.name: Squawk!
baseFeats.benefits: You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas.

baseFeats.name: Star Orb
baseFeats.benefits: Your magic has crystallized into a spherical stone.

baseFeats.name: Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)
baseFeats.benefits: Your appearance is enough to frighten without words.

baseFeats.name: Steady Balance
baseFeats.benefits: Maintain your balance in adverse conditions.

baseFeats.name: Steady on Stone
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the earth makes natural uneven surfaces less of a hindrance for you.

baseFeats.name: Steadying Stone
baseFeats.benefits: The earth has taught you how to remain unyielding and firm.

baseFeats.name: Stoked Flame Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements.

baseFeats.name: Stone Face
baseFeats.benefits: Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear.

baseFeats.name: Stonecunning
baseFeats.benefits: You have a knack for noticing even small inconsistencies and craftsmanship techniques in the stonework around you.

baseFeats.name: Storm Born
baseFeats.benefits: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

baseFeats.name: Storm's Lash
baseFeats.benefits: Wind and lightning have always been close friends to you.

baseFeats.name: Stormsoul
baseFeats.benefits: Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning.

baseFeats.name: Story Crooner
baseFeats.benefits: You're a talented story weaver and use your voice effectively.

baseFeats.name: Straveika
baseFeats.benefits: You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth.

baseFeats.name: Streetwise
baseFeats.benefits: Use Society to Gather Information and Recall Knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Striking Retribution
baseFeats.benefits: You have an appropriately intense hatred for alghollthus.

baseFeats.name: Strix Defender
baseFeats.benefits: Your ancestral feud with humans gives you experience dealing with vicious foes, and your vengeance knows no bounds.

baseFeats.name: Strix Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You're well connected to your tribe and perhaps even strix communities beyond your own, where you've learned about the land and techniques of graceful movement.

baseFeats.name: Student of the Canon
baseFeats.benefits: More accurately recognize the tenets of your faith or philosophy.

baseFeats.name: Studious Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You've taken an interest in anadi arcane traditions.

baseFeats.name: Stumbling Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

baseFeats.name: Subtle Delivery
baseFeats.benefits: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.

baseFeats.name: Subtle Theft
baseFeats.benefits: Your thefts are harder to notice.

baseFeats.name: Sudden Charge
baseFeats.benefits: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

baseFeats.name: Suli-Jann
baseFeats.benefits: Your elemental ancestor was a janni, genies that walk the mortal world and embody all four elements together.

baseFeats.name: Sure Feet
baseFeats.benefits: Whether keeping your balance or scrambling up a tricky climb, your hairy, calloused feet easily find purchase.

baseFeats.name: Surface Culture
baseFeats.benefits: Your interactions with other cultures on the surface have not only taught you about many other ancestries, but have also helped you realize the value of your own.

baseFeats.name: Surface Skimmer
baseFeats.benefits: By sinking gently beneath the waves, you obscure your presence and utilize the water as a barrier between you and land combatants.

baseFeats.name: Survey Wildlife
baseFeats.benefits: Identify nearby creatures through signs and clues.

baseFeats.name: Svetocher
baseFeats.benefits: You were born to one of the moroi, the most common vampires, and you share their supernatural fortitude and power of persuasion.

baseFeats.name: Swift
baseFeats.benefits: You move with the wind always at your back.

baseFeats.name: Syncretism
baseFeats.benefits: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

baseFeats.name: Tail Whip
baseFeats.benefits: By birth or through training, your tail is strong enough to make for a powerful melee weapon.

baseFeats.name: Takedown Expert
baseFeats.benefits: You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You learned skills for surviving in the place where your people were dispersed.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained with a blade and other tengu weapons ever since you hatched.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: +1 to Survival checks in certain terrain.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Stalker
baseFeats.benefits: Sneak in certain terrain without attempting a check.

baseFeats.name: That's Odd
baseFeats.benefits: When you enter a new location, such as a room or corridor, you immediately notice one thing out of the ordinary.

baseFeats.name: Theoretical Acumen
baseFeats.benefits: You study a creature’s form and behavior to hypothesize likely means of overcoming its strengths.

baseFeats.name: Tide-Hardened
baseFeats.benefits: You're at home in the unpredictable tides.

baseFeats.name: Tiger Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.

baseFeats.name: Tinkering Fingers
baseFeats.benefits: You're good with your hands and can quickly improvise a fix for broken or damaged equipment.

baseFeats.name: Titan Slinger
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned how to use your sling to fell enormous creatures.

baseFeats.name: Titan Wrestler
baseFeats.benefits: Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip larger creatures.

baseFeats.name: Toughness
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your maximum HP and reduce the DCs of recovery checks.

baseFeats.name: Train Animal
baseFeats.benefits: Teach an animal a trick.

baseFeats.name: Trap Finder
baseFeats.benefits: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the dangers and presence of traps.

baseFeats.name: Trick Magic Item
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Activate a magic item you normally can't activate.

baseFeats.name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
baseFeats.benefits: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard.

baseFeats.name: Tupilaq Carver
baseFeats.prereqs: You have a spellcasting class feature with the divine or primal tradition
baseFeats.benefits: You know the truth behind old stories that tell of sending a fetish of bone and sinew to seek vengeance.

baseFeats.name: Tusks
baseFeats.benefits: You have particularly long, jagged tusks perfect for tearing meat from bone.

baseFeats.name: Twin Feint
baseFeats.benefits: You make a dazzling series of attacks with both weapons, using the first attack to throw your foe of guard against a second attack at a different angle.

baseFeats.name: Twin Takedown
baseFeats.benefits: You swiftly attack your hunted prey with both weapons.

baseFeats.name: Twitchy
baseFeats.benefits: You are naturally suspicious and wary of danger, especially when you suspect someone might be leading you into an ambush.

baseFeats.name: Unassuming Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Your family instilled the values of care and patience into you from a young age.

baseFeats.name: Unburdened Iron
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned techniques first devised by your ancestors during their ancient wars, allowing you to comfortably wear massive suits of armor.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Agility
baseFeats.benefits: You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces.

baseFeats.name: Unconventional Weaponry
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve familiarized yourself with a particular weapon, potentially from another ancestry or culture.

baseFeats.name: Undaunted
baseFeats.benefits: Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way.

baseFeats.name: Underwater Marauder
baseFeats.benefits: Fight more effectively underwater.

baseFeats.name: Underworld Investigator
baseFeats.benefits: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element.

baseFeats.name: Unexpected Shift
baseFeats.benefits: Your supernatural connection sometimes causes you to phase from reality when under threat, disappearing for split seconds before reappearing—often surprising you as much as your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Unfetter Eidolon
baseFeats.benefits: You can allow your eidolon to travel far from your side.

baseFeats.name: Unfettered Halfling
baseFeats.benefits: You were forced into service as a laborer, but you’ve since escaped and have trained to ensure you’ll never be caught again.

baseFeats.name: Unimpeded Step
baseFeats.benefits: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

baseFeats.name: Unwavering Mien
baseFeats.benefits: Your mystic control and meditations allow you to resist external influences upon your consciousness.

baseFeats.name: Vampire Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors.

baseFeats.name: Vanth's Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: You seek to emulate vanth reapers' fighting styles.

baseFeats.name: Veil May
baseFeats.benefits: Born of a blood hag, a fiery blood drinker hidden behind a false skin, you have one blood-red eye and the ability to slough off your appearance in an instant.

baseFeats.name: Vengeful Hatred
baseFeats.benefits: You heart aches for vengeance against those who have wronged your people.

baseFeats.name: Verdant Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

baseFeats.name: Versatile Performance
baseFeats.benefits: You can rely on the grandeur of your performances rather than ordinary social skills.

baseFeats.name: Very Sneaky
baseFeats.benefits: Taller folk rarely pay attention to the shadows at their feet, and you take full advantage of this.

baseFeats.name: Vestigial Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You possess small, weak wings that aid in balance.

baseFeats.name: Vibrant Display
baseFeats.benefits: Whereas most gnomes’ coloration is static or changes slowly, you can cause your hair, eye, and skin color to scintillate in brief and disorienting bursts.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Incisors
baseFeats.benefits: You've let your incisors grow long enough to serve as formidable weapons.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Vengeance
baseFeats.benefits: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

baseFeats.name: Vigorous Health
baseFeats.benefits: Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well.

baseFeats.name: Viking Shieldbearer
baseFeats.benefits: You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself.

baseFeats.name: Vile Desecration
baseFeats.benefits: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

baseFeats.name: Virga May
baseFeats.benefits: Born of a storm hag, you have one crystal-blue or rain-gray eye.

baseFeats.name: Virtuosic Performer
baseFeats.benefits: +1 with a certain type of performance.

baseFeats.name: Voice of the Night
baseFeats.benefits: You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with.

baseFeats.name: Warren Friend
baseFeats.benefits: You're adept at making contact with other ysoki.

baseFeats.name: Warren Navigator
baseFeats.benefits: You're particularly good at solving mazes and navigating twists and turns.

baseFeats.name: Watchful Gaze
baseFeats.benefits: You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time.

baseFeats.name: Watchful Halfling
baseFeats.benefits: Your communal lifestyle causes you to pay close attention to the people around you.

baseFeats.name: Waxed Feathers
baseFeats.benefits: Your feathers are coated in a waxy substance that repels water.

baseFeats.name: Weapon Proficiency
baseFeats.benefits: Become trained in a weapon type.

baseFeats.name: Web Walker
baseFeats.benefits: You have plenty of practice navigating webs.

baseFeats.name: Web Weaver
baseFeats.benefits: You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items.

baseFeats.name: Weight of Guilt
baseFeats.benefits: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

baseFeats.name: Well-Met Traveler
baseFeats.benefits: You have seen people from so many walks of life in your travels that you naturally adopt a pleasant and affable demeanor when meeting others.

baseFeats.name: Well-Versed
baseFeats.benefits: You're resilient to performative influences that aren't your own.

baseFeats.name: Widen Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

baseFeats.name: Wild Shape
baseFeats.benefits: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

baseFeats.name: Wildborn Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to access the old magic of wild places.

baseFeats.name: Willing Death
baseFeats.benefits: Once, you died because you valued someone else's life above your own; just as then, you protect an ally by suffering in their stead.

baseFeats.name: Wind Tempered
baseFeats.benefits: You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds.

baseFeats.name: Winter Cat Senses
baseFeats.benefits: Your eyes are keen and accustomed to winter conditions.

baseFeats.name: Witch Warden
baseFeats.benefits: You and your family have fought long and hard against witches, particularly the winter witches of Irrisen, and you’ve learned to be wary of their curses and the otherworldly powers their patrons grant.

baseFeats.name: Wolf Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.

baseFeats.name: Woodcraft
baseFeats.benefits: You have a innate familiarity with forested areas.

baseFeats.name: Wortwitch
baseFeats.benefits: You have a particular affinity for leafy plants.

baseFeats.name: You're Next
baseFeats.benefits: After downing a foe, you menacingly remind another foe that you’re coming after them next.

baseFeats.name: Acrobat Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become an expert in Acrobatics.

baseFeats.name: Acute Scent
baseFeats.benefits: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

baseFeats.name: After You
baseFeats.benefits: You allow your foes to make the first move in a show of incredible confidence.

baseFeats.name: Aggressive Block
baseFeats.benefits: You push back as you block the attack, knocking your foe away or off balance.

baseFeats.name: Alacritous Action
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon moves more quickly.

baseFeats.name: Alchemist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Become a multiclass alchemist.

baseFeats.name: Aldori Duelist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your dedication and training to the Aldori dueling sword.

baseFeats.name: Amphibious Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Weaponry
baseFeats.prereqs: Monastic Weaponry; a feat granting access to all weapons with an ancestry trait (such as elf or orc)
baseFeats.benefits: You blend monastic techniques with the ancestral fighting styles of your people.

baseFeats.name: Animal Trainer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a young animal companion.

baseFeats.name: Anoint Ally
baseFeats.benefits: You forge a mystical connection with an ally using your body as a focus, allowing them to benefit from your magic.

baseFeats.name: Antagonize
baseFeats.benefits: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire.

baseFeats.name: Archaeologist Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Perception; trained in Society and Thievery
baseFeats.benefits: You are a student of peoples and their histories, and are in constant pursuit of knowledge and artifacts from the past.

baseFeats.name: Archer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become trained in all simple and martial weapons in the bow weapon group.

baseFeats.name: Armored Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: Reduce the Stealth penalty of your armor.

baseFeats.name: Assassin Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Alchemical Crafting; trained in Crafting, Deception, and Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained to assassinate your foes, and you do so with tenacity and precision.

baseFeats.name: Assisting Shot
baseFeats.benefits: With a quick shot, you interfere with a foe in combat.

baseFeats.name: Assured Identification
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Avoid misidentifying magic.

baseFeats.name: Athletic Strategist
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight.

baseFeats.name: Automatic Knowledge
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Assurance in that skill
baseFeats.benefits: Recall Knowledge as a free action once per round.

baseFeats.name: Backup Disguise
baseFeats.benefits: You have a specific disguise that you keep at the ready, worn underneath your outer garment.

baseFeats.name: Barbarian Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Become a multiclass barbarian.

baseFeats.name: Bard Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Become a multiclass bard.

baseFeats.name: Bashing Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

baseFeats.name: Basic Lesson
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature.

baseFeats.name: Bastion Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat.

baseFeats.name: Battle Planner
baseFeats.benefits: Make a battle plan and roll Warfare Lore for initiative.

baseFeats.name: Beastmaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys your commands.

baseFeats.name: Blessed One Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are touched by a deity and gifted with the ability to alleviate the suffering of others.

baseFeats.name: Bonded Animal
baseFeats.benefits: An animal becomes permanently helpful to you.

baseFeats.name: Bounty Hunter Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: When focused on finding your quarry, you're relentless.

baseFeats.name: Brawling Focus
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand.

baseFeats.name: Bright Lion Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Bright Lions; not a worshipper of Walkena; trained in Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: You are one of the Bright Lions, part revolutionary warrior, part undercover spy.

baseFeats.name: Brutal Beating
baseFeats.benefits: The brutality of your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

baseFeats.name: Brutish Shove
baseFeats.benefits: Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit you opponent hard enough to make it stumble back.

baseFeats.name: Call of the Wild
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

baseFeats.name: Cantrip Casting
baseFeats.benefits: You increase your ability to cast simple spells.

baseFeats.name: Cantrip Expansion
baseFeats.benefits: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

baseFeats.name: Cathartic Mage Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Charisma 14 or ability to cast spells from spell slots
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to harness a particular emotion and mix it into your magic.

baseFeats.name: Cavalier Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a young animal companion that serves as your mount.

baseFeats.name: Celebrity Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: The more people you have looking at you, the more content you are.

baseFeats.name: Champion Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass champion.

baseFeats.name: Charmed Life
baseFeats.benefits: When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top.

baseFeats.name: Cleric Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass cleric.

baseFeats.name: Clever Gambit
baseFeats.benefits: Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage.

baseFeats.name: Combat Grab
baseFeats.benefits: You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

baseFeats.name: Communal Healing
baseFeats.benefits: You’re a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries.

baseFeats.name: Conceal Spell
baseFeats.benefits: Hiding your gestures and incantations within other speech and movement, you attempt to conceal the fact that you are casting a spell.

baseFeats.name: Conceited Mindset
baseFeats.benefits: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

baseFeats.name: Confabulator
baseFeats.benefits: Reduce the bonuses against your repeated lies.

baseFeats.name: Connections
baseFeats.benefits: Leverage your connections for favors and meetings.

baseFeats.name: Continual Recovery
baseFeats.benefits: Treat Wounds on a patient more often.

baseFeats.name: Criminal Connections
baseFeats.benefits: Leverage your underworld connections for favors from criminals.

baseFeats.name: Crushing Grab
baseFeats.benefits: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp.

baseFeats.name: Dancing Leaf
baseFeats.benefits: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze.

baseFeats.name: Dandy Dedication
