baseFeats.benefits: You are a consummate student of dignity, etiquette, and fashion.

baseFeats.name: Demolition Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

baseFeats.name: Directed Audience
baseFeats.benefits: You can shape the area of your composition spells.

baseFeats.name: Discreet Inquiry
baseFeats.benefits: Gather Information without revealing your motive.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Feint
baseFeats.benefits: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes’ attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Performance
baseFeats.benefits: Create a Diversion for an ally.

baseFeats.name: Divine Aegis
baseFeats.benefits: You summon divine energy to shield yourself, offering protection against other traditions but leaving you exposed to other divine effects.

baseFeats.name: Divine Grace
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon your deity’s grace.

baseFeats.name: Domain Acumen
baseFeats.benefits: Every oracle's mystery touches on a divine domain of the deities that fuel it; you can access that power.

baseFeats.name: Dragging Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Disciple Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You choose to study or worship one type of dragon, and your focus grants you a measure of its power.

baseFeats.name: Dragonslayer Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

baseFeats.name: Drow Shootist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy.

baseFeats.name: Druid Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass druid.

baseFeats.name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You're exceptional in your use of two weapons.

baseFeats.name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
baseFeats.benefits: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

baseFeats.name: Duelist Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in light armor and simple weapons
baseFeats.benefits: You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances.

baseFeats.name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You're a specially trained detective for the Edgewatch guard precinct in Absalom.

baseFeats.name: Eldritch Researcher Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: An eager student of occult lore, you enjoy reading rare or forgotten tomes with ancient rituals and hidden secrets.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Fist
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.

baseFeats.name: Elementalist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: air, earth, fire, or water.

baseFeats.name: Embed Aeon Stone
baseFeats.benefits: You discover the secrets to embedding aeon stones into your flesh.

baseFeats.name: Emblazon Armament
baseFeats.benefits: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

baseFeats.name: Encouraging Words
baseFeats.benefits: You give an ally a quick pep talk, helping them recover.

baseFeats.name: Energy Ablation
baseFeats.benefits: When you cast energy spells, you retain some of that energy as a protective barrier.

baseFeats.name: Enhanced Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

baseFeats.name: Entreat with Forebears
baseFeats.prereqs: a bloodline that corresponds with a creature trait
baseFeats.benefits: Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

baseFeats.name: Esoteric Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

baseFeats.name: Esoteric Polymath
baseFeats.benefits: You keep a book of occult spells, similar to a wizard’s spellbook.

baseFeats.name: Exhort the Faithful
baseFeats.prereqs: follower of a specific religion; expert in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to Request something of or Coerce members of your own faith.

baseFeats.name: Expansive Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: You've adapted a wider array of spells to work with your attacks.

baseFeats.name: Eye of the Arclords
baseFeats.benefits: The Arclords of Nex have achieved a unique mastery of magic.

baseFeats.name: Familiar Master Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have forged a mystical bond with a creature.

baseFeats.name: Familiar's Language
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

baseFeats.name: Fane's Fourberie
baseFeats.benefits: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

baseFeats.name: Favored Terrain
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges.

baseFeats.name: Fiendsbane Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

baseFeats.name: Fighter Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become trained in simple weapons and martial weapons.

baseFeats.name: Finishing Follow-Through
baseFeats.benefits: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Spellcaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You now have four cantrips per day instead of three.

baseFeats.name: Folklorist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative.

baseFeats.name: Force Fang
baseFeats.benefits: You can turn your attack into an unerring blur of force.

baseFeats.name: Fresh Ingredients
baseFeats.benefits: When using Natural Medicine to Treat Wounds, you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness.

baseFeats.name: Furious Finish
baseFeats.benefits: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

baseFeats.name: Geomancer Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast spells from spell slots; at least one spell with the air, cold, earth, fire, plant, or water trait; trained in Nature
baseFeats.benefits: You feel a deep connection to the world no matter where you are, a phenomenon known as “terrain attunement.” When you expend a spell slot to cast a spell with a trait that corresponds to the type of terrain you are currently in (as listed below), you gain the terrain attunement effect for that type of terrain.

baseFeats.name: Ghost Eater Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits.

baseFeats.name: Ghost Hunter Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have focused your training on hunting and defeating ghosts, spirits, and all manner of haunts.

baseFeats.name: Glad-Hand
baseFeats.benefits: Make an Impression on a target you've just met.

baseFeats.name: Gladiator Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to turn combat into a form of entertainment.

baseFeats.name: Godless Healing
baseFeats.prereqs: Battle Medicine; can't have a patron deity
baseFeats.benefits: With limited access to divine healing magic, Rahadoumi often become adept at using ordinary medicine for when dangerous situations arise.

baseFeats.name: Hellknight Armiger Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of a Hellknight Order; trained in heavy armor as well as your order's favored weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You have taken the first step to being a full Hellknight.

baseFeats.name: Herbalist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You can create remedies and other herbal products.

baseFeats.name: Horizon Walker Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've mastered travel within a specific type of terrain.

baseFeats.name: Hunter's Aim
baseFeats.benefits: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate.

baseFeats.name: Inspire Competence
baseFeats.benefits: You learn to aid your allies’ skills with your performance.

baseFeats.name: Intimidating Prowess
baseFeats.benefits: Gain a bonus to physically Demoralize a target.

baseFeats.name: Intimidating Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

baseFeats.name: Investigator Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the on the case class feature, which grants you both the Pursue a Lead activity and Clue In reaction.

baseFeats.name: Juggle
baseFeats.benefits: You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses.

baseFeats.name: Juggler Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become trained in Performance and gain the Juggle skill feat

baseFeats.name: Lasting Coercion
baseFeats.benefits: Coerce a target into helping you longer.

baseFeats.name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Knights of Lastwall; Shield Block
baseFeats.benefits: Swear yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall.

baseFeats.name: Lead Climber
baseFeats.benefits: Make Climbing safer for allies who Follow the Expert.

baseFeats.name: Lightslayer Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

baseFeats.name: Linguist Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: you speak at least three languages
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied languages and their development.

baseFeats.name: Lion Blade Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Lion Blades; trained in Performance
baseFeats.benefits: You are a Lion Blade, an elite spy in the service of Taldor.

baseFeats.name: Living Hair
baseFeats.benefits: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

baseFeats.name: Living Monolith Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Ancient Osiriani and Sphinx languages; trained in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Begin to process to become a living monolith.

baseFeats.name: Loremaster Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in at least one skill to Decipher Writing
baseFeats.benefits: You've compiled a vast repository of information that touches on nearly every subject.

baseFeats.name: Loremaster's Etude
baseFeats.benefits: You magically unlock memories, making them easier to recall.

baseFeats.name: Lunge
baseFeats.benefits: Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach.

baseFeats.name: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Magaambya of attendant rank; trained in Arcana or Nature
baseFeats.benefits: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

baseFeats.name: Magic Hide
baseFeats.benefits: You can defend your companion in battle.

baseFeats.name: Magic Warrior Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have taken up a nameless mask and sworn the oath of the magic warriors.

baseFeats.name: Magical Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: Craft magic items.

baseFeats.name: Magical Shorthand
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Learn spells quickly and at a reduced cost.

baseFeats.name: Magical Understudy
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon evolves to cast spells.

baseFeats.name: Magus Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You cast spells like a magus, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Marshal Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in martial weapons; trained in Diplomacy or Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: You've combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader.

baseFeats.name: Martial Artist Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained to use your fists as deadly weapons.

baseFeats.name: Mauler Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You specialize in weapons that require two hands.

baseFeats.name: Medic Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become an expert in Medicine.

baseFeats.name: Minor Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

baseFeats.name: Mobility
baseFeats.benefits: You move in a way that denies your enemies the opportunity to retaliate.

baseFeats.name: Monk Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass monk.

baseFeats.name: Monster Warden
baseFeats.benefits: You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey.

baseFeats.name: Mortal Healing
baseFeats.prereqs: Godless Healing, you follow the Laws of Mortality
baseFeats.benefits: You grant greater healing when the gods don’t interfere

baseFeats.name: Multifarious Muse
baseFeats.benefits: Your muse doesn’t fall into a single label.

baseFeats.name: Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied the basics of harmony and resonance in magic, exemplified by the ringing of chimes.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Crawl
baseFeats.benefits: Crawl at a faster rate.

baseFeats.name: No Escape
baseFeats.benefits: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

baseFeats.name: Nonlethal Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

baseFeats.name: Oozemorph Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies.

baseFeats.name: Oracle Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Choose an oracle mystery.

baseFeats.name: Order Explorer
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order.

baseFeats.name: Pathfinder Agent Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You're a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society.

baseFeats.name: Pirate Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: As a pirate, you sail the seas in search of enemy ships to plunder.

baseFeats.name: Poison Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.

baseFeats.name: Poisoner Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful.

baseFeats.name: Powerful Leap
baseFeats.benefits: Jump farther and higher.

baseFeats.name: Quick Contacts
baseFeats.prereqs: Connections or Underworld Connections; expert in Society
baseFeats.benefits: Spend only 1 day to use Connections or Underworld Connections.

baseFeats.name: Quick Disguise
baseFeats.benefits: Set up a disguise in only half the time.

baseFeats.name: Quick Draw
baseFeats.benefits: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

baseFeats.name: Quiet Allies
baseFeats.benefits: Roll a single Stealth check when sneaking with allies.

baseFeats.name: Ranged Combatant
baseFeats.benefits: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance.

baseFeats.name: Ranger Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass ranger.

baseFeats.name: Rapid Mantel
baseFeats.benefits: Pull yourself onto ledges quickly.

baseFeats.name: Rapid Response
baseFeats.benefits: You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance.

baseFeats.name: Rebounding Toss
baseFeats.benefits: You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another.

baseFeats.name: Red Herring
baseFeats.benefits: You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry.

baseFeats.name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in sawtooth sabers; worshipper of Achaekek; lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins
baseFeats.benefits: Dedicate yourself to the assassins of Achaekek.

baseFeats.name: Reinforce Eidolon
baseFeats.benefits: You buffer your eidolon.

baseFeats.name: Relentless Stalker
baseFeats.benefits: Stay adjacent to your prey when they attempt to move away.

baseFeats.name: Revivifying Mutagen
baseFeats.benefits: While under the effect of a mutagen, you can metabolize that mutagen’s power to heal yourself.

baseFeats.name: Robust Recovery
baseFeats.benefits: Greater benefits from Treat Disease and Treat Poison.

baseFeats.name: Rogue Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass rogue.

baseFeats.name: Runelord Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Your rune magic increases, and you practice with your school's associated weapon.

baseFeats.name: Runescarred Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Overwhelming magic has branded your body with powerful runes.

baseFeats.name: Sap Life
baseFeats.benefits: You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds.

baseFeats.name: Scout Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger.

baseFeats.name: Scroll Trickster Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied scrolls in depth.

baseFeats.name: Scrounger Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You can Craft items even without appropriate tools or a workshop, though you take a –2 item penalty to your Crafting check.

baseFeats.name: Second Wind
baseFeats.benefits: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

baseFeats.name: Sentinel Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained carefully to maximize the protective qualities of your armor.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Mark
baseFeats.benefits: Targets you’re following take a penalty to notice you.

baseFeats.name: Shadowcaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've sacrificed a piece of your spirit, allowing the powers of shadow into your being and changing the nature of your magic.

baseFeats.name: Shake it Off
baseFeats.benefits: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

baseFeats.name: Shared Stratagem
baseFeats.benefits: The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself.

baseFeats.name: Shining Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

baseFeats.name: Shooting Stars Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

baseFeats.name: Smoke Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: You cause the bomb to create a cloud of thick smoke, in addition to its normal effects.

baseFeats.name: Snare Hopping
baseFeats.benefits: You can magically move your snares around.

baseFeats.name: Snarecrafter Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to create a limited number of snares at no cost.

baseFeats.name: Solid Lead
baseFeats.benefits: Sometimes your case splinters into smaller mysteries, but you never lose sight of the big picture.

baseFeats.name: Song of Strength
baseFeats.benefits: Your performances inspire strength in your allies.

baseFeats.name: Sorcerer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass sorcerer.

baseFeats.name: Soulforger Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Wisdom 14 or ability to cast divine spells
baseFeats.benefits: You can manifest the power of your spirit in combat to realize your motivations.

baseFeats.name: Sow Rumor
baseFeats.benefits: You spread rumors, which may or may not be true, about a specific subject.

baseFeats.name: Spell Parry
baseFeats.benefits: You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults.

baseFeats.name: Spirit Sheath
baseFeats.benefits: You've magically constructed an extradimensional sheath for your weapon that you access through your clothing, typically through a pocket, sleeve, or seam.

baseFeats.name: Staff Acrobat Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”); Dexterity 16; trained in Acrobatics and Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: Gain bonuses when using your staff as an implement to aid Acrobatics and Athletics actions.

baseFeats.name: Steed Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon changes to make it particularly effective as your mount.

baseFeats.name: Strong Arm
baseFeats.benefits: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon's range increment increases 10 feet.

baseFeats.name: Student of Perfection Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: powerful fist or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection
baseFeats.benefits: You have joined one of the Houses of Perfection.

baseFeats.name: Stunning Fist
baseFeats.benefits: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent.

baseFeats.name: Summoner Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've formed a bond with an eidolon, an entity that manifests in a physical body only through its link to your life force.

baseFeats.name: Swashbuckler Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Choose a swashbuckler style.

baseFeats.name: Talisman Dabbler Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You are trained in the use of talismans and similar magical paraphernalia.

baseFeats.name: Tattoo Artist
baseFeats.benefits: You can craft tattoos, including magical tattoos.

baseFeats.name: Terrifying Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: +1 to spell saves from a creature you’ve Demoralized.

baseFeats.name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
baseFeats.benefits: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard.

baseFeats.name: Turn Undead
baseFeats.benefits: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath.

baseFeats.name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Your logging training has made you intimately familiar with all aspects of forestry.

baseFeats.name: Tweak Appearances
baseFeats.benefits: You can alter a creature's clothing to improve their social impact.

baseFeats.name: Unbalancing Blow
baseFeats.benefits: Interweaving your most powerful attacks in a graceful flow, you temporarily unbalance your foes. Whenever your Strike is a critical hit and deals damage, the target is flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Unbalancing Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance.

baseFeats.name: Underground Network
baseFeats.benefits: Gather Information without drawing attention and gain a bonus to Recall Knowledge about that subject.

baseFeats.name: Underhanded Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

baseFeats.name: Unmistakable Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Recall Knowledge about your Lore more effectively.

baseFeats.name: Vengeful Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

baseFeats.name: Versatile Font
baseFeats.prereqs: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
baseFeats.benefits: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

baseFeats.name: Vigilante Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You have two identities, each with its own name, alignment, and abilities.

baseFeats.name: Viking Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Vikings spend long periods of time at sea, only to leap from their boats at a moment's notice, charge through the surf, and take their enemies by storm.

baseFeats.name: Ward Medic
baseFeats.benefits: Treat several patients at once.

baseFeats.name: Wary Disarmament
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to AC or saves against devices or traps you trigger while disarming.

baseFeats.name: Weapon Improviser Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You don't take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls with improvised weapons.

baseFeats.name: Wellspring Mage Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: There's no longer a limit on how many temporary spell slots you can gain per day from wellspring magic.

baseFeats.name: Wild Empathy
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world.

baseFeats.name: Wilderness Spotter
baseFeats.benefits: Use Survival for your Initiative when in a specific terrain.

baseFeats.name: Witch Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You cast spells like a witch.

baseFeats.name: Wizard Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You become a multiclass wizard

baseFeats.name: Zephyr Guard Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: As a Zephyr Guard, you’re always vigilant against crime and threats to the city’s safety.

baseFeats.name: Additional Circus Trick
baseFeats.source: Come One, Come All, to the Extinction Curse Player’s Guide!
baseFeats.prereqs: You must have a signature trick
baseFeats.benefits: You gain an additional signature trick.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Paragon
baseFeats.benefits: Gain a 1st-level ancestry feat.

baseFeats.name: Hireling Manager
baseFeats.benefits: Hirelings gain +2 to skill checks.

baseFeats.name: Improvised Repair
baseFeats.benefits: Quickly patch a broken item.

baseFeats.name: Keen Follower
baseFeats.benefits: Improve bonuses when you Follow the Expert.

baseFeats.name: Know the Beat
baseFeats.benefits: You have been trained to investigate crimes.

baseFeats.name: Pick up the Pace
baseFeats.benefits: Your group can Hustle for up to 20 minutes longer.

baseFeats.name: Prescient Planner
baseFeats.benefits: Procure a piece of adventuring gear.

baseFeats.name: Skitter
baseFeats.benefits: Crawl up to half your Speed.

baseFeats.name: Steel Your Resolve
baseFeats.benefits: Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.

baseFeats.name: Thorough Search
baseFeats.benefits: +2 to Perception when you spend twice as long Searching.

baseFeats.name: Untrained Improvisation
baseFeats.benefits: Become more adept at using untrained skills.

baseFeats.name: Accelerating Touch
baseFeats.benefits: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

baseFeats.name: Acclimatization
baseFeats.benefits: Your time spent in the hostile parts of the world has inured you to extreme climates.

baseFeats.name: Additional Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Another animal joins you in your travels.

baseFeats.name: Aeon Resonance
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the resonant power of one embedded aeon stone as if it were placed in a wayfinder.

baseFeats.name: Alchemical Discoveries
baseFeats.benefits: You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy.

baseFeats.name: Aldori Parry
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your AC while wielding an Aldori dueling sword.

baseFeats.name: Animal Feature
baseFeats.benefits: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

baseFeats.name: Arcane School Spell
baseFeats.benefits: Select one arcane school of magic.

baseFeats.name: Ardent Armiger
baseFeats.benefits: You have been trained to resist the manipulations of fiends.

baseFeats.name: Attunement Shift
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of your spell floods into you, overriding your connection to the land around you.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Courage
baseFeats.benefits: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Despair
baseFeats.benefits: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

baseFeats.name: Axe Climber
baseFeats.benefits: You can climb wooden surfaces using axes.

baseFeats.name: Barbarian Resiliency
baseFeats.prereqs: Barbarian Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 10 + your Constitution modifier
baseFeats.benefits: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each barbarian archetype class feat you have.

baseFeats.name: Barreling Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

baseFeats.name: Basic Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level wizard feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Basic Blood Potency
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Bloodline Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell.

baseFeats.name: Basic Cathartic Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits of cleric spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Basic Concoction
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level alchemist feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Deduction
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level investigator feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Devotion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level champion feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Dogma
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Basic Flair
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level swashbuckler feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Fury
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level barbarian feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Hunter's Trick
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level ranger feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Kata
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Maneuver
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level fighter feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Martial Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level magus feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Muse's Whispers
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level bard feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Mysteries
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level oracle feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Basic Red Mantis Magic
baseFeats.prereqs: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication; trained in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training.

baseFeats.name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Basic Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You increase your ability to cast spells.

baseFeats.name: Basic Synergy
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level summoner feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Trickery
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level rogue feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Wilding
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level druid feat.

baseFeats.name: Basic Witch Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Basic Witchcraft
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level witch feat of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Basic Wizard Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Battle Assessment
baseFeats.benefits: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Beast Speaker
baseFeats.benefits: You can speak with animals.

baseFeats.name: Bespell Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you’re wielding.

baseFeats.name: Blessed Sacrifice
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the protector's sacrifice domain spell as a devotion spell.

baseFeats.name: Bloodletting Claws
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon inflicts bleeding wounds on a telling blow.

baseFeats.name: Bullying Staff
baseFeats.benefits: You can Shove and Trip larger creatures.

baseFeats.name: Butterfly Blade Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained in one of Goka's oldest traditions of espionage, intimidation, and combat mastery.

baseFeats.name: Calculated Splash
baseFeats.benefits: You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash.

baseFeats.name: Call Bonded Item
baseFeats.benefits: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

baseFeats.name: Careful Explorer
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a sixth sense for traps, noticing them even when you're not trying to.

baseFeats.name: Cathartic Focus Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the focus spell listed under your emotion's entry.

baseFeats.name: Cavalier's Banner
baseFeats.benefits: You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits.

baseFeats.name: Cavalier's Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You Command an Animal to order your mount to Stride twice.

baseFeats.name: Champion Resiliency
baseFeats.prereqs: Champion Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
baseFeats.benefits: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each champion archetype class feat you have.

baseFeats.name: Channel Smite
baseFeats.benefits: You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe.

baseFeats.name: Claws of the Dragon
baseFeats.benefits: Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists.

baseFeats.name: Cobra Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs.

baseFeats.name: Combat Reading
baseFeats.benefits: You use a performer's cold reading techniques, aura reading, and other tricks to discover your foe's strengths and weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Command Undead
baseFeats.benefits: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

baseFeats.name: Companion's Cry
baseFeats.benefits: You can urge your companion to do its utmost.

baseFeats.name: Contortionist
baseFeats.benefits: You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down.

baseFeats.name: Courageous Advance
baseFeats.benefits: With a rousing call, you exhort an ally to advance.

baseFeats.name: Cruelty
baseFeats.benefits: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

baseFeats.name: Crystal Keeper Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Elven Lore or Society
baseFeats.benefits: You can use Arcana, Occultism, Religion, or Society to Decipher Writing by meditating before a crystal, regardless of the type of writing.

baseFeats.name: Crystal Ward Spells
baseFeats.benefits: Your study of crystals and the energies held within a gem’s facets grants you special arcane crystal ward spells.

baseFeats.name: Dead Reckoning
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; trained in Survival
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above.

baseFeats.name: Decry Thief
baseFeats.prereqs: Zephyr Guard Dedication; trained in Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects.

baseFeats.name: Defend Summoner
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon blocks attacks against you.

baseFeats.name: Deflect Arrow
baseFeats.benefits: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.

baseFeats.name: Deft Cooperation
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.

baseFeats.name: Detective's Readiness
baseFeats.benefits: When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

baseFeats.name: Devastating Spellstrike
baseFeats.prereqs: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study, Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: Your Spellstrike sweeps are so wide and devastating, they splash onto nearby foes.

baseFeats.name: Diabolic Certitude
baseFeats.benefits: Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell’s denizens deep into your mind.

baseFeats.name: Directed Channel
baseFeats.benefits: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion.

baseFeats.name: Disarming Block
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt to Disarm the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with.

baseFeats.name: Disrupt Prey
baseFeats.benefits: Make a melee Strike against your prey.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Flattery
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to maintain a good impression and manage your image, even while keeping uncouth company.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: You weave distracting magic with one hand to enhance your Spellstrike.

baseFeats.name: Disturbing Defense
baseFeats.benefits: Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are.

baseFeats.name: Divine Access
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to tap into divine magic surpasses the spells traditionally available to you (the divine spell list).

baseFeats.name: Divine Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

baseFeats.name: Divine Health
baseFeats.benefits: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

baseFeats.name: Doctor's Visitation
baseFeats.benefits: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it.

baseFeats.name: Double Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession.

baseFeats.name: Dousing Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You enhance your spell with elemental water, soaking the target.

baseFeats.name: Draconic Scent
baseFeats.benefits: Your sense of smell is uncanny, much like a dragon's.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Arcana
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Dragon Disciple Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

baseFeats.name: Dread Marshal Stance
baseFeats.benefits: Putting on a grim face for the battle ahead, you encourage your allies to strike fear into their foes with vicious attacks.

baseFeats.name: Dread Striker
baseFeats.benefits: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

baseFeats.name: Dual Energy Heart
baseFeats.benefits: A second energy dwells in your eidolon.

baseFeats.name: Dual Thrower
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to throw two weapons as easily as strike with them.

baseFeats.name: Dual-Handed Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

baseFeats.name: Dual-Weapon Reload
baseFeats.benefits: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.

baseFeats.name: Duelist's Challenge
baseFeats.benefits: Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge.

baseFeats.name: Duelist's Edge
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your initiative with the dueling sword.

baseFeats.name: Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
baseFeats.benefits: Thanks to the time you’ve spent studying and experimenting, you know how to scale your formulas into larger batches that don’t require any additional attention.

baseFeats.name: Elaborate Flourish
baseFeats.benefits: You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

baseFeats.name: Eldritch Nails
baseFeats.benefits: Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Your familiar becomes an elemental spirit capable of taking on aspects of the four elements: air, earth, fire, or water.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Summons
baseFeats.benefits: You can call the four elements to you.

baseFeats.name: Emergency Targe
baseFeats.benefits: You immediately Raise a Shield or cast shield.

baseFeats.name: Enduring Alchemy
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions.

baseFeats.name: Environmental Explorer
baseFeats.benefits: You've traversed enough untamed wilderness to gain an intuitive understanding of the dangers that exist in such places.

baseFeats.name: Everstand Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

baseFeats.name: Expanded Domain Initiate
baseFeats.benefits: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

baseFeats.name: Expert Backstabber
baseFeats.benefits: When you Strike a flat-footed foe with a weapon that has the backstabber weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1.

baseFeats.name: Eye of Ozem
baseFeats.prereqs: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; expert in Perception
baseFeats.benefits: Learn how to better spot danger at a distance.

baseFeats.name: Familiar Conduit
baseFeats.prereqs: Familiar Master Dedication; able to cast spells
baseFeats.benefits: Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic.

baseFeats.name: Familiar Mascot
baseFeats.benefits: Your familiar is the heart and soul of your adventuring team.

baseFeats.name: Fancy Moves
baseFeats.benefits: You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes.

baseFeats.name: Fane's Escape
baseFeats.benefits: A good getaway requires a good distraction.

baseFeats.name: Far Shot
baseFeats.benefits: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance.

baseFeats.name: Farabellus Flip
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in medium armor; trained in Acrobatics
baseFeats.benefits: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

baseFeats.name: Fast Movement
baseFeats.benefits: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

baseFeats.name: Favored Enemy
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily.

baseFeats.name: Fighter Resiliency
baseFeats.prereqs: Fighter Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
baseFeats.benefits: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter archetype class feat you have.

baseFeats.name: Finishing Precision
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to land daring blows when you have panache.

baseFeats.name: Fire Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to heat and flame means that fire is reluctant to bring its full force to bear against you.

baseFeats.name: Firebrand Braggart Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: second mark member of the Firebrands; Charisma 14
baseFeats.benefits: Your Firebrand training has taught you that achieving something is more satisfying if you boast about it first.

baseFeats.name: First Revelation
baseFeats.benefits: You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell.

baseFeats.name: Flamboyant Athlete
baseFeats.benefits: Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity.

baseFeats.name: Fleet Tempo
baseFeats.benefits: To rush after a criminal or reach someone in need, you ring a sprightly tone.

baseFeats.name: Flurry of Maneuvers
baseFeats.benefits: You flurry is a combination of maneuvers.

baseFeats.name: Flying Kick
baseFeats.benefits: You launch yourself at a foe.

baseFeats.name: Focused Juggler
baseFeats.benefits: You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Folktales Lore
baseFeats.benefits: You can pull bits of wisdom from any tale.

baseFeats.name: Form Control
baseFeats.benefits: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time.

baseFeats.name: Gossip Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic.

baseFeats.name: Grave's Voice
baseFeats.benefits: You can influence spirits and haunts

baseFeats.name: Guarded Movement
baseFeats.benefits: Your guard is up, even while moving.

baseFeats.name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
baseFeats.benefits: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.

baseFeats.name: Head Stomp
baseFeats.benefits: Make an unarmed melee attack against a prone target.

baseFeats.name: Heal Animal
baseFeats.benefits: You can heal your animal companion's wounds.

baseFeats.name: Healing Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile.

baseFeats.name: Healing Touch
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your cause.

baseFeats.name: Hidden Magic
baseFeats.prereqs: Vigilante Dedication; expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear.

baseFeats.name: Hideous Ululation
baseFeats.benefits: Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo.

baseFeats.name: Hunter's Luck
baseFeats.benefits: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck.

baseFeats.name: Hurling Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then Interact to draw another weapon.

baseFeats.name: Hybrid Study Spell
baseFeats.benefits: Gain the conflux spell from a hybrid study of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Impaling Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

baseFeats.name: Impressive Mount
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained your mount to become a powerful force on the battlefield.

baseFeats.name: Improved Communal Healing
baseFeats.benefits: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

baseFeats.name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
baseFeats.benefits: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

baseFeats.name: Improvised Pummel
baseFeats.benefits: You make a Strike with your wielded improvised weapon.

baseFeats.name: Initial Eidolon Ability
baseFeats.benefits: Your link to your eidolon becomes stronger, granting it a new ability.

baseFeats.name: Inspire Defense
baseFeats.benefits: You learn to protect yourself and your allies with your performance.

baseFeats.name: Inspiring Marshal Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You become a brilliant example of dedication and poise in battle, encouraging your allies to follow suit.

baseFeats.name: Investigate Haunting
baseFeats.benefits: You are skilled at noticing the telltale signs of ghosts and hauntings.

baseFeats.name: Investigator's Stratagem
baseFeats.benefits: You play out battles in your head, allowing you to strike when the time is right.

baseFeats.name: Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists.

baseFeats.name: Ka Stone Ritual
baseFeats.prereqs: Living Monolith Dedication; a sphinx or living monolith with this feat performs a ritual with you
baseFeats.benefits: You enchant your ka stone and can use it to wield magic.

baseFeats.name: Knockdown
baseFeats.benefits: You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

baseFeats.name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
baseFeats.benefits: Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources.

baseFeats.name: Leading Dance
baseFeats.benefits: You sweep your foe into your dance.

baseFeats.name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
baseFeats.benefits: The leaf order's secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

baseFeats.name: Lie Detector
baseFeats.benefits: You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

baseFeats.name: Lifelink Surge
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the lifelink surge link spell.

baseFeats.name: Light of Revelation
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

baseFeats.name: Linked Focus
baseFeats.benefits: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

baseFeats.name: Log Roll
baseFeats.benefits: You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady.

baseFeats.name: Lost in the Crowd
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them.

baseFeats.name: Magic Warrior Aspect
baseFeats.benefits: You can alter your form to gain an aspect of the animal your mask represents.

baseFeats.name: Magic Warrior Transformation
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform fully into the animal your mask represents.

baseFeats.name: Magical Edification
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned those tidbits of magic that are most conducive to furthering your acquisition and transmission of knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Magical Scholastics
baseFeats.benefits: While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past.

baseFeats.name: Magical Trickster
baseFeats.benefits: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

baseFeats.name: Mask Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Your mask takes on a personality of its own, allowing it to serve as your familiar.

baseFeats.name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities.

baseFeats.name: Mature Beastmaster Companion
baseFeats.benefits: All of your animal companions grow up, becoming mature animal companions and gaining additional capabilities.

baseFeats.name: Melodious Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You subtly weave your spellcasting into your performance.

baseFeats.name: Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

baseFeats.name: Minion Guise
baseFeats.prereqs: animal companion or familiar; Vigilante Dedication; expert in Deception
baseFeats.benefits: When you are in your social identity, you can also grant a social identity to an animal companion, familiar, or other minion.

baseFeats.name: Monk Resiliency
baseFeats.prereqs: Monk Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
baseFeats.benefits: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have.

baseFeats.name: Mortification
baseFeats.benefits: Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment.

baseFeats.name: Mug
baseFeats.benefits: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

baseFeats.name: Multilingual Cipher
baseFeats.benefits: You use multiple languages to create and break codes.

baseFeats.name: Natural Swimmer
baseFeats.benefits: Water flows around you, letting you cut through the waves as if born to it.

baseFeats.name: Necromantic Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Gain resistance to necromancy effects and damage.

baseFeats.name: Necrotic Infusion
baseFeats.benefits: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

baseFeats.name: Never Tire
baseFeats.benefits: As long as you have an audience, you can continue to perform.

baseFeats.name: Observant Explorer
baseFeats.benefits: You've gained an intuitive sense about creatures.

baseFeats.name: Occult Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

baseFeats.name: Ongoing Investigation
baseFeats.benefits: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities.

baseFeats.name: Opportunist
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the Attack of Opportunity reaction.

baseFeats.name: Order Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

baseFeats.name: Order Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the initial order spell from your order.

baseFeats.name: Orthographic Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text.

baseFeats.name: Oversized Throw
baseFeats.benefits: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

baseFeats.name: Parting Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You jump back and fire a quick shot that catches your opponent off guard.

baseFeats.name: Peafowl Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon insight from your training to recover accuracy.

baseFeats.name: Phonetic Training
baseFeats.benefits: You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don't understand their meaning.

baseFeats.name: Pirate Weapon Training
baseFeats.benefits: You're particularly skilled at wielding traditional pirate weapons.

baseFeats.name: Play to the Crowd
baseFeats.benefits: You show off for the crowd.

baseFeats.name: Poison Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You apply poison to a weapon.

baseFeats.name: Poisoner's Twist
baseFeats.benefits: Poisons attack specific parts of the body.

baseFeats.name: Posse
baseFeats.benefits: By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you.

baseFeats.name: Poultice Preparation
baseFeats.benefits: When you create an herbal elixir, you can prepare it as a poultice instead.

baseFeats.name: Powerful Shove
baseFeats.benefits: You can push larger foes around with your attack.

baseFeats.name: Predictable!
baseFeats.benefits: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

baseFeats.name: Primal Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

baseFeats.name: Quick Alchemy
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the Quick Alchemy action.

baseFeats.name: Quick Fix
baseFeats.benefits: You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string.

baseFeats.name: Quick Juggler
baseFeats.benefits: When you start to Juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one.

baseFeats.name: Quick Mount
baseFeats.benefits: You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice.

baseFeats.name: Quick Reversal
baseFeats.benefits: You turn your foes’ flanking against them with a quick reverse.

baseFeats.name: Quick Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You draw your bow and attack with the same action.

baseFeats.name: Quick Study
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Infusion
baseFeats.benefits: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

baseFeats.name: Raging Athlete
baseFeats.benefits: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

baseFeats.name: Ranger Resiliency
baseFeats.prereqs: Ranger Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
baseFeats.benefits: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each ranger archetype class feat you have.

baseFeats.name: Reach Beyond
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't.

baseFeats.name: Reactive Dismissal
baseFeats.benefits: You abruptly dismiss your eidolon to reduce the damage it takes, though this makes summoning it again more difficult.

baseFeats.name: Reactive Pursuit
baseFeats.benefits: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

baseFeats.name: Reflexive Catch
baseFeats.benefits: Grab an item thrown at you.

baseFeats.name: Remember Your Training
baseFeats.benefits: You were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter.

baseFeats.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow Training
baseFeats.benefits: You become trained in the repeating hand crossbow and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and shootist bandoliers.

baseFeats.name: Rescuer's Press
baseFeats.benefits: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait.

baseFeats.name: Reverse Engineering
baseFeats.benefits: You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most.

baseFeats.name: Rites of Convocation
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

baseFeats.name: Ritual Researcher
baseFeats.benefits: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

baseFeats.name: Ritualist Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals.

baseFeats.name: Rope Runner
baseFeats.prereqs: Pirate Dedication; trained in Acrobatics and Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground.

baseFeats.name: Running Reload
baseFeats.benefits: You can reload your weapon on the move.

baseFeats.name: Sabotage
baseFeats.benefits: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

baseFeats.name: Sacred Ki
baseFeats.prereqs: Ki Strike; you follow a deity
baseFeats.benefits: The power of your faith suffuses your ki

baseFeats.name: Safe House
baseFeats.benefits: You establish a safe house—a secure space in which to hide your secrets from the outside world.

baseFeats.name: Scales of the Dragon
baseFeats.benefits: Scales grow across your body, protecting you against physical and magical threats.

baseFeats.name: Scalpel's Point
baseFeats.benefits: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy.

baseFeats.name: Scout's Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

baseFeats.name: Scout's Warning
baseFeats.benefits: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger.

baseFeats.name: Seeker of Truths
baseFeats.benefits: Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear.

baseFeats.name: Sense Alignment
baseFeats.benefits: You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos.

baseFeats.name: Settlement Scholastics
baseFeats.benefits: Your studies open up new horizons.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Spells
baseFeats.benefits: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition.

baseFeats.name: Shared Attunment
baseFeats.benefits: When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself.

baseFeats.name: Sheltering Cave
baseFeats.benefits: You spend 10 minutes communing with spirits of earth and stone, requesting shelter.

baseFeats.name: Shielded Stride
baseFeats.benefits: When your shield is up, your enemies’ blows can’t touch you.

baseFeats.name: Shrink Down
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon can shrink to fit into small spaces.

baseFeats.name: Silent Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

baseFeats.name: Skilled Partner
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon gains a 1st-level skill feat and a 2nd-level or lower skill feat.

baseFeats.name: Snap Out of It! (Marshal)
baseFeats.benefits: You give a quick shout, hoping to shake the fog clouding your ally's thoughts.

baseFeats.name: Snare Specialist
baseFeats.benefits: You specialize in creating quick traps to obstruct your enemies on the battlefield.

baseFeats.name: Sneak Attacker
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the sneak attack class feature.

baseFeats.name: Social Purview
baseFeats.benefits: You have built a reputation for yourself in your social identity.

baseFeats.name: Soothing Mist
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding.

baseFeats.name: Soul Flare
baseFeats.benefits: You strive to change the outcome with sheer zeal.

baseFeats.name: Spell Runes
baseFeats.benefits: The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities.

baseFeats.name: Spellstriker
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the magus's Spellstrike activity.

baseFeats.name: Spirit Spells
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Spiritual Explorer
baseFeats.benefits: You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer.

baseFeats.name: Spiritual Guides
baseFeats.benefits: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

baseFeats.name: Split Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots.

baseFeats.name: Spot Translate
baseFeats.benefits: You interpret a creature's words, repeating their message in a different language that you know.

baseFeats.name: Stage Fighting
baseFeats.benefits: You pull punches to give a better show.

baseFeats.name: Stand Still
baseFeats.benefits: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.

baseFeats.name: Starlit Eyes
baseFeats.prereqs: Arcane Cascade, starlit span hybrid study
baseFeats.benefits: Starlight shines in your sight, enhancing your perception and range.

baseFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting (Magus)
baseFeats.benefits: Confident in your technique, you don't easily lose your concentration when you Cast a Spell.

baseFeats.name: Steel Skin
baseFeats.benefits: You wear your armor like a second skin.

baseFeats.name: Steel Yourself!
baseFeats.benefits: You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance.

baseFeats.name: Strange Script
baseFeats.benefits: You have such familiarity with obscure texts that you can compel them to reveal their secrets.

baseFeats.name: Strategic Assessment
baseFeats.benefits: You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move.

baseFeats.name: Striker's Scroll
baseFeats.benefits: You can attach a scroll to your weapon or handwraps of mighty blows to blend its spell into an attack, carefully folding it around a part of the weapon or sealing it to the weapon's surface.

baseFeats.name: Student of the Staff
baseFeats.prereqs: Arcane Cascade, twisting tree hybrid study
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied the staff extensively to learn the hidden capabilities of your chosen weapon.

baseFeats.name: Sun Blade
baseFeats.benefits: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

baseFeats.name: Supernatural Senses
baseFeats.prereqs: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
baseFeats.benefits: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

baseFeats.name: Sure Foot
baseFeats.prereqs: Horizon Walker Dedication; expert in Acrobatics and Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You know the secrets of moving in your favored terrain.

baseFeats.name: Surprise Attack
baseFeats.benefits: You act before foes can react.

baseFeats.name: Surprise Snare
baseFeats.benefits: You install one of your snares prepared for quick deployment in a space that's occupied by an opponent.

baseFeats.name: Swaggering Initiative
baseFeats.benefits: You swagger readily into any fight—even an ambush.

baseFeats.name: Swipe
baseFeats.benefits: You make a wide, arcing swing.

baseFeats.name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
baseFeats.benefits: You can expertly control your living hair and use it to perform various tasks.

baseFeats.name: Tandem Movement
baseFeats.benefits: You and your eidolon move together.

baseFeats.name: Tenacious Toxins
baseFeats.benefits: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Scout
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the Terrain Stalker skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time.

baseFeats.name: The Harder They Fall
baseFeats.benefits: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

baseFeats.name: Thorough Reports
baseFeats.benefits: Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.

baseFeats.name: Thousand Faces
baseFeats.benefits: Your form is as mutable as the weather, changing to meet your whim.

baseFeats.name: Tools of the Trade
baseFeats.benefits: You're well-versed in weapons that allow you to bring bounties in alive.

baseFeats.name: Treat Condition
baseFeats.benefits: You treat an adjacent creature in an attempt to reduce the clumsy, enfeebled, or sickened condition.

baseFeats.name: Triple Time
baseFeats.benefits: You learn to speed up yourself and your allies with your performance.

baseFeats.name: Twin Distraction
baseFeats.benefits: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

baseFeats.name: Twin Parry
baseFeats.benefits: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

baseFeats.name: Versatile Signature
baseFeats.benefits: You’re always tweaking your available repertoire.

baseFeats.name: Vibration Sense
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon gains tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

baseFeats.name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
baseFeats.benefits: From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle.

baseFeats.name: Vision of Weakness
baseFeats.benefits: You can call upon divine insights to single out your foes' weak points.

baseFeats.name: Warding Light
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

baseFeats.name: Watch and Learn
baseFeats.benefits: Pathfinder agents serve as members of diverse teams with complementary skill sets.

baseFeats.name: Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
baseFeats.benefits: Access a new cantrip by using your Wayfinder.

baseFeats.name: Wellspring Control
baseFeats.benefits: When you generate a wellspring surge, roll twice on the Wellspring Surges Table and take the result of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Wholeness of Body
baseFeats.benefits: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki.

baseFeats.name: Woodland Stride
baseFeats.benefits: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

baseFeats.name: Wounded Rage
baseFeats.benefits: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

baseFeats.name: Adaptive Adept
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve continued adapting your magic to blend your class’s tradition with your adapted tradition.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Targeting System
baseFeats.benefits: Your ocular processors are augmented with advanced targeting systems, which allow you to more easily pinpoint your enemy and read their movements.

baseFeats.name: Ageless Patience
baseFeats.benefits: You work at a pace born from longevity that enhances your thoroughness.

baseFeats.name: Agonizing Rebuke
baseFeats.benefits: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress.

baseFeats.name: Ally's Shelter
baseFeats.benefits: In stressful circumstances, you find strength in your allies' example.

baseFeats.name: Ambush Awareness
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks attempted as initiative rolls.

baseFeats.name: Amorphous Aspect
baseFeats.benefits: Your body is supremely flexible.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Suspicion
baseFeats.benefits: Long-lived elves have seen civilizations rise and fall, often at the hands of outside forces.

baseFeats.name: Anchoring Roots
baseFeats.benefits: Small roots sprout from your feet, steadying you as you move.

baseFeats.name: Animal Elocutionist
baseFeats.benefits: You hear animal sounds as conversations instead of unintelligent noise, and can respond in turn.

baseFeats.name: Animal Speaker
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to communicate with some type of animals (such as bats or arthropods)
baseFeats.benefits: You can speak to all animals, not just a particular subset.

baseFeats.name: Animalistic Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your animalistic connections help you resist natural afflictions.

baseFeats.name: Ankle Bite
baseFeats.prereqs: Fang Sharpener or Razortooth Goblin heritage
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever someone grabs onto you, you instinctively bite down hard.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Conversationalist
baseFeats.benefits: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals with the amphibious or aquatic traits.

baseFeats.name: Athletic Might
baseFeats.benefits: Surviving in hostile terrain has given you a great talent for mobility.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Weapon Aptitude
baseFeats.benefits: You become familiar with using your weapons both in and out of water.

baseFeats.name: Blessed Blood (Aasimar)
baseFeats.benefits: Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of holy water.

baseFeats.name: Bloody Blows
baseFeats.benefits: Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding.

baseFeats.name: Boulder Roll
baseFeats.benefits: Your dwarven build allows you to push foes around, just like a mighty boulder.

baseFeats.name: Bristle
baseFeats.benefits: You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines.

baseFeats.name: Called
baseFeats.benefits: You have heard the Call, and in constantly resisting that persistent demand, you've developed a mental bulwark against effects that would target your mind.

baseFeats.name: Catchy Tune
baseFeats.benefits: You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Weapon Rake
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to efficiently use weapons that rake across your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your growing connection to your celestial forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into aeon knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Sunlight
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned how to master the power contained within sunlight, just like the trees that form your body.

baseFeats.name: Chosen of Lamashtu
baseFeats.benefits: You bear the favor and blessings of Lamashtu, the Mother of Monsters.

baseFeats.name: Clan Protector
baseFeats.benefits: Your clan dagger can protect your allies as easily as yourself.

baseFeats.name: Clever Improviser
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth.

baseFeats.name: Clever Shadow
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform simple Interact actions with your shadow, such as opening an unlocked door.

baseFeats.name: Climbing Claws
baseFeats.benefits: You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing.

baseFeats.name: Cloud Gazer
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to air allows you to see through obscuring mists.

baseFeats.name: Conrasu Weapon Understanding
baseFeats.benefits: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself.

baseFeats.name: Cornered Fury
baseFeats.benefits: When physically outmatched, you fight with unexpected ferocity.

baseFeats.name: Crystalline Dust
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to disperse the crystalline motes coating your body as a haze.

baseFeats.name: Cultural Adaptability
baseFeats.benefits: During your adventures, you’ve honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you.

baseFeats.name: Cunning Hair
baseFeats.benefits: Your hair moves under your control.

baseFeats.name: Darkseer
baseFeats.benefits: Zon-Kuthon smiles upon you—even if you curse his name—granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness.

baseFeats.name: Defiance Unto Death
baseFeats.benefits: You loathe the alghollthus and their mind magic, and you’ve been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation.

baseFeats.name: Defy Death
baseFeats.benefits: You're exceptionally difficult to kill.

baseFeats.name: Defy the Darkness
baseFeats.benefits: Using ancient dwarven methods developed to fight enemies wielding magical darkness, you've honed your darkvision and sworn not to use such magic yourself.

baseFeats.name: Demonblood Frenzy
baseFeats.benefits: Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury.

baseFeats.name: Devil in Plain Sight
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to draw your fiendish nature into a small ball of corruption and hide it in your soul.

baseFeats.name: Devilish Wiles
baseFeats.benefits: Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea.

baseFeats.name: Distant Cackle
baseFeats.benefits: It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell.

baseFeats.name: Dogfang Bite
baseFeats.benefits: You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do.

baseFeats.name: Drag Down
baseFeats.benefits: While swimming in water at least 10 feet deep, you grab an adjacent creature (on nearby land or in the water) and pull it below the surface.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Reinforcement
baseFeats.benefits: You can use your knowledge of engineering and metalwork to temporarily strengthen thick objects and structures.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Weapon Cunning
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned cunning techniques to get the best effects out of your dwarven weapons.

baseFeats.name: Easily Dismissed
baseFeats.benefits: You are practiced at blending into the background of the streets and halls of larger folk to ensure that you are overlooked.

baseFeats.name: Eat Fortune
baseFeats.benefits: As someone tries to twist fate, you consume the interference.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Obsession
baseFeats.benefits: Your desire for stimulation has led you from one pursuit to another and granted you a smattering of expertise with myriad crafts and professions.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Bulwark
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the corresponding elements of your suli heritage to resist the effect.

baseFeats.name: Elven Instincts
baseFeats.benefits: Your senses let you react rapidly.

baseFeats.name: Elven Weapon Elegance
baseFeats.benefits: You are attuned to the weapons of your elven ancestors and are particularly deadly when using them.

baseFeats.name: Empyreal Blessing
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth a benediction upon your allies, whether you pray to a deity of the celestial realms or just find the power within yourself.

baseFeats.name: Energized Font
baseFeats.prereqs: focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells
baseFeats.benefits: The magic within you provides increased energy you can use to focus.

baseFeats.name: Enthralling Allure
baseFeats.benefits: The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well.

baseFeats.name: Envenom Fangs
baseFeats.benefits: You envenom your fangs.

baseFeats.name: Expanded Luck
baseFeats.benefits: You are luckier even than most catfolk.

baseFeats.name: Expert Drill Sergeant
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to get the most out of your allies.

baseFeats.name: Extinguish Light
baseFeats.benefits: You wrap shadow around a single unattended light source within 120 feet that's no larger than a torch.

baseFeats.name: Favorable Winds
baseFeats.benefits: You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield.

baseFeats.name: Feathered Cloak
baseFeats.benefits: To blend in with the grounded and wingless, you fold your wings just so on your back, creating the illusion of a feathered cloak.

baseFeats.name: Feed on Pain
baseFeats.benefits: The psychic feedback of another creature's pain fills you with false life.

baseFeats.name: Fey Disguise
baseFeats.benefits: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions.

baseFeats.name: Fey Influence
baseFeats.benefits: Your exposure to fey influence has given you some primal magic

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to your fiendish forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

baseFeats.name: Finned Ridges
baseFeats.benefits: The ridges and flaps of your skin steer you through the water.

baseFeats.name: Firesight
baseFeats.benefits: You can see through the haze of flame.

baseFeats.name: Fledgling Flight
baseFeats.benefits: You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Tail
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform simple Interact actions with your tail, such as opening an unlocked door.

baseFeats.name: Fluid Contortionist
baseFeats.benefits: You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze.

baseFeats.name: Focused Cat Nap
baseFeats.benefits: When you Cat Nap, you can also Refocus as you dream of a relevant activity.

baseFeats.name: Forest Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage.

baseFeats.name: Formation Training
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to fight in formation with your brethren.

baseFeats.name: Fortify Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You reinforce your shield with a rocky outgrowth of metal and stone.

baseFeats.name: Friendform
baseFeats.benefits: The shared bond between you and your allies allows you to act on their behalf.

baseFeats.name: Gaping Flesh
baseFeats.benefits: Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker.

baseFeats.name: Garuda's Squall
baseFeats.benefits: Garudas' marksmanship and magic are second nature to you.

baseFeats.name: Gecko's Grip
baseFeats.benefits: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip.

baseFeats.name: Genie Weapon Flourish
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you critically hit using a falchion, ranseur, scimitar, trident, or a geniekin weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

baseFeats.name: Gnaw
baseFeats.benefits: With enough time and determination, you can chew through nearly anything.

baseFeats.name: Gnoll Weapon Practicality
baseFeats.benefits: You have come to know gnoll weapons as you know yourself.

baseFeats.name: Gnome Weapon Innovator
baseFeats.benefits: You produce outstanding results when wielding unusual weapons.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Weapon Frenzy
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to wield your people’s vicious weapons.

baseFeats.name: Graceful Guidance
baseFeats.benefits: You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects.

baseFeats.name: Greater Animal Senses
baseFeats.benefits: Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Glide
baseFeats.benefits: You can use your webbed feet to guide your fall.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Weapon Innovator
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons.

baseFeats.name: Grovel
baseFeats.benefits: With obsequious words and begging gestures, you convince your foe you're less of a threat.

baseFeats.name: Guided by the Stars
baseFeats.benefits: The stars grant you insights that guide your actions.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Ingenuity
baseFeats.benefits: While your willingness to dig into a task you know little about might get you into trouble, your incredible luck often saves you from danger.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Weapon Trickster
baseFeats.benefits: You are particularly adept at fighting with your people’s favored weapons.

baseFeats.name: Healer's Halo
baseFeats.benefits: Your halo can enhance positive energy.

baseFeats.name: Heatwave
baseFeats.benefits: You harness the oncoming flames and twist them into a screen of heat and smoke, granting you concealment until the beginning of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters.

baseFeats.name: Hold Mark
