baseFeats.benefits: You bear scars or tattoos enhanced by the mark of your community's prowess.

baseFeats.name: Hopping Stride
baseFeats.benefits: You've internalized the hopping gait of your vampiric forebear.

baseFeats.name: Hunter's Fangs
baseFeats.benefits: Your fangs are exceptionally painful.

baseFeats.name: Hybrid Form
baseFeats.benefits: When you Change Shape, you retain elements of your kitsune form, allowing you to speak in a fox form, use kitsune unarmed attacks in a tailless form, or gain a tail in your tailless form to use abilities that require one.

baseFeats.name: Hybrid Shape
baseFeats.benefits: Mastery of your shapeshifting lets you combine the best features of your humanoid and spider forms.

baseFeats.name: Inoculation Subroutine
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites reject diseases with ease.

baseFeats.name: Inspire Imitation
baseFeats.benefits: Your own actions inspire your allies to great achievements.

baseFeats.name: Intercorporate
baseFeats.benefits: Your ordered physiology rejects unwelcome elements.

baseFeats.name: Intuitive Illusions
baseFeats.benefits: Illusion magic comes to you so naturally that you can effortlessly sustain your magical ruses.

baseFeats.name: Inured to the Heat
baseFeats.benefits: Your have a love for extreme heat.

baseFeats.name: Iruxi Glide
baseFeats.benefits: You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air.

baseFeats.name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
baseFeats.benefits: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks.

baseFeats.name: Kitsune Spell Mysteries
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
baseFeats.benefits: You know more kitsune magic.

baseFeats.name: Kneecap
baseFeats.benefits: You deliver a punishing blow to an enemy's knee, shin, or other vulnerable anatomy within your reach.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons.

baseFeats.name: Lab Rat
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent more than your share of time in an alchemy lab.

baseFeats.name: Leshy Glide
baseFeats.prereqs: Leaf Leshy heritage or Cat Fall
baseFeats.benefits: Using your own leaves, you can control your descent.

baseFeats.name: Lifesense
baseFeats.benefits: You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your psychopomp forebears.

baseFeats.name: Light Paws
baseFeats.benefits: You can balance on your toes to step carefully over obstructions.

baseFeats.name: Lightless Litheness
baseFeats.benefits: Your body is almost as flexible as your shadow.

baseFeats.name: Long Tongue
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to stretch your exceptionally long tongue beyond its original limits.

baseFeats.name: Long-Nosed Form
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform into a specific, curious-looking human form.

baseFeats.name: Loud Singer
baseFeats.benefits: Staying on pitch, proper breath control, and remembering the words are all less important than the real measure of a good singer: volume! The range of your Goblin Song is increased to 60 feet, and you can target one additional enemy when you use it.

baseFeats.name: Loyal Empath
baseFeats.benefits: You have incredible empathy for your friends and family, and you have an innate timing for helping others in distress.

baseFeats.name: Lucky Break
baseFeats.benefits: You catch yourself as you make a mistake.

baseFeats.name: Magpie Snatch
baseFeats.benefits: You move quickly, snatching a shiny item that catches your eye.

baseFeats.name: Malicious Bane
baseFeats.benefits: Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes.

baseFeats.name: Marine Ally
baseFeats.benefits: You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you.

baseFeats.name: Martial Experience
baseFeats.benefits: You've crossed blades with a wide variety of foes wielding a wide variety of weapons, and you've learned the basics of fighting with nearly any of them.

baseFeats.name: Mask of Power
baseFeats.benefits: Your warmask sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power.

baseFeats.name: Mask of Rejection
baseFeats.benefits: Your warmask projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic.

baseFeats.name: Mist Child
baseFeats.benefits: You blend in with unnatural subtlety.

baseFeats.name: Mutate Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: deal more damage with your Living Weapon.

baseFeats.name: Myriad Forms
baseFeats.benefits: With a bit of self-discovery, you find a new form.

baseFeats.name: Nanite Shroud
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud.

baseFeats.name: Natural Illusionist
baseFeats.benefits: By drawing upon the First World’s magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion.

baseFeats.name: Necromantic Physiology
baseFeats.benefits: Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you.

baseFeats.name: Offensive Analysis
baseFeats.benefits: You can enhance your senses and mental state to consider every aspect of an attack.

baseFeats.name: One-Toed Hop
baseFeats.benefits: Assuming a peculiar stance, you make a short hop on each toe.

baseFeats.name: Orc Weapon Carnage
baseFeats.benefits: You are brutally efficient with the weapons of your orc ancestors.

baseFeats.name: Ornate Tattoo
baseFeats.benefits: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic.

baseFeats.name: Pack Stalker
baseFeats.benefits: Ambushes are an honored gnoll tradition.

baseFeats.name: Plague Sniffer
baseFeats.benefits: You can sniff out the pungent tang of disease.

baseFeats.name: Powerful Guts
baseFeats.benefits: Your stomach is particularly durable.

baseFeats.name: Practiced Paddler
baseFeats.benefits: You’re skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony.

baseFeats.name: Pride Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies.

baseFeats.name: Project Persona
baseFeats.benefits: Where others etch their armor to serve as a conduit for their imaginations, your vivid mind and bold personality allow you to project a more fitting persona over your lackluster armor.

baseFeats.name: Protective Claws
baseFeats.benefits: The chitin on your claws is so hard you can defend against attacks with them.

baseFeats.name: Protective Sheath
baseFeats.benefits: When you lash out with your clan dagger, you keep its sheath close at hand.

baseFeats.name: Protective Subroutine
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites can augment your defenses.

baseFeats.name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches.

baseFeats.name: Rat Magic
baseFeats.benefits: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you.

baseFeats.name: Ratfolk Roll
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to curl up into a tight ball comes in handy.

baseFeats.name: Recognize Ambush
baseFeats.benefits: Your combat training has honed you to be ready for an attack at all times.

baseFeats.name: Renewing Quills
baseFeats.benefits: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks.

baseFeats.name: Right-Hand Blood
baseFeats.benefits: It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that of the left side is poisonous.

baseFeats.name: Ritual Reversion
baseFeats.benefits: You can temporarily revert to a less conspicuous form without diminishing your senses.

baseFeats.name: Runtsage
baseFeats.benefits: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions.

baseFeats.name: Scar-Thick Skin
baseFeats.benefits: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body.

baseFeats.name: Sense Allies
baseFeats.benefits: Like many humans raised in a close-knit community, you have always been strongly attuned to the presence of others.

baseFeats.name: Shadowy Disguise
baseFeats.benefits: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance.

baseFeats.name: Shared Luck (Halfling)
baseFeats.benefits: You are evidence that it’s lucky to travel with a halfling.

baseFeats.name: Shed Tail
baseFeats.benefits: You can shed your tail to escape.

baseFeats.name: Sheltering Slab
baseFeats.benefits: The stone around you is your ally, and you have learned to use it to shore up your weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Shifting Faces
baseFeats.benefits: You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you.

baseFeats.name: Shoki's Argument
baseFeats.benefits: You feel a connection to shokis, the rambling collectors of wayward souls, and might have found old texts written by one.

baseFeats.name: Skillful Tail
baseFeats.benefits: You've always had a tail, but with practice, you've learned to use it for more than signaling your mood.

baseFeats.name: Skillful Tail (Ganzi)
baseFeats.benefits: You have a tail or similar body part that is always willing to lend a hand (so to speak).

baseFeats.name: Skillful Tail (Geniekin)
baseFeats.benefits: You were born with a tail, and with practice you've learned how to perform simple Interact actions with it, such as opening an unlocked door.

baseFeats.name: Slip with the Breeze
baseFeats.benefits: You create gusts of wind when you jump, allowing you to carry yourself across greater distances.

baseFeats.name: Snare Genius
baseFeats.benefits: Your expertise makes your snares more powerful, and you can place them quickly and efficiently.

baseFeats.name: Speak with Kindred
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection with creatures that share your physiology.

baseFeats.name: Spirit Soother
baseFeats.benefits: You are attuned to the minute sounds and sensations of restless spirits.

baseFeats.name: Springing Leaper
baseFeats.benefits: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps.

baseFeats.name: Steam Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You transform your fire spells into steam, making them more effective underwater.

baseFeats.name: Step Lively
baseFeats.benefits: You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures.

baseFeats.name: Strix Vengeance
baseFeats.benefits: You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin.

baseFeats.name: Supernatural Charm
baseFeats.benefits: The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring.

baseFeats.name: Swift Swimmer
baseFeats.benefits: You swim faster than most iruxi.

baseFeats.name: Tail Spin
baseFeats.benefits: You excel at using your tail as a weapon to upend your foes.

baseFeats.name: Taste Blood
baseFeats.prereqs: Cel Rau, Straveika, Svetocher, or another lineage from a vampire with the Drink Blood ability
baseFeats.benefits: You retain not only your vampiric parent's taste for blood but their ability to gain vitality from it.

baseFeats.name: Tenacious Net
baseFeats.benefits: Escaping your nets is no simple task.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Feather Fan
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to bind some of your feathers together into a fan to focus your ancestral magic.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Weapon Study
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned techniques for using blades and other tengu weapons.

baseFeats.name: Thrown Voice
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to throw your voice through the winds, tricking others as to your location.

baseFeats.name: Tomb-Watcher's Glare
baseFeats.benefits: When you critically hit an undead creature, or an undead creature critically fails a saving throw against one of your abilities, you drive your divine wrath home in your enemy’s heart.

baseFeats.name: Tongue Disarm
baseFeats.benefits: You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe.

baseFeats.name: Torch Goblin
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve spent enough time on fire that you know how to use it to your advantage.

baseFeats.name: Tough Tumbler
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve taken your share of licks while scurrying around the battlefield and know how to defend yourself against opportunistic attackers.

baseFeats.name: Tranquil Sanctuary
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever possible, you follow the serene path and encourage others to do the same.

baseFeats.name: Treacherous Earth
baseFeats.benefits: You have the power to shatter the earth into a shape of your devising.

baseFeats.name: Tree Climber (Goblin)
baseFeats.prereqs: Tailed Goblin heritage or Treedweller Goblin heritage
baseFeats.benefits: Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Awareness
baseFeats.benefits: You have a keen sense of movement around you.

baseFeats.name: Undead Companion
baseFeats.prereqs: an animal companion or a familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Your companion is also touched by undeath, a mix of a traditional companion and a skeleton, zombie, or stranger form of unlife.

baseFeats.name: Undead Slayer
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of your own not-quite-living anatomy, combined with your experience in combat, helps you take down undead foes with ease.

baseFeats.name: Vandal
baseFeats.benefits: You have a knack for breaking and dismantling things.

baseFeats.name: Vanth's Weapon Execution
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained in the finer points of dealing death.

baseFeats.name: Victorious Vigor
baseFeats.benefits: Your victories in battle fill you with pride and imbue you with the energy to fight a bit longer despite your wounds.

baseFeats.name: Ward Against Corruption
baseFeats.benefits: Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as sahkils.

baseFeats.name: Water Conjuration
baseFeats.benefits: You carry the ocean with you wherever you go.

baseFeats.name: Wavetouched Paragon
baseFeats.benefits: You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish.

baseFeats.name: Wildborn Adept
baseFeats.benefits: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic.

baseFeats.name: Winglets
baseFeats.benefits: You're among the few kobolds who grow a set of draconic wings later in life.

baseFeats.name: Abundant Step
baseFeats.benefits: You can teleport yourself a short distance.

baseFeats.name: Adaptive Mask Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Your mask familiar adapts quickly to material form, allowing it to gain more familiar and master abilities.

baseFeats.name: Additional Recollection
baseFeats.benefits: You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one wizard feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Blood Potency
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one sorcerer feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Bloodline
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Bow Training
baseFeats.benefits: Through constant practice and the crucible of experience, you increase your skill with advanced bows.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Concoction
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one alchemist feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Deduction
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one investigator feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Devotion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one champion feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Dogma
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one cleric feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Elemental Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: flame order, stone order, storm order, or wave order
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Flair
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one swashbuckler feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Fury
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one barbarian feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Hunter's Trick
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one ranger feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Kata
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one monk feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Maneuver
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a fighter feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Martial Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one magus feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Muse's Whispers
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one bard feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Mysteries
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one oracle feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Red Mantis Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your Red Mantis magical training has improved.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Revelation
baseFeats.benefits: You learn an advanced revelation spell associated with your mystery.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Synergy
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one summoner feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Trickery
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one rogue feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Weapon Training
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve studied the art of wielding an advanced weapon.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Wilding
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one druid feat.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Witchcraft
baseFeats.benefits: You gain one witch feat.

baseFeats.name: Advantageous Assault
baseFeats.benefits: When an enemy’s movement is compromised, you deliver a more deadly blow.

baseFeats.name: Agile Maneuvers
baseFeats.benefits: Your easily maneuver against your foes.

baseFeats.name: Aldori Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: Learn to strike back at your opponent when they fail to attack you.

baseFeats.name: Align Ki
baseFeats.benefits: The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle.

baseFeats.name: Analyze Idiolect
baseFeats.prereqs: Linguist Dedication; expert in Deception and Society
baseFeats.benefits: You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

baseFeats.name: Analyze Weakness
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of a creature's physiology and understanding of tactics helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

baseFeats.name: Animal Skin
baseFeats.benefits: When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide.

baseFeats.name: Anticipate Ambush
baseFeats.benefits: Using your extensive knowledge of ambush tactics, you keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel speed.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Sensitivity
baseFeats.benefits: You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself.

baseFeats.name: Archaeologist's Warning
baseFeats.benefits: You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

baseFeats.name: Armor Specialist
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained hard to optimize your armor's protective qualities.

baseFeats.name: Artokus's Fire
baseFeats.benefits: Artokus developed a mixture of volatile materials that burns hotter and longer than typical alchemist's fire.

baseFeats.name: Assured Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: You can procure information with confidence.

baseFeats.name: Attack of Opportunity
baseFeats.benefits: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

baseFeats.name: Axe Thrower
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease.

baseFeats.name: Basic Magus Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Basic Scroll Cache
baseFeats.benefits: You have a vast and overflowing collection of scroll scraps, riddled with errors and misspellings and leaking energy like a sieve.

baseFeats.name: Basic Summoner Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the basic bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Beastmaster's Trance
baseFeats.benefits: You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses.

baseFeats.name: Bellflower Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Bellflower Network; expert in Stealth and Survival; Charisma 14
baseFeats.benefits: You dedicate yourself to freeing slaves and escorting them to freedom.

baseFeats.name: Blazing Talon Surge
baseFeats.benefits: You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

baseFeats.name: Blood Frenzy
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon flies into a frenzy.

baseFeats.name: Boaster's Challenge
baseFeats.prereqs: Firebrand Braggart Dedication; expert in Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat.

baseFeats.name: Bolera's Interrogation
baseFeats.benefits: You can force a creature to tell the truth

baseFeats.name: Brutal Bully
baseFeats.benefits: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

baseFeats.name: Burning Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You enhance your spell with elemental fire, causing it to set the target on fire.

baseFeats.name: Butterfly's Kiss
baseFeats.benefits: You can make nonlethal Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

baseFeats.name: Butterfly's Sting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the sneak attack class feature.

baseFeats.name: Cadence Call
baseFeats.benefits: You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm.

baseFeats.name: Cascade Bearer's Flexibility
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon your Cascade Bearer training to help you adjust a spell for the current situation.

baseFeats.name: Cascade Countermeasure
baseFeats.benefits: When in Arcane Cascade, you can make yourself resistant to magic.

baseFeats.name: Cast Down
baseFeats.benefits: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

baseFeats.name: Champion's Reaction
baseFeats.benefits: You can use the champion’s reaction associated with your cause.

baseFeats.name: Clear the Way
baseFeats.benefits: You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path.

baseFeats.name: Cleave
baseFeats.benefits: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

baseFeats.name: Combination Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow.

baseFeats.name: Combine Elixirs
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve discovered how to mix two elixirs into a single hybrid concoction.

baseFeats.name: Connect the Dots
baseFeats.benefits: Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

baseFeats.name: Convincing Illusion
baseFeats.benefits: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

baseFeats.name: Corrupted Shield
baseFeats.benefits: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

baseFeats.name: Counter Perform
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the counter performance composition spell.

baseFeats.name: Craft Facsimile
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; expert in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: You're renowned for your ability to recover important items and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in.

baseFeats.name: Crane Flutter
baseFeats.benefits: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.

baseFeats.name: Crimson Shroud
baseFeats.benefits: You can surround yourself with bloody mist.

baseFeats.name: Crossbow Terror
baseFeats.benefits: You are a dynamo with the crossbow.

baseFeats.name: Crowd Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd.

baseFeats.name: Current Spell
baseFeats.benefits: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

baseFeats.name: Daring Act
baseFeats.prereqs: Firebrand Braggart Dedication; trained in Acrobatics or Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Dazing Blow
baseFeats.benefits: You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them.

baseFeats.name: Debilitating Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: Your bombs impose additional effects on your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Defend Mount
baseFeats.benefits: You interpose yourself between an attacker and your mount, defending your mount from harm.

baseFeats.name: Defensive Coordination
baseFeats.benefits: Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line.

baseFeats.name: Directional Bombs
baseFeats.benefits: You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction.

baseFeats.name: Dirge of Doom
baseFeats.benefits: You learn to frighten your enemies with your performance.

baseFeats.name: Disarming Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Discerning Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Disciple of Shade
baseFeats.benefits: You've delved deeper into the mysteries of shadow and become blessed with magical power that increases your skills in the arts of deception and persuasion.

baseFeats.name: Disrupting Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead.

baseFeats.name: Diverting Vortex
baseFeats.benefits: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.

baseFeats.name: Divine Ally
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a divine ally of your choice.

baseFeats.name: Divine Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

baseFeats.name: Dodge Away
baseFeats.benefits: You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Roar
baseFeats.benefits: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Dragon's Rage Breath
baseFeats.benefits: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

baseFeats.name: Educate Allies
baseFeats.benefits: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Eidolon's Opportunity
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature.

baseFeats.name: Eidolon's Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon gains the eidolon's wrath focus spell, which it casts, instead of you.

baseFeats.name: Eldritch Archer Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in at least one type of bow
baseFeats.benefits: You blend magic with your archery, leading to powerful results.

baseFeats.name: Emerald Boughs Accustomation
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation; expert in Society
baseFeats.benefits: You are comfortable and socially capable in almost any cultural context.

baseFeats.name: Endemic Herbs
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you find medicinal plants endemic to your location.

baseFeats.name: Energetic Resonance
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

baseFeats.name: Ephemeral Tracking
baseFeats.benefits: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places.

baseFeats.name: Expeditious Advance
baseFeats.benefits: You advance and retreat quickly.

baseFeats.name: Expert Alchemy
baseFeats.benefits: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 3.

baseFeats.name: Expert Herbalism
baseFeats.benefits: Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3.

baseFeats.name: Expert Poisoner
baseFeats.benefits: Your advanced alchemy level for poison increases to your level – 3.

baseFeats.name: Far Throw
baseFeats.benefits: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

baseFeats.name: Fleeting Shadow
baseFeats.benefits: You're able to quickly disappear and then move about stealthily.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Ritualist
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform two aspects of a ritual yourself.

baseFeats.name: Follow-Up Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained to use all parts of your body as a weapon.

baseFeats.name: Forced Entry
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; expert in Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering.

baseFeats.name: Furious Focus
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously.

baseFeats.name: Gang Up
baseFeats.benefits: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

baseFeats.name: Ghost Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You can infuse a weapon you are carrying with magical energies that allow it to strike true against incorporeal undead.

baseFeats.name: Giant's Stature
baseFeats.benefits: You grow to incredible size.

baseFeats.name: Gorilla Pound
baseFeats.benefits: You pound your chest before slamming into your foes.

baseFeats.name: Grave Sense
baseFeats.benefits: Learn how to sense undead in the area.

baseFeats.name: Greater Lesson
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Green Empathy
baseFeats.benefits: You can communicate with plants on a basic level and use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on them and to make very simple Requests of them.

baseFeats.name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
baseFeats.benefits: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally.

baseFeats.name: Halcyon Speaker Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; member of the Magaambya of conversant rank
baseFeats.benefits: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

baseFeats.name: Harmonize
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform multiple compositions simultaneously.

baseFeats.name: Heaven's Thunder
baseFeats.benefits: With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body.

baseFeats.name: Hellknight Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
baseFeats.benefits: You have forged your body to comply with the commands of your mind—orders steeped in the Measure and the Chain.

baseFeats.name: Hellknight Signifer Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: spellcasting class feature; Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
baseFeats.benefits: You have bolstered your force of will with the power of the Measure and the Chain.

baseFeats.name: High-Quality Scrounger
baseFeats.benefits: When you Craft a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level.

baseFeats.name: Holistic Care
baseFeats.benefits: You provide emotional and spiritual care.

baseFeats.name: Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)
baseFeats.benefits: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

baseFeats.name: Inner Fire (SoM)
baseFeats.benefits: While you're in Stoked Flame Stance, you have cold and fire resistance equal to half your level, and any creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, tries to Grab or Grapple you, or otherwise touches you takes fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).

baseFeats.name: Inner Strength
baseFeats.benefits: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

baseFeats.name: Insect Shape
baseFeats.benefits: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

baseFeats.name: Instinct Ability
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the instinct ability for the instinct you chose for Barbarian Dedication.

baseFeats.name: Invigorating Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

baseFeats.name: Jellyfish Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity.

baseFeats.name: Keen Recollection
baseFeats.benefits: You can recall all sorts of information.

baseFeats.name: Keep Pace
baseFeats.benefits: Your prey can't Escape.

baseFeats.name: Ki Blast
baseFeats.benefits: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki.

baseFeats.name: Knight Reclaimant Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: any non-evil alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank; trained in Stealth and Survival
baseFeats.benefits: You have sworn the Crimson Oath and become a full member of the Crimson Reclaimers.

baseFeats.name: Knight Vigilant
baseFeats.prereqs: any good alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank; trained in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You are dedicated to the cause of the Shining Sentinels.

baseFeats.name: Knowledge is Power
baseFeats.benefits: When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check about a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the creature, to your AC against its next attack roll, and to your save against its next effect requiring a save.

baseFeats.name: Light Step
baseFeats.benefits: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

baseFeats.name: Litany Against Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

baseFeats.name: Living Rune
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve bridged a connection between the runes on your body and the magic of runestones, allowing you to place an armor rune on your living flesh.

baseFeats.name: Loyal Warhorse
baseFeats.benefits: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

baseFeats.name: Mage Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

baseFeats.name: Magic Hands
baseFeats.benefits: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic.

baseFeats.name: Master Summoner
baseFeats.benefits: During daily preparations, you can designate one of your spell slots to become two summoning slots of the same spell level, from which you can cast only summoning or incarnate spells.

baseFeats.name: Mastermind's Eye
baseFeats.benefits: When you identify a creature with Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed to you.

baseFeats.name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion grows up, gaining additional capabilities.

baseFeats.name: Mature Trained Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion.

baseFeats.name: Mesmerizing Gaze
baseFeats.benefits: When you meet someone's gaze, they are unable to look away.

baseFeats.name: Mountain Stronghold
baseFeats.benefits: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you.

baseFeats.name: Mounted Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained with your shield to defend both yourself and your mount.

baseFeats.name: Nameless Anonymity
baseFeats.benefits: Your mask protects you further from divination.

baseFeats.name: Narrative Conduit
baseFeats.benefits: You act as a conduit for your companions just as your stories are a conduit between teller and listener.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Shield Hand
baseFeats.benefits: You are so used to wielding a shield that you can do so even while using the hand that's holding it for other purposes.

baseFeats.name: Nocturnal Sense
baseFeats.prereqs: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
baseFeats.benefits: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

baseFeats.name: One-Inch Punch
baseFeats.benefits: You put all your force into a single mighty, carefully controlled blow.

baseFeats.name: Ostentatious Arrival
baseFeats.benefits: If the next action you take is to Manifest your Eidolon as a three-action activity, or to Cast a three-action summoning Spell, the creature appears in an explosion.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Ki Adept
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection.

baseFeats.name: Performative Weapons Training
baseFeats.benefits: You're skilled with flashy weapons.

baseFeats.name: Perpetual Scout
baseFeats.benefits: You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best.

baseFeats.name: Phase Out
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon phases out of reality slightly, gaining resistance to all damage (except force and negative) equal to half your level.

baseFeats.name: Poison Coat
baseFeats.benefits: In nature, certain animals are covered in venomous spines, such that even touching them is deadly.

baseFeats.name: Polearm Tricks
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to rune magic has revealed tricks to make polearms deadlier in your hands.

baseFeats.name: Precise Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot.

baseFeats.name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
baseFeats.benefits: You have just the thing for the situation.

baseFeats.name: Quick Snares
baseFeats.benefits: You can rig a snare in only moments.

baseFeats.name: Rain-Scribe Sustenance
baseFeats.benefits: You use the power of your Rain-Scribe magic to draw on a stream of primal power for sustenance.

baseFeats.name: Rallying Charge
baseFeats.benefits: Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight.

baseFeats.name: Ranger's Bramble
baseFeats.benefits: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns.

baseFeats.name: Rapid Manifestation
baseFeats.benefits: Your unwavering soul brings up your defenses as soon as you're in danger.

baseFeats.name: Reflexive Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage.

baseFeats.name: Relentless Disarm
baseFeats.prereqs: Zephyr Guard Dedication; trained in Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You have been trained to disarm foes.

baseFeats.name: Reloading Trick
baseFeats.benefits: You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

baseFeats.name: Remote Trigger
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to trigger snares from afar.

baseFeats.name: Resourceful Ritualist
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill.

baseFeats.name: Return Fire
baseFeats.benefits: Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire.

baseFeats.name: Revealing Stab

baseFeats.name: Rough Terrain Stance

baseFeats.name: Scholarly Defense
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of strange creatures and their bizarre anatomy allows you to anticipate their physical attacks and reduce the damage you take from them.

baseFeats.name: Scouring Rage

baseFeats.benefits: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

baseFeats.name: Scout's Speed

baseFeats.name: Scrollmaster Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in any Lore skill; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Scrolls
baseFeats.benefits: Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory.

baseFeats.name: Second Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You're used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle.

baseFeats.name: Selective Energy
baseFeats.benefits: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

baseFeats.name: Shatter Defenses
baseFeats.benefits: Your offense exploits your enemy’s fear. Make a melee Strike against a frightened creature.

baseFeats.name: Shield Warden
baseFeats.prereqs: [Champion] divine ally (shield); tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
baseFeats.benefits: You use your shield to protect your allies as well as yourself.

baseFeats.name: Shielded Tome
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse a shield into your favorite book, where it appears as an elaborate bookmark.

baseFeats.name: Shove Down
baseFeats.benefits: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

baseFeats.name: Simple Crystal Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You are capable of seeing magic as flowing runes and can scribe a personal rune that represents you.

baseFeats.name: Skirmish Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

baseFeats.name: Sky and Heaven Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky.

baseFeats.name: Slice and Swipe
baseFeats.benefits: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

baseFeats.name: Smite Evil
baseFeats.benefits: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

baseFeats.name: Smite Good
baseFeats.benefits: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

baseFeats.name: Snap Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters.

baseFeats.name: Song of Marching
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the song of marching composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.

baseFeats.name: Soul Arsenal
baseFeats.benefits: Choose an additional soulforged armament of a different type than the type you already chose, and choose one essence power for it.

baseFeats.name: Spell Penetration
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate magical resistance that certain powerful creatures have.

baseFeats.name: Spell Relay
baseFeats.benefits: You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range.

baseFeats.name: Spellmaster Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast focus spells; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells; Intelligence 14, Charisma 14, or Wisdom 14
baseFeats.benefits: As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic.

baseFeats.name: Spirits' Interference
baseFeats.benefits: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

baseFeats.name: Spiritual Sense
baseFeats.benefits: You have a vague connection to the Ethereal Plane that enables you to notice spirits.

baseFeats.name: Split Slot
baseFeats.benefits: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

baseFeats.name: Staff Sweep
baseFeats.benefits: You sweep your foes away with your staff.

baseFeats.name: Startling Appearance (Vigilante)

baseFeats.name: Steady Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You don’t lose spells easily.

baseFeats.name: Stella's Stab and Snag

baseFeats.name: Sticky Poison

baseFeats.name: Stone Blood
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood clots quickly.

baseFeats.name: Storm Retribution

baseFeats.benefits: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

baseFeats.name: Stumbling Feint
baseFeats.benefits: You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

baseFeats.name: Sun's Fury
baseFeats.benefits: The Old Sun Gods have granted you a gift in your fight against Walkena.

baseFeats.name: Surprise Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your sudden use of improvised weapons can take opponents off guard.

baseFeats.name: Swashbuckler's Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to riposte against ill-conceived attacks.

baseFeats.name: Swift Tracker
baseFeats.benefits: Your keen eyes catch signs of passage even when you’re moving.

baseFeats.name: Swordmaster Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Swords; Strength 14, Constitution 14, or Dexterity 14
baseFeats.benefits: Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair
baseFeats.benefits: Your hair deals increased damage and can grapple.

baseFeats.name: Tandem Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You and your eidolon each attack, seamlessly targeting the same foe without interfering with each other's movements.

baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Tempest-Sun Mages affiliation
baseFeats.benefits: If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots that damages other creatures, you can bend some of that spell’s offensive energy, protecting allies in the area and boosting your own defenses against certain foes.

baseFeats.name: Thorough Research
baseFeats.benefits: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you learn an additional fact about the subject.

baseFeats.name: Tiger Slash
baseFeats.benefits: You make a fierce swipe with both hands.

baseFeats.name: Triple Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

baseFeats.name: Twist the Knife
baseFeats.benefits: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

baseFeats.name: Unnerving Prowess
baseFeats.benefits: Make a free Demoralize check when you critically succeed with your dueling sword.

baseFeats.name: Urgent Upwelling
baseFeats.benefits: Defeat lets you to tap into your wellspring.

baseFeats.name: Uzunjati Storytelling
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Uzunjati affiliation; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
baseFeats.benefits: You tell a quick story or begin telling a longer tale.

baseFeats.name: Vacate Vision
baseFeats.benefits: You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty.

baseFeats.name: Vexing Tumble
baseFeats.benefits: You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions.

baseFeats.name: Viking Weapon Specialist
baseFeats.benefits: You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people.

baseFeats.name: Warding Rune
baseFeats.benefits: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic.

baseFeats.name: Watch Your Back
baseFeats.benefits: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

baseFeats.name: Water Step
baseFeats.benefits: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight.

baseFeats.name: Westyr's Wayfinder Repository

baseFeats.benefits: You can use your wayfinder to store a little extra magic for when you need it most.

baseFeats.name: Whirling Throw
baseFeats.benefits: You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance.

baseFeats.name: Witch's Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You forge a magical link with another creature, granting you awareness of that creature's condition and creating a conduit for spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Wolf Drag
baseFeats.benefits: You rip your enemy off their feet.

baseFeats.name: Advanced First Aid
baseFeats.benefits: Use First Aid to reduce frightened and sickened condition values.

baseFeats.name: Aerobatics Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: Improve your ability to Maneuver in Flight.

baseFeats.name: Battle Cry
baseFeats.benefits: Demoralizes foes when you roll for initiative.

baseFeats.name: Battle Prayer
baseFeats.prereqs: you follow a deity; master in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Calling out to your deity, you recite scripture to harm a foe

baseFeats.name: Biographical Eye
baseFeats.benefits: Intuit details about someone’s profession and residence.

baseFeats.name: Bizarre Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your magic becomes more difficult to identify.

baseFeats.name: Bless Tonic
baseFeats.prereqs: deity who grants heal divine font; master in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm

baseFeats.name: Bless Toxin
baseFeats.prereqs: deity who grants harm divine font; master in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets

baseFeats.name: Consult the Spirits

baseFeats.benefits: Learn about your environment from resident spirits.

baseFeats.name: Disturbing Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: Frighten foes with occult secrets.

baseFeats.name: Doublespeak
baseFeats.benefits: Pass a secret message to allies in your conversation.

baseFeats.name: Entourage
baseFeats.benefits: You have a small group of admirers who tend to follow you around while you’re in civilized settlements.

baseFeats.name: Environmental Grace

baseFeats.benefits: You rapidly adapt to environments through a combination of skill, meditation, and divine grace

baseFeats.name: Evangelize
baseFeats.prereqs: you follow a deity or philosophy; master in Diplomacy
baseFeats.benefits: You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener’s mind to whirl

baseFeats.name: Expeditious Search
baseFeats.benefits: Search areas in half the time.

baseFeats.name: Expert Disassembler
baseFeats.benefits: You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them.

baseFeats.name: Fabricated Connections
baseFeats.benefits: You can lie about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

baseFeats.name: Foil Senses
baseFeats.benefits: Take precautions against special senses.

baseFeats.name: Graceful Leaper
baseFeats.benefits: Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter.

baseFeats.name: Impeccable Crafter
baseFeats.benefits: Craft items more efficiently.

baseFeats.name: Influence Nature
baseFeats.benefits: Influence the behavior of certain animals in the area.

baseFeats.name: Inventor
baseFeats.benefits: Use Crafting to create item formulas.

baseFeats.name: Kip Up
baseFeats.benefits: Stand up for free without triggering reactions.

baseFeats.name: Numb to Death
baseFeats.prereqs: Diehard; you have died at least once
baseFeats.benefits: Your past has left you numb to death’s call

baseFeats.name: Paragon Battle Medicine
baseFeats.benefits: Kassi Aziril taught you her techniques that originated the modern use of Battle Medicine.

baseFeats.name: Party Crasher
baseFeats.benefits: You attend all the fashionable society parties, no matter how exclusive they might be.

baseFeats.name: Planar Survival
baseFeats.benefits: Use Survival to Subsist on different planes.

baseFeats.name: Prescient Consumable
baseFeats.benefits: Procure consumable items with Prescient Planner.

baseFeats.name: Quick Change
baseFeats.benefits: You can shift between your identities with ease.

baseFeats.name: Quick Climber
baseFeats.benefits: Climb swiftly.

baseFeats.benefits: Swim quickly.

baseFeats.name: Rapid Affixture
baseFeats.benefits: Afﬁx a Talisman in less time.

baseFeats.benefits: All communication is filled with slight tells and signals.

baseFeats.benefits: You call upon your deity to grant you their protective blessing

baseFeats.benefits: You imbue water with your deity’s blessing

baseFeats.benefits: You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

baseFeats.name: Shameless Request
baseFeats.benefits: Make Requests of others with lesser consequences.

baseFeats.benefits: Evade attempts to uncover your true nature.

baseFeats.benefits: Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies.

baseFeats.name: Supertaster

baseFeats.benefits: Jump off walls.

baseFeats.benefits: Stride across the surface of a body of water.

baseFeats.benefits: Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Deity's Domain
baseFeats.benefits: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Domain

baseFeats.name: Advanced School Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school.

baseFeats.benefits: You bring a weapon into metaphysical concordance with your deity’s beliefs.

baseFeats.name: Animal Rage

baseFeats.benefits: You can cast more arcane spells each day.

baseFeats.benefits: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot.

baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor.

baseFeats.name: Arrow Snatching
baseFeats.benefits: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source.

baseFeats.name: Attuned Stride
baseFeats.benefits: You can move freely through terrain you're attuned to.

baseFeats.name: Bleeding Finisher

baseFeats.benefits: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

baseFeats.name: Channeled Succor
baseFeats.benefits: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

baseFeats.benefits: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

baseFeats.name: Cremate Undead
baseFeats.benefits: Your positive energy sets undead alight.

baseFeats.name: Crossblooded Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

baseFeats.name: Crude Communication
baseFeats.benefits: Even if you don't speak a creature's language, you can rely on inflection, root words, and body language to infer rudimentary meaning.

baseFeats.name: Deadly Aim

baseFeats.name: Deadly Butterfly
baseFeats.benefits: You gain access to the butterfly sword's critical specialization effect.

baseFeats.benefits: You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body.

baseFeats.name: Deeper Dabbler
baseFeats.benefits: With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day.

baseFeats.name: Deimatic Display
baseFeats.benefits: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

baseFeats.name: Delay Trap

baseFeats.name: Disarming Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

baseFeats.name: Disorienting Opening
baseFeats.benefits: You use your foes' openings to expose even greater weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Diverse Recognition
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats.

baseFeats.name: Divine Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast more divine spells each day.

baseFeats.name: Dual Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You split your attacks.

baseFeats.name: Dualistic Synergy
baseFeats.benefits: If your next action is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots, you gain a benefit.

baseFeats.name: Dueling Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: You riposte against your flailing enemy.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Skill
baseFeats.benefits: Your broad experiences translate to a range of skills.

baseFeats.name: Efficient Rituals
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform some rituals in less time.

baseFeats.name: Emblazon Energy
baseFeats.benefits: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

baseFeats.name: Energy Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon has stronger resistance.

baseFeats.name: Enlarge Companion

baseFeats.benefits: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

baseFeats.name: Ferocious Shape

baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to recognize the telltale writings and other signs that indicate the presence of magical traps.

baseFeats.name: Great Boaster
baseFeats.benefits: Your bragging is particularly effective.

baseFeats.name: Greater Cruelty

baseFeats.name: Greater Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

baseFeats.name: Grievous Blow

baseFeats.benefits: Your performances inspire even greater deeds in your allies.

baseFeats.name: Inspired Stratagem
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly advise your ally, using your earlier planning to make sure luck can't throw a wrench in the cogs of your schemes.

baseFeats.name: Instinctive Strike
baseFeats.prereqs: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
baseFeats.benefits: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

baseFeats.name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You can invoke the Crimson Oath to unleash blasts of ruby energy from your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Ironblood Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow.

baseFeats.name: Know-It-All
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of the world expands beyond what you have read.

baseFeats.name: Lethargy Poisoner
baseFeats.prereqs: Drow Shootist Dedication; trained in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned more than the use of hand crossbows from drow lore.

baseFeats.name: Levering Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Strike your foe and make them unbalanced

baseFeats.name: Loaner Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

baseFeats.name: Lobbed Attack
baseFeats.benefits: Make an unexpected ranged attack with a Juggled item.

baseFeats.name: Lore Seeker
baseFeats.benefits: You see what others don’t, and you’ve developed magical tricks to find hidden truth.

baseFeats.name: Lorefinder
baseFeats.benefits: You know that fate sometimes conspires to keep dangerous knowledge or items from the eyes of those most able to understand them.

baseFeats.name: Magic Arrow
baseFeats.benefits: You imbue your ammunition with eldritch power.

baseFeats.name: Magic Finder
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned a few tricks to ensure you find every last magic item and interesting magical effect during your missions.

baseFeats.name: Magical Adept
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon gains more magic.

baseFeats.name: Makeshift Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

baseFeats.name: Mantis Form
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform yourself into a mantis battle form.

baseFeats.name: Many Guises
baseFeats.benefits: You can take on any number of mundane guises.

baseFeats.name: Martyr
baseFeats.benefits: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

baseFeats.name: Masked Casting
baseFeats.benefits: You harness the magical energy flowing through your eyeless mask to effortlessly protect you from visual effects.

baseFeats.name: Metabolize Element
baseFeats.benefits: Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy.

baseFeats.name: Miniaturize
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon can shrink even further.

baseFeats.name: Mixed Maneuver
baseFeats.benefits: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole.

baseFeats.name: Mobile Shot Stance
baseFeats.benefits: Your shots become nimble and deadly.

baseFeats.name: Monk Moves
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you’re not wearing armor.

baseFeats.name: Murksight
baseFeats.benefits: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow.

baseFeats.name: Mutable Familiar
baseFeats.benefits: Your familiar's supernatural spirit has outgrown its corporeal body.

baseFeats.name: Mysterious Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: Increase the spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

baseFeats.name: Necromantic Tenacity
baseFeats.benefits: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.

baseFeats.name: Nimble Roll
baseFeats.benefits: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

baseFeats.name: Occult Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more occult spells each day.

baseFeats.name: Ooze Empathy
baseFeats.prereqs: Oozemorph Dedication; at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype
baseFeats.benefits: You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level.

baseFeats.name: Opportune Backstab
baseFeats.benefits: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

baseFeats.name: Opportunistic Grapple
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt an Athletics check to Grapple your prey.

baseFeats.name: Order Training
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the lesser order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

baseFeats.name: Patron's Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast more spells each day.

baseFeats.name: Peer Beyond
baseFeats.benefits: You have uncanny insight into the way ghosts and haunts manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate.

baseFeats.name: Perpetual Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items.

baseFeats.name: Persistent Creation
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast creation as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time.

baseFeats.name: Physical Training
baseFeats.prereqs: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in Acrobatics and Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness.

baseFeats.name: Pinning Fire
baseFeats.benefits: You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

baseFeats.name: Pinpoint Poisoner
baseFeats.benefits: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons.

baseFeats.name: Positioning Assault
baseFeats.benefits: With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position.

baseFeats.name: Powerful Snares
baseFeats.benefits: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

baseFeats.name: Practiced Guidance
baseFeats.benefits: You can better Aid your crop.

baseFeats.name: Precious Arrow
baseFeats.benefits: You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
baseFeats.benefits: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

baseFeats.name: Primal Breadth
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast more primal spells per day.

baseFeats.name: Protect Ally
baseFeats.benefits: You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks.

baseFeats.name: Quick Block
baseFeats.benefits: You can block with your shield instinctively.

baseFeats.name: Quick Shield Block
baseFeats.benefits: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

baseFeats.name: Quick Stow (Swordmaster)
baseFeats.benefits: You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat.

baseFeats.name: Read Disaster
baseFeats.benefits: You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

baseFeats.name: Recognize Threat
baseFeats.prereqs: master in a Recall Knowledge skill; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team.

baseFeats.name: Reflexive Grip
baseFeats.benefits: You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out.

baseFeats.name: Renewed Vigor
baseFeats.benefits: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

baseFeats.name: Resounding Bravery
baseFeats.benefits: Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

baseFeats.name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
baseFeats.benefits: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

baseFeats.name: Rippling Spin
baseFeats.benefits: After the triggering attack is done, Step.

baseFeats.name: Rule of Three
baseFeats.benefits: Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt.

baseFeats.name: Runic Impression
baseFeats.benefits: You can temporarily replicate the effects of a property rune for your weapon or unarmed attacks.

baseFeats.name: Sacrifice Armor
baseFeats.benefits: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

baseFeats.name: Safeguarded Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body.

baseFeats.name: Scarecrow
baseFeats.benefits: You fight fiercely to protect your crop.

baseFeats.name: Second Ally
baseFeats.benefits: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

baseFeats.name: Selfless Parry
baseFeats.benefits: You protect those near you with a flash of steel.

baseFeats.name: Sense Chaos
baseFeats.benefits: You sense chaos as an unsettling feeling of nervous energy.

baseFeats.name: Sense Evil
baseFeats.benefits: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

baseFeats.name: Sense Good
baseFeats.benefits: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You attach a piece of your shadow to a spell to cloud the senses and cause mischief.

baseFeats.name: Shadowdancer Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in Performance and master in Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: You dedicate yourself to the shadows.

baseFeats.name: Share Rage
baseFeats.benefits: You stoke an ally’s fury.

baseFeats.name: Shoving Sweep
baseFeats.benefits: You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back.

baseFeats.name: Sidestep
baseFeats.benefits: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue to the creature next to you.

baseFeats.name: Sin Reservoir
baseFeats.benefits: During daily preparations, you can indulge in your associated sin.

baseFeats.name: Sixth Pillar Dedication
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast spells; Dexterity 14; expert in Acrobatics
baseFeats.benefits: You use your physical discipline to channel your magic.

baseFeats.name: Skill Mastery (Investigator)
baseFeats.prereqs: Investigator Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert.

baseFeats.name: Skill Mastery (Rogue)
baseFeats.prereqs: Rogue Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master.

baseFeats.name: Skim Scroll
baseFeats.benefits: You can activate the magic of a scroll with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt.

baseFeats.name: Skyseeker
baseFeats.benefits: You Leap toward an opponent.

baseFeats.name: Sly Striker
baseFeats.benefits: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t flat-footed.

baseFeats.name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in Medicine
baseFeats.benefits: Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses.

baseFeats.name: Soaring Shape
baseFeats.benefits: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

baseFeats.name: Soulsight
baseFeats.prereqs: [Sorcerer] bloodline that grants divine or occult spells
baseFeats.benefits: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

baseFeats.name: Spell Swipe
baseFeats.benefits: You attack in an arc and enact your spell against everyone you hit.

baseFeats.name: Standby Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You've honed one spell as your favored combat technique, and you've practiced it enough that you no longer need to prepare it to cast it.

baseFeats.name: Sticky Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: You mix in an additive to make your bomb’s contents adhere to the target and continue to deal damage.

baseFeats.name: Stunning Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt a dizzying blow.

baseFeats.name: Subtle Shank
baseFeats.benefits: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

baseFeats.name: Sudden Leap
baseFeats.benefits: You swing at a foe while mid-leap.

baseFeats.name: Surging Focus
baseFeats.benefits: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your fight or flight response triggers a surge in your deity's might within you.

baseFeats.name: Surreptitious Spellcaster
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed.

baseFeats.name: Survivor of Desolation
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against unnatural weather events or environmental hazards occurring in blighted or otherwise unnaturally marred regions.

baseFeats.name: Swashbuckler's Speed
baseFeats.benefits: You move faster, with or without panache.

baseFeats.name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks
baseFeats.benefits: Your hair attacks gain the reach trait and you can deliver hexes through it.

baseFeats.name: Tactical Entry
baseFeats.benefits: Stride without triggering reactions

baseFeats.name: Tangled Forest Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes’ movements.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Master
baseFeats.benefits: You adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

baseFeats.name: Thrash
baseFeats.benefits: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

baseFeats.name: To Battle!
baseFeats.benefits: With a resounding cry, you rally your ally to the offensive.

baseFeats.name: Transcribe Moment
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the transcribe moment focus spell.

baseFeats.name: Tumbling Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the Reflex DC of an enemy adjacent to you.

baseFeats.name: Unfazed Assessment
baseFeats.prereqs: Zephyr Guard Dedication; expert in Perception
baseFeats.benefits: You have witnessed hundreds of fighting styles and quickly adapt to defend against complicated maneuvers.

baseFeats.name: Universal Versatility
baseFeats.prereqs: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
baseFeats.benefits: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

baseFeats.name: Unravel Mysteries
baseFeats.prereqs: master in a Decipher Writing skill; Scrollmaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren’t discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things.

baseFeats.name: Unshakable Idealism
baseFeats.prereqs: Knight Vigilant; expert in Will saves
baseFeats.benefits: Your faith and hope can’t be shaken, and you won’t flee when lives are at stake.

baseFeats.name: Vivacious Bravado
baseFeats.benefits: Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain.

baseFeats.name: Walk the Plank
baseFeats.benefits: You frighten a foe into moving where you want them, traditionally demanding they walk the plank.

baseFeats.name: Wall Run
baseFeats.benefits: You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground.

baseFeats.name: Warden's Boon
baseFeats.benefits: By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.

baseFeats.name: Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator
baseFeats.prereqs: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at using the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to aid in any deceptions you might employ.

baseFeats.name: Whodunnit?
baseFeats.benefits: You carefully consider your case and narrow down some of the details.

baseFeats.name: Wild Winds Initiate
baseFeats.benefits: You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance.

baseFeats.name: Wind Caller
baseFeats.benefits: You bid the winds to lift and carry you through the air.

baseFeats.name: Witch's Bottle
baseFeats.benefits: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

baseFeats.name: Work Yourself Up
baseFeats.benefits: You concentrate on your mental state, tapping into that raw emotional energy.

baseFeats.name: Aboleth Transmutation
baseFeats.benefits: You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters to mold the flesh of your ancestors.

baseFeats.name: Absorb Toxin
baseFeats.prereqs: You are not immune to diseases or poisons
baseFeats.benefits: Your skin readily absorbs poison and can consciously draw toxins into your body to spare others.

baseFeats.name: Accursed Claws
baseFeats.benefits: Your claws carry your mother's hag magic.

baseFeats.name: Agathion Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The harmonious magic of Nirvana flows through you.

baseFeats.name: Aggravating Scratch
baseFeats.benefits: Your claws carry an irritant that is harmless to you but can be damaging to others.

baseFeats.name: Analyze Information
baseFeats.benefits: You can stoke your mind into a burst of analytical prowess.

baseFeats.name: Anarchic Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: The magic in your blood is unpredictable.

baseFeats.name: Ancillary Motes
baseFeats.benefits: You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.

baseFeats.name: Angelic Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You can tap into the magic of angels that runs through your blood.

baseFeats.name: Animal Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world.

baseFeats.name: Archon Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You can tap into the heavenly magic that is your birthright.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Purification
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast purify food and drink as a primal innate spell, but only on liquids.

baseFeats.name: Azata Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection.

baseFeats.name: Bark and Tendril
baseFeats.benefits: You wield primal magic.

baseFeats.name: Battleforger
baseFeats.benefits: You can sharpen weapons, polish armor, and apply special techniques to temporarily gain better effects from your armaments.

baseFeats.name: Between the Scales
baseFeats.benefits: Underestimating you is a grave mistake, but it's one others keep making.

baseFeats.name: Big Mouth
baseFeats.benefits: Your cheek pouches are especially stretchy.

baseFeats.name: Bloodletting Fangs
baseFeats.benefits: You emulate your vampiric parent's techniques for drawing blood from a victim.

baseFeats.name: Bone Caller
baseFeats.benefits: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts.

baseFeats.name: Breath Like Honey
baseFeats.benefits: You smell of honey and savory things.

baseFeats.name: Briar Battler
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage.

baseFeats.name: Brightness Seeker
baseFeats.benefits: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast augury as an innate divine spell.

baseFeats.name: Call of Elysium
baseFeats.benefits: The wild wonder of Elysium harmonizes within you, and in dire straits, you can share its benefits with your allies.

baseFeats.name: Cantorian Rejuvenation
baseFeats.benefits: The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you.

baseFeats.name: Captivating Curiosity
baseFeats.benefits: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance.

baseFeats.name: Catrina's Presence
baseFeats.benefits: You've adopted the calming presence of catrinas, the festive dead..

baseFeats.name: Cautious Curiosity
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned a few magical techniques for getting yourself both into and out of trouble unnoticed.

baseFeats.name: Cave Climber
baseFeats.benefits: After years of crawling and climbing through caverns, you can climb easily anywhere you go.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Wings
baseFeats.benefits: With effort, you can call forth magical wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your celestial forebears.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Aeon's Guidance
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Aeon's Shield
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Fortification
baseFeats.benefits: Your exoskeleton arranges itself into an optimal defensive shape.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand
baseFeats.benefits: Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent.

baseFeats.name: Charred Remains
baseFeats.benefits: Your next fire spell leaves embers in its wake.

baseFeats.name: Cling
baseFeats.benefits: You hang onto a foe to harry them into submission.

baseFeats.name: Close Quarters
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained to fight with allies in tunnel warrens, dense undergrowth, or similarly cramped terrain.

baseFeats.name: Coating of Slime
baseFeats.benefits: An acidic ooze coats your limbs.

baseFeats.name: Constant Gaze
baseFeats.benefits: Your eyes keep a continual watch for dangers from all sides.

baseFeats.name: Cooperative Soul
baseFeats.benefits: You have developed a soul-deep bond with your comrades and maintain an even greater degree of cooperation with them.

baseFeats.name: Crystalline Cloud
baseFeats.benefits: When you use Crystalline Dust, you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a 10-foot-radius cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait.

baseFeats.name: Cunning Climber
baseFeats.benefits: Whether you are climbing a ship’s rigging, a jungle tree, or a clock tower, you have an uncanny knack for finding footholds and handholds where larger creatures can’t.

baseFeats.name: Daemon Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power.

baseFeats.name: Dance Underfoot
baseFeats.benefits: You dart under the legs of your enemies in combat.

baseFeats.name: Dangle
baseFeats.benefits: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing.

baseFeats.name: Death's Drums
baseFeats.benefits: Your life has been spent challenging death itself, and proximity to that implacable foe only makes your heart beat harder.

baseFeats.name: Defensive Instincts
baseFeats.benefits: Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack.

baseFeats.name: Demon Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects.

baseFeats.name: Devil Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception.

baseFeats.name: Dig Up Secrets
baseFeats.benefits: You are an endless well of knowledge and can remember several vital pieces of information at once.

baseFeats.name: Disorienting Venom
baseFeats.benefits: The venom injected by your fangs disorients your foes.

baseFeats.name: Divine Countermeasures
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied your celestial heritage with the intent of better defending yourself, and you've found that your techniques are equally powerful against celestials, fiends, and other divine entities.

baseFeats.name: Djinni Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of djinn runs through your blood.

baseFeats.name: Dracomancer
baseFeats.benefits: Your inborn arcane power manifests as your exemplar's most time-honored spells.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Grip
baseFeats.benefits: Your hold has a unique draconic connection.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Prince
baseFeats.benefits: The blood of the Dragon Kings runs strong in your veins.

baseFeats.name: Dragonblood Paragon
baseFeats.prereqs: Strongjaw Kobold heritage, Dracomancer, Kobold Breath, or Venomtail Kobold heritage
baseFeats.benefits: Your draconic anatomy becomes especially pronounced.

baseFeats.name: Dragon's Breath
baseFeats.benefits: You can put more effort into your Kobold Breath to channel greater draconic power, though it takes more out of you.

baseFeats.name: Duskwalker Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to psychopomps gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath.

baseFeats.name: Earthsense
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble.
