baseFeats.name: Echoes in Stone
baseFeats.benefits: You pause a moment to attune your senses to the stone around you.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Sword Training
baseFeats.benefits: You were always taught that you needed to be able to use whatever weapon came your way.

baseFeats.name: Eerie Compression
baseFeats.benefits: Your limbs and even your torso can collapse in on themselves, allowing you to fit through tight spaces as though you were a Small creature.

baseFeats.name: Efreeti Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of your efreeti ancestors flows through you.

baseFeats.name: Elf Step
baseFeats.benefits: You move in a graceful dance, and even your steps are broad.

baseFeats.name: Energize Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms.

baseFeats.name: Energy Blessed
baseFeats.benefits: Energy runs through your blood more powerfully.

baseFeats.name: Evade Doom
baseFeats.benefits: You can elude supernatural disaster.

baseFeats.name: Expert Longevity
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve continued to refine the knowledge and skills you’ve gained through your life.

baseFeats.name: Fade Away
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects.

baseFeats.name: Fell Rider
baseFeats.benefits: You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying, unified juggernaut on the battlefield.

baseFeats.name: Ferocious Gust
baseFeats.benefits: With heavy wing beats, you whip up a furious gust and direct it at your opponents.

baseFeats.name: Fey Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You can use faerie magic to hide yourself and expose hidden foes.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors.

baseFeats.name: First World Adept
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one primal innate spell
baseFeats.benefits: Over time your fey magic has grown stronger.

baseFeats.name: Fortuitous Shift
baseFeats.benefits: You have grown more comfortable with your penchant for supernatural disappearance.

baseFeats.name: Fox Trick
baseFeats.benefits: You always have time for a joke or prank.

baseFeats.name: Freeze It!
baseFeats.benefits: You are no rime hag or Jadwiga, but the magic of the north has still left a mark on you.

baseFeats.name: Garuda Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess.

baseFeats.name: Glory and Valor!
baseFeats.benefits: You are descended from the einherji, the worthy warriors of chaos.

baseFeats.name: Grandmother's Wisdom
baseFeats.benefits: You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel.

baseFeats.name: Gripping Limbs
baseFeats.benefits: Nodules, hooks, or claws on your limbs allow you to cling to surfaces with ease.

baseFeats.name: Group Aid
baseFeats.benefits: Your upbringing emphasized teamwork and helping your allies comes naturally to you.

baseFeats.name: Guiding Luck
baseFeats.benefits: Your luck guides you to look the right way and aim your blows unerringly.

baseFeats.name: Hardy Traveler
baseFeats.benefits: There's no journey too far or burden too heavy when your friends are at your side.

baseFeats.name: Hefting Shadow
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow can contain objects.

baseFeats.name: Heir of the Saoc
baseFeats.benefits: In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren.

baseFeats.name: Helpful Halfling
baseFeats.benefits: When you aid a friend with a task, you find many ways to help and avoid interfering.

baseFeats.name: Heroes' Call
baseFeats.benefits: The songs of ancient heroes echo through your mind and quicken your pulse, especially in dire straits.

baseFeats.name: Hungry Goblin
baseFeats.benefits: You’ll eat anything and anyone.

baseFeats.name: Improvisational Warrior
baseFeats.benefits: You have increased skill with improvised weapons.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Improvisation
baseFeats.benefits: A stroke of brilliance gives you a major advantage with a skill despite your inexperience.

baseFeats.name: Inner Breath
baseFeats.benefits: Your body is capable of recycling its own air.

baseFeats.name: Internal Respirator
baseFeats.benefits: Your body can internally synthesize oxygen for limited periods of time.

baseFeats.name: Invoke the Elements
baseFeats.prereqs: Brine May, Snow May, Veil May, or Virga May
baseFeats.benefits: You summon an aura of shimmering heat, flurrying snow, crashing waves, or swirling wind and lightning.

baseFeats.name: Irrepressible
baseFeats.benefits: You are easily able to ward off attempts to play on your fears and emotions.

baseFeats.name: Janni Hospitality
baseFeats.benefits: You can use magic to show others desert hospitality.

baseFeats.name: Janni Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of jann runs through your blood.

baseFeats.name: Juvenile Flight
baseFeats.benefits: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.

baseFeats.name: Kneel for No God
baseFeats.benefits: Your ancestors’ defiance of magic and your people’s strictly egalitarian mindset mean that certain forms of magic have little effect on you.

baseFeats.name: Larcenous Tail
baseFeats.benefits: Your tail's chaotic and independent nature causes it to perform mischief even when you don't intend it, and it can somehow steal things it shouldn't be able to handle.

baseFeats.name: Laughing Gnoll
baseFeats.benefits: A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat.

baseFeats.name: Life Leap
baseFeats.benefits: You phase through a space that a living creature occupies in a flash, spontaneously appearing on the opposite side of it in a vibrant display of colorful light.

baseFeats.name: Light from Darkness
baseFeats.benefits: You've battled the fiendish power within your nature and come out on top; whatever you decide to do with your life, for good or evil, will be your choice and your choice alone.

baseFeats.name: Lucky Keepsake
baseFeats.benefits: You have a keepsake that grants you luck.

baseFeats.name: Marid Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You channel the magic of marids.

baseFeats.name: Mask of Pain
baseFeats.benefits: Your mask has grown into a manifestation of your pain, which you can release.

baseFeats.name: Morrigna's Spider Affinity
baseFeats.benefits: Much like morrignas, you feel an affinity for spiders.

baseFeats.name: Mother's Mindfulness
baseFeats.benefits: You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place.

baseFeats.name: Mountain's Stoutness
baseFeats.benefits: Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most before going down.

baseFeats.name: Multitalented
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to split your focus between multiple classes with ease.

baseFeats.name: Night Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood.

baseFeats.name: No Evidence
baseFeats.benefits: You leave little sign when attempting to remain unseen.

baseFeats.name: Occult Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: Your study of occult practices has shown you how to best defend against them.

baseFeats.name: Offensive Subroutine
baseFeats.benefits: Nanites augment your attacks.

baseFeats.name: Otherworldly Acumen
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one innate spell gained from an elf ancestry feat
baseFeats.benefits: The arcane magic you possess grows in power and complexity.

baseFeats.name: Overcrowd
baseFeats.benefits: Your physiology is slight, and you can pack into small spaces with others of similar stature.

baseFeats.name: Pack Tactics
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered how to hunt with your pack.

baseFeats.name: Peri Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips.

baseFeats.name: Pervasive Superstition
baseFeats.benefits: You steep yourself in superstition and practice ancient orc mental exercises for shrugging off the effects of magic.

baseFeats.name: Piercing Quills
baseFeats.benefits: Your quills can dig particularly deep into the flesh of your opponents.

baseFeats.name: Pinch Time
baseFeats.benefits: One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between.

baseFeats.name: Predator's Growl
baseFeats.benefits: You give a throaty growl to attempt to Demoralize a creature you just found.

baseFeats.name: Preemptive Reconfiguration
baseFeats.benefits: Your body anticipates the blow.

baseFeats.name: Pride in Arms
baseFeats.benefits: With a shout of triumph, you grant inspiration to an ally fight on.

baseFeats.name: Qlippoth Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes.

baseFeats.name: Quill Spray
baseFeats.prereqs: Quillcoat Shisk heritage or quill unarmed attack
baseFeats.benefits: You can launch a mass of quills at opponents.

baseFeats.name: Rakshasa Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You remember the secrets of your rakshasa forebears and know how to apply those memories to get results.

baseFeats.name: Rat Form
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces.

baseFeats.name: Read the Stars
baseFeats.prereqs: trained in Astrology Lore or Occultism
baseFeats.benefits: You're incredibly skilled in iruxi astrology, and you can gain useful (if cryptic) hints from the stars' alignment.

baseFeats.name: Repair Module
baseFeats.benefits: You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds.

baseFeats.name: Replenishing Hydration
baseFeats.benefits: You draw life from the water around you.

baseFeats.name: Returning Throw
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered the technique of arcing a projectile so that it returns to your hand after being thrown, though this requires a moment to precisely calculate the trajectory and possible ricochets.

baseFeats.name: Ricocheting Leap
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes.

baseFeats.name: Riptide
baseFeats.benefits: Drag a grabbed creature into nearby water

baseFeats.name: Rokoan Arts
baseFeats.benefits: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa.

baseFeats.name: Roll with It
baseFeats.benefits: When you take a big hit, your foe bounces you around like a rubber ball, but you escape the worst of the blow.

baseFeats.name: Scalding Spit
baseFeats.benefits: Your bodily fluids burn with surprising volatility, as if you ran on oil instead of blood.

baseFeats.name: Scorching Disarm
baseFeats.benefits: You make a weapon unbearable to hold.

baseFeats.name: Sculpt Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: You coax nearby shadows into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, using a tiny piece of your shadow to make it solid; in doing so, you lose 1 Hit Point.

baseFeats.name: Sense for Trouble
baseFeats.benefits: You can tell when something's off.

baseFeats.name: Sense Thoughts
baseFeats.benefits: You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Sight
baseFeats.benefits: You draw on your connection with the Shadow Plane to see through all but the deepest darkness.

baseFeats.name: Shaitan Magic
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of shaitans runs through your blood.

baseFeats.name: Shared Luck (Catfolk)
baseFeats.benefits: Other creatures can benefit from your luck

baseFeats.name: Shory Aeromancer
baseFeats.prereqs: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity
baseFeats.benefits: Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you.

baseFeats.name: Silent Step
baseFeats.benefits: You vanish with silent treads.

baseFeats.name: Skittering Scuttle
baseFeats.benefits: You can scuttle farther and faster when maneuvering alongside allies.

baseFeats.name: Slip into Shadow
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast at least one spell with the darkness trait
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow magic bleeds into the space around you.

baseFeats.name: Slip the Grasp
baseFeats.benefits: You have some feature that allows you to quickly evade effects that restrain you.

baseFeats.name: Snare Commando
baseFeats.prereqs: Snare Crafting; expert in Deception or Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight.

baseFeats.name: Soaring Flight
baseFeats.benefits: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below.

baseFeats.name: Sodbuster
baseFeats.benefits: Years toiling in soil have made you an expert digger.

baseFeats.name: Solar Rejuvenation
baseFeats.benefits: If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level.

baseFeats.name: Spirit Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the Boneyard empowers you to bring death to all forms of life and unlife, exploiting their weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Spore Cloud
baseFeats.benefits: You unleash a cloud of pollen or similar spores.

baseFeats.name: Squad Tactics
baseFeats.benefits: You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe.

baseFeats.name: Stone Bones
baseFeats.benefits: Your intractable nature can help you shrug off even the most grievous injuries.

baseFeats.name: Stonewalker
baseFeats.benefits: You have a deep reverence for and connection to stone.

baseFeats.name: Strand Strider
baseFeats.benefits: Your eight legs serve you well when climbing walls and webs alike.

baseFeats.name: Strong Swimmer
baseFeats.benefits: Your swim Speed increases to match your land Speed.

baseFeats.name: Studious Adept
baseFeats.benefits: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Advantage
baseFeats.benefits: You can take advantage of the terrain to bypass foes’ defenses.

baseFeats.name: Tetraelemental Assault
baseFeats.benefits: Your Elemental Assault cycles through all four elements.

baseFeats.name: Thorned Seedpod
baseFeats.benefits: When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines.

baseFeats.name: Tongue Tether
baseFeats.benefits: Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands.

baseFeats.name: Tree Climber (Elf)
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent much of your life among the treetops and have become an expert at quickly and safely climbing them.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Cheeks
baseFeats.benefits: You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time.

baseFeats.name: Undying Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: You resist death's clutches with supernatural vigor.

baseFeats.name: Unhampered Passage
baseFeats.benefits: You won't allow others to restrain you.

baseFeats.name: Velstrac Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place.

baseFeats.name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
baseFeats.benefits: Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin.

baseFeats.name: Vivacious Conduit
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the First World has grown, and its positive energy flows into you rapidly.

baseFeats.name: Wary Skulker
baseFeats.benefits: Ever alert, you scout for danger even when you are trying to stay hidden.

baseFeats.name: Water Dancer
baseFeats.benefits: You glide through the water with graceful ease.

baseFeats.name: Water Strider
baseFeats.benefits: Water cradles your every step, allowing you to walk on its surface.

baseFeats.name: Web Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: Through the careful cultivation of highly sensitive hairs, you've developed the ability to sense creatures without seeing them.

baseFeats.name: Well-Groomed
baseFeats.benefits: You are fastidious about keeping yourself clean

baseFeats.name: Wind God's Fan
baseFeats.benefits: Your fan can stir up even more powerful winds.

baseFeats.name: Wing Step
baseFeats.benefits: With a sharp flap of your wings, you stay light on your feet as you move.

baseFeats.name: Wings of Air
baseFeats.benefits: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back.

baseFeats.name: Accursed Clay Fist
baseFeats.prereqs: Golem Grafter Dedication; expert in unarmed attacks
baseFeats.benefits: You have replaced one of your forearms with one made of clay and infused with cursed arcane magic.

baseFeats.name: Agile Grace
baseFeats.benefits: Your graceful moves with agile weapons are beyond compare.

baseFeats.name: Ancestral Mage
baseFeats.benefits: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same.

baseFeats.name: Angel of Death
baseFeats.benefits: All your Strikes against a creature you have Marked for Death have the death trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

baseFeats.name: Annotate Composition
baseFeats.benefits: By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

baseFeats.name: Armor Rune Shifter
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the secrets of armor runes by viewing them through gems and can alter them at your discretion.

baseFeats.name: Armored Rest
baseFeats.prereqs: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
baseFeats.benefits: You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it.

baseFeats.name: Assured Ritualist
baseFeats.benefits: You can cover for a secondary caster's error.

baseFeats.name: Attunement to Stone
baseFeats.benefits: You can feel vibrations through the ground.

baseFeats.name: Beastmaster Bond
baseFeats.benefits: You can communicate telepathically with your animal companions within 100 feet.

baseFeats.name: Beneath Notice
baseFeats.prereqs: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Deception
baseFeats.benefits: You are skilled at hiding from your foes and targets among the common populace.

baseFeats.name: Bestiary Scholar
baseFeats.prereqs: Scrollmaster Dedication; master in Arcana, Crafting, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You learn how to apply your extensive knowledge of certain creatures using the lore you know.

baseFeats.name: Blazing Streak
baseFeats.benefits: Stride twice, making Strikes against up to four different creatures within reach at any point during your movement.

baseFeats.name: Buckler Dance
baseFeats.benefits: You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack.

baseFeats.name: Burrowing Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon can burrow through loose dirt.

baseFeats.name: Camouflage
baseFeats.benefits: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

baseFeats.name: Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
baseFeats.benefits: Your Cascade Bearer training allows you to broaden the horizons of your halcyon spells further than most Magaambyans, weaving in spiritual magic.

baseFeats.name: Cascading Ray
baseFeats.benefits: Magical energy spills out to extend beyond the creature you struck.

baseFeats.name: Castigating Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the wicked.

baseFeats.name: Cautious Delver
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied the many ways that ancient architects and spellcasters protected their possessions, such as by implementing deadly traps and curses, and learned some magic to counteract them.

baseFeats.name: Certain Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Even when you don’t hit squarely, you can still score a glancing blow.

baseFeats.name: Cobra Envenom
baseFeats.prereqs: Cobra Stance; expert in unarmed attacks
baseFeats.benefits: You lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe.

baseFeats.name: Combat Reflexes
baseFeats.benefits: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings.

baseFeats.name: Come and Get Me
baseFeats.benefits: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

baseFeats.name: Command Attention
baseFeats.benefits: You command the attention of all around you with style, ensuring their gaze falls only upon you until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Communal Tale
baseFeats.benefits: Stories are an experience meant to be shared as a group.

baseFeats.name: Courageous Assault
baseFeats.benefits: With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack.

baseFeats.name: Cut from the Air
baseFeats.benefits: You can knock aside ranged attacks.

baseFeats.name: Daring Flourish
baseFeats.benefits: You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts.

baseFeats.name: Dazzling Block
baseFeats.prereqs: Arcane Cascade, sparkling targe hybrid study
baseFeats.benefits: When you use Shield Block, you can create a flash of brilliant, multicolored light in a 15-foot cone.

baseFeats.name: Debilitating Shot
baseFeats.benefits: Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

baseFeats.name: Demanding Challenge
baseFeats.benefits: If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Deny Support
baseFeats.benefits: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

baseFeats.name: Deny the Songs of War
baseFeats.benefits: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it.

baseFeats.name: Derring-Do
baseFeats.benefits: When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

baseFeats.name: Destructive Block
baseFeats.benefits: You can protect yourself more effectively, at the expense of your shield.

baseFeats.name: Determined Dash
baseFeats.benefits: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

baseFeats.name: Devoted Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

baseFeats.name: Dimensional Disappearance
baseFeats.prereqs: dimensional assault focus spell, laughing shadow hybrid study
baseFeats.benefits: You take advantage of teleportation to better hide your position.

baseFeats.name: Disarming Twist
baseFeats.benefits: After your initial attack redirects your foe’s defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

baseFeats.name: Disruptive Stance
baseFeats.benefits: The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you’re prepared to foil enemies’ actions.

baseFeats.name: Draw from the Land
baseFeats.benefits: You pull strength from the surrounding terrain.

baseFeats.name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
baseFeats.benefits: You attack as you dash among foes.

baseFeats.name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
baseFeats.benefits: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Eidetic Memorization
baseFeats.benefits: Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time.

baseFeats.name: Elastic Mutagen
baseFeats.benefits: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

baseFeats.name: Eldritch Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

baseFeats.name: Elemental Shape
baseFeats.benefits: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.

baseFeats.name: Elucidating Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

baseFeats.name: Emerald Boughs Hideaway
baseFeats.prereqs: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation
baseFeats.benefits: You use Emerald Bough techniques to create a small extradimensional space called a hideaway that lasts as long as you are conscious.

baseFeats.name: Endure Death's Touch
baseFeats.prereqs: Knight Vigilant; expert in medium or heavy armor
baseFeats.benefits: Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away.

baseFeats.name: Energy Fusion
baseFeats.benefits: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

baseFeats.name: Energy Ward
baseFeats.benefits: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

baseFeats.name: Entwined Energy Ki
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities.

baseFeats.name: Everyone Duck!
baseFeats.benefits: You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap’s effects.

baseFeats.name: Expanded Splash
baseFeats.benefits: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

baseFeats.name: Fading
baseFeats.benefits: You fade partially from reality.

baseFeats.name: Fearsome Brute
baseFeats.benefits: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

baseFeats.name: Font of Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics.

baseFeats.name: Furious Sprint
baseFeats.benefits: You rush forward.

baseFeats.name: Fused Polearm
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse your arcane bonded weapon and a magical staff together into one item, with the staff making up the haft of the weapon.

baseFeats.name: Gaze of Veracity
baseFeats.prereqs: Hellknight Signifer Dedication; ability to cast focus spells
baseFeats.benefits: You can channel your mask’s power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation.

baseFeats.name: Giant Snare
baseFeats.benefits: You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares.

baseFeats.name: Great Cleave
baseFeats.benefits: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

baseFeats.name: Greater Bloodline
baseFeats.benefits: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

baseFeats.name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

baseFeats.name: Greater Magical Edification
baseFeats.benefits: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge.

baseFeats.name: Greater Magical Scholastics
baseFeats.benefits: You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

baseFeats.name: Greater Spell Runes
baseFeats.benefits: You gain more powerful spell runes.

baseFeats.name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases.

baseFeats.name: Harden Flesh
baseFeats.benefits: You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone.

baseFeats.name: Harrying Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies.

baseFeats.name: Healing Transformation
baseFeats.benefits: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

baseFeats.name: Heroic Recovery
baseFeats.benefits: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

baseFeats.name: House of Imaginary Walls
baseFeats.benefits: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

baseFeats.name: Hunter's Vision
baseFeats.benefits: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

baseFeats.name: Imposing Destrier
baseFeats.benefits: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

baseFeats.name: Impressive Landing
baseFeats.benefits: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

baseFeats.name: Improved Command Undead
baseFeats.prereqs: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
baseFeats.benefits: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

baseFeats.name: Improved Knockdown
baseFeats.benefits: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
baseFeats.benefits: Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars.

baseFeats.name: Just One More Thing
baseFeats.benefits: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

baseFeats.name: Knockback
baseFeats.benefits: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

baseFeats.name: Knockback Strike
baseFeats.benefits: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

baseFeats.name: Know it All
baseFeats.benefits: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled.

baseFeats.name: Lastwall Warden
baseFeats.benefits: Use your shield to protect your allies.

baseFeats.name: Litany Against Sloth
baseFeats.benefits: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

baseFeats.name: Litany of Self-Interest
baseFeats.benefits: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

baseFeats.name: Lunging Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: Your spell unwinds the structure of your staff to make it exceptionally long, or even separate it into shards held together by magical power.

baseFeats.name: Magical Adaptation
baseFeats.benefits: When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it.

baseFeats.name: Major Lesson
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

baseFeats.name: Martial Exercise
baseFeats.benefits: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords.

baseFeats.name: Master Monster Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

baseFeats.name: Masterful Obfuscation
baseFeats.prereqs: master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Scrollmaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study.

baseFeats.name: Menacing Prowess
baseFeats.prereqs: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Intimidation
baseFeats.benefits: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty.

baseFeats.name: Merciful Elixir
baseFeats.benefits: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

baseFeats.name: Merciless Rend
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon rends its foes.

baseFeats.name: Meteoric Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: A trail of energy flows from your target back to you.

baseFeats.name: Methodical Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages.

baseFeats.name: Mighty Bulwark
baseFeats.benefits: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers.

baseFeats.name: Mirror Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent.

baseFeats.name: Monk's Flurry
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the Flurry of Blows action.

baseFeats.name: Ode to Ouroboros
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell, which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

baseFeats.name: Ongoing Strategy
baseFeats.benefits: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

baseFeats.name: Oracular Warning
baseFeats.benefits: You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes.

baseFeats.name: Overpowering Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You trample your foes as you charge past them.

baseFeats.name: Overwhelming Energy
baseFeats.benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

baseFeats.name: Peafowl Strut
baseFeats.benefits: You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace.

baseFeats.name: Penetrating Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

baseFeats.name: Plant Shape
baseFeats.benefits: You can take the form of a plant creature.

baseFeats.name: Potent Poisoner
baseFeats.benefits: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

baseFeats.name: Practiced Defender
baseFeats.benefits: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised.

baseFeats.name: Precise Debilitation
baseFeats.benefits: You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations.

baseFeats.name: Prevailing Position
baseFeats.benefits: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

baseFeats.name: Pristine Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

baseFeats.name: Protective Bond
baseFeats.benefits: The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm.

baseFeats.name: Provocator Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: For you, fighting is as much about style as skill.

baseFeats.name: Pushing Attack
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies.

baseFeats.name: Quicken Heartbeat
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine.

baseFeats.name: Quickened Casting
baseFeats.benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Blade Spirit
baseFeats.benefits: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

baseFeats.name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
baseFeats.benefits: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic.

baseFeats.name: Rapid Recharge
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into an arcane trick to recover your ability to meld spells and attacks.

baseFeats.name: Recover Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates.

baseFeats.name: Reflexive Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: You can riposte almost without a thought.

baseFeats.name: Replenishment of War
baseFeats.prereqs: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

baseFeats.name: Resilient Touch
baseFeats.benefits: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

baseFeats.name: Resounding Blow
baseFeats.benefits: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

baseFeats.name: Rockslide Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground.

baseFeats.name: Rope Mastery
baseFeats.prereqs: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Athletics
baseFeats.benefits: Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways.

baseFeats.name: Rubbery Skin
baseFeats.benefits: Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality.

baseFeats.name: Saving Slash
baseFeats.benefits: Make a check to reduce a critical hit against you to a normal hit.

baseFeats.name: Scout's Pounce
baseFeats.benefits: You leap from the shadows to strike your foes.

baseFeats.name: Scroll Savant
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Reservoir
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Shadowcaster Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: Your own shadow speaks to you, providing knowledge of spells and a reservoir of magical power.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Sneak Attack
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the sneak attack class feature, except you deal 1d6 precision damage regardless of your level.

baseFeats.name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the shall not falter, shall not rout focus spell.

baseFeats.name: Shared Avoidance
baseFeats.benefits: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

baseFeats.name: Shared Synergy
baseFeats.benefits: You can grant the benefit from Dualistic Synergy to an ally within 30 feet instead of yourself, either allowing that ally to Recall Knowledge, granting that ally temporary Hit Points, or both, depending on the spell’s tradition.

baseFeats.name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
baseFeats.benefits: The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional 3d6 piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel.

baseFeats.name: Shield of Faith
baseFeats.benefits: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

baseFeats.name: Shield of Reckoning
baseFeats.benefits: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

baseFeats.name: Side by Side (Druid)
baseFeats.benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

baseFeats.name: Signature Spell Expansion
baseFeats.benefits: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

baseFeats.name: Signifer's Sight
baseFeats.benefits: The magic flowing through your signifer’s mask allows you to see in the dark, and the mask dampens the distraction caused by sudden flashes of bright light.

baseFeats.name: Silencing Strike
baseFeats.benefits: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

baseFeats.name: Silent Sting
baseFeats.prereqs: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Stealth
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly hide your weapon to make it difficult to pin the attack on you.

baseFeats.name: Six Pillars Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed.

baseFeats.name: Sleeper Hold
baseFeats.benefits: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

baseFeats.name: Sneak Savant
baseFeats.benefits: It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look.

baseFeats.name: Spellmaster's Ward
baseFeats.benefits: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe.

baseFeats.name: Spy's Countermeasures
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned how to analyze and fake your responses to the most common magic used against spies.

baseFeats.name: Steal the Sky
baseFeats.benefits: You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft.

baseFeats.name: Surging Might
baseFeats.benefits: With a complex gesture, you focus the divine power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances.

baseFeats.name: Suspect of Opportunity
baseFeats.benefits: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

baseFeats.name: Sustaining Steel
baseFeats.prereqs: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study
baseFeats.benefits: You pull magic into your weapon, using its substance to transform the magic into restorative energy.

baseFeats.name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

baseFeats.name: Tactical Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

baseFeats.name: Tangle of Battle
baseFeats.benefits: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

baseFeats.name: Targeting Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

baseFeats.name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
baseFeats.benefits: You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield.

baseFeats.name: Temporary Potions
baseFeats.benefits: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

baseFeats.name: Terrain Transposition
baseFeats.benefits: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

baseFeats.name: Terrifying Howl
baseFeats.benefits: You unleash a terrifying howl.

baseFeats.name: Through Spell
baseFeats.benefits: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

baseFeats.name: Tiller's Aid
baseFeats.benefits: You can quickly Aid your crop.

baseFeats.name: Tiller's Drive
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your Speed and that of your crop.

baseFeats.name: Topple Foe
baseFeats.benefits: You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet.

baseFeats.name: Trampling Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You urge your mount forward, trampling enemies in your path.

baseFeats.name: Transpose
baseFeats.benefits: You switch places with your eidolon.

baseFeats.name: Tumbling Opportunist
baseFeats.benefits: You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back.

baseFeats.name: Twin Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Dodge
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

baseFeats.name: Unseat
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount.

baseFeats.name: Unstable Concoction
baseFeats.benefits: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

baseFeats.name: Unusual Composition
baseFeats.benefits: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

baseFeats.name: Uzunjati Recollection
baseFeats.prereqs: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
baseFeats.benefits: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

baseFeats.name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!
baseFeats.benefits: You can train your allies to Raise a Shield on your order

baseFeats.name: Ward Casting
baseFeats.benefits: You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell.

baseFeats.name: Warden's Step
baseFeats.benefits: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

baseFeats.name: Weapon-Rune Shifter
baseFeats.benefits: You learn how to alter the magic of weapon runes by using a crystal as a focusing component.

baseFeats.name: Weighty Impact
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon knocks enemies down.

baseFeats.name: Whirlwind Stance
baseFeats.prereqs: Staff Acrobat Dedication; expert proficiency in your staff
baseFeats.benefits: You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one.

baseFeats.name: Widen the Gap
baseFeats.benefits: Once you have penetrated a foe’s defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent’s wound and deal some serious damage.

baseFeats.name: Wind Jump
baseFeats.benefits: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

baseFeats.name: Winding Flow
baseFeats.benefits: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

baseFeats.name: Witch's Communion
baseFeats.benefits: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

baseFeats.name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.

baseFeats.name: A Home in Every Port
baseFeats.benefits: Spend downtime to gain free lodging for a night.

baseFeats.name: Caravan Leader
baseFeats.benefits: Your group can Hustle for much longer.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Investiture
baseFeats.benefits: Invest up to 12 magic items.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Scout
baseFeats.benefits: Grant allies +2 to initiative rolls when Scouting.

baseFeats.name: Additional Shadow Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Choose an additional shadowdancer focus spell you haven't already selected from Shadow Magic.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Order Training
baseFeats.prereqs: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the greater order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

baseFeats.name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
baseFeats.prereqs: Eldritch Researcher Dedication; Seeker of Truths
baseFeats.benefits: You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore.

baseFeats.name: Aegis of Arnisant
baseFeats.prereqs: Knight Vigilant; Shield Block; master in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Inspired by the tale of Arnisant, you transform your shield into a magic ward.

baseFeats.name: Affliction Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

baseFeats.name: Amplifying Touch
baseFeats.benefits: Your healing energies empower attacks.

baseFeats.name: Assassinate
baseFeats.benefits: You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Faith
baseFeats.benefits: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

baseFeats.name: Beastmaster's Call
baseFeats.benefits: You quickly call in a primal projection of a non-active companion to provide the companion's support benefit.

baseFeats.name: Blade of Justice
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

baseFeats.name: Blade of Law
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the power of law and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed breaking or disrespecting the law or otherwise acting disorderly.

baseFeats.name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe.

baseFeats.name: Blessed Denial
baseFeats.benefits: You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally.

baseFeats.name: Blood Component Substitution
baseFeats.benefits: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

baseFeats.name: Bloody Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

baseFeats.name: Brutal Finish
baseFeats.benefits: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foe’s defenses.

baseFeats.name: Cartwheel Dodge
baseFeats.benefits: You can dodge away from damaging effects.

baseFeats.name: Champion's Sacrifice
baseFeats.benefits: You can suffer so that others might live.

baseFeats.name: Charged Creation
baseFeats.benefits: Your magic is drawn to your persistent creations.

baseFeats.name: Cheat Death
baseFeats.benefits: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

baseFeats.name: Clever Counterspell
baseFeats.benefits: You creatively apply your prepared spells to counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

baseFeats.name: Communal Sustain
baseFeats.benefits: Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect.

baseFeats.name: Conflux Focus
baseFeats.benefits: You imagine how you'll weave magic and combat into future battles, improving your focus.

baseFeats.name: Coordinated Charge
baseFeats.benefits: You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow.

baseFeats.name: Coordinated Distraction
baseFeats.benefits: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

baseFeats.name: Critical Debilitations
baseFeats.benefits: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

baseFeats.name: Cut the Bonds
baseFeats.prereqs: Bellflower Dedication; expert in a melee weapon
baseFeats.benefits: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.

baseFeats.name: Daredevil's Gambit
baseFeats.benefits: If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target’s space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first.

baseFeats.name: Deadly Poison Weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

baseFeats.name: Defensive Recovery
baseFeats.benefits: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

baseFeats.name: Determined Lore Seeker
baseFeats.benefits: You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss.

baseFeats.name: Diamond Soul
baseFeats.benefits: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

baseFeats.name: Disrupt Ki
baseFeats.benefits: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

baseFeats.name: Distracting Shot
baseFeats.benefits: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

baseFeats.name: Diverse Weapon Expert
baseFeats.prereqs: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
baseFeats.benefits: Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert.

baseFeats.name: Divine Wall
baseFeats.benefits: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

baseFeats.name: Diviner Sense
baseFeats.benefits: You sense magical dangers.

baseFeats.name: Dodging Roll
baseFeats.benefits: You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

baseFeats.name: Domain Fluency
baseFeats.benefits: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery.

baseFeats.name: Domain Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

baseFeats.name: Double Prey
baseFeats.benefits: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

baseFeats.name: Dragon Shape
baseFeats.benefits: You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

baseFeats.name: Dragon's Rage Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

baseFeats.name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
baseFeats.benefits: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Polymath
baseFeats.benefits: Your flexible mind can quickly shift spells.

baseFeats.name: Educated Assessment
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature’s Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment.

baseFeats.name: Emblazon Antimagic
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

baseFeats.name: Embrace the Pain
baseFeats.benefits: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

baseFeats.name: Emergency Medical Assistance
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires.

baseFeats.name: Enforce Oath
baseFeats.prereqs: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
baseFeats.benefits: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

baseFeats.name: Enigma's Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

baseFeats.name: Evasiveness (Rogue)
baseFeats.prereqs: Rogue Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

baseFeats.name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
baseFeats.prereqs: Swashbuckler Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
baseFeats.benefits: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

baseFeats.name: Expert Bard Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Bard Spellcasting; master in Occultism
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Expert Cathartic Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Cleric Spellcasting; master in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Expert Combat Eidolon
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon advances its capabilities in combat.

baseFeats.name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Druid Spellcasting; master in Nature
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Magus Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Magus Spellcasting; master in Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Oracle Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Oracle Spellcasting; master in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Scroll Cache
baseFeats.benefits: Your scroll collection is more powerful.

baseFeats.name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting; master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Expert Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting archetype benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Summoner Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Summoner Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; master in Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Extend Elixir
baseFeats.benefits: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

baseFeats.name: Familiar's Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

baseFeats.name: Fantastic Leap
baseFeats.benefits: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

baseFeats.name: Felling Shot
baseFeats.benefits: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You broaden your ability to channel your power into halcyon magic.

baseFeats.name: Flexible Transmogrification
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to transmogrify your eidolon to suit the circumstances of the day.

baseFeats.name: Flicker
baseFeats.benefits: You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur.

baseFeats.name: Flinging Shove
baseFeats.benefits: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.

baseFeats.name: Flourishing Finish
baseFeats.benefits: Your martial prowess demoralizes all who can see you.

baseFeats.name: Focused Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

baseFeats.name: Forcible Energy
baseFeats.benefits: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

baseFeats.name: Foresee Danger
baseFeats.benefits: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

baseFeats.name: Frightening Appearance
baseFeats.benefits: Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders.

baseFeats.name: Furious Grab
baseFeats.benefits: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

baseFeats.name: Grasping Limbs
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon grabs enemies.

baseFeats.name: Greater Physical Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

baseFeats.name: Greater Revelation
baseFeats.benefits: You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

baseFeats.name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

baseFeats.name: Green Tongue
baseFeats.benefits: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

baseFeats.name: Gruesome Strike
baseFeats.prereqs: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

baseFeats.name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
baseFeats.prereqs: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong.

baseFeats.name: Hell's Armaments
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve trained with your order’s weapon and your Hellknight plate long enough to apply your expertise from other weapons and armor.

baseFeats.name: Hex Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

baseFeats.name: Improved Dueling Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

baseFeats.name: Improved Knockback
baseFeats.benefits: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Ricochet
baseFeats.benefits: After your first shot singles out your opponent's position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

baseFeats.name: Infectious Emotions
baseFeats.benefits: When you use Catharsis, one ally within 30 feet gains the catharsis activation benefits in addition to you.

baseFeats.name: Inspirational Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

baseFeats.name: Interfering Surge
baseFeats.benefits: You overcharge the triggering spell with magic.

baseFeats.name: Invincible Mutagen
baseFeats.benefits: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

baseFeats.name: Janatimo's Lessons
baseFeats.benefits: Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations.

baseFeats.name: Judgement of the Monolith
baseFeats.benefits: You can use your ka stone to compel the truth.

baseFeats.name: Juggernaut's Fortitude
baseFeats.prereqs: Barbarian Dedication; expert in Fortitude Saves
baseFeats.benefits: Your proficiency rank in Fortitude saves increases to master.

baseFeats.name: Knight in Shining Armor
baseFeats.prereqs: Knight Vigilant; expert in light armor, medium armor, or unarmored defense; trained in heavy armor
baseFeats.benefits: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor.

baseFeats.name: Lasting Doubt
baseFeats.benefits: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

baseFeats.name: Legs of Stone
baseFeats.benefits: You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you.

baseFeats.name: Liberating Stride
baseFeats.benefits: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

baseFeats.name: Lightning Snares
baseFeats.prereqs: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; master in Crafting
baseFeats.benefits: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

baseFeats.name: Link Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your focus recovers faster.

baseFeats.name: Lunging Stance
baseFeats.benefits: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

baseFeats.name: Magic Sense
baseFeats.benefits: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

baseFeats.name: Maneuvering Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield.

baseFeats.name: Master Alchemy
baseFeats.benefits: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 7.

baseFeats.name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
baseFeats.benefits: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

baseFeats.name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

baseFeats.name: Meditative Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

baseFeats.name: Mobile Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You attack in motion.

baseFeats.name: Overwhelming Breath
baseFeats.benefits: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

baseFeats.name: Overwhelming Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: You pierce through your foe's resistance.

baseFeats.name: Pale Horse
baseFeats.benefits: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

baseFeats.name: Paragon's Guard
baseFeats.benefits: Once you’ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

baseFeats.name: Perfection's Path
baseFeats.prereqs: Monk Dedication; expert in at least one saving throw
baseFeats.benefits: Increase the proiciency rank for one saving throw to master.

baseFeats.name: Pesh Skin
baseFeats.benefits: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

baseFeats.name: Plentiful Snares
baseFeats.benefits: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients.

baseFeats.name: Predator's Pounce
baseFeats.benefits: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

baseFeats.name: Preparation
baseFeats.benefits: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

baseFeats.name: Primal Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

baseFeats.name: Primal Summons
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

baseFeats.name: Purifying Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness.

baseFeats.name: Reactive Interference
baseFeats.benefits: You reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

baseFeats.name: Read the Land
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information.

baseFeats.name: Reaper of Repose
baseFeats.prereqs: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; master proficiency in a weapon
baseFeats.benefits: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses.

baseFeats.name: Reason Rapidly
baseFeats.benefits: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

baseFeats.name: Recollect Studies
baseFeats.prereqs: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
baseFeats.benefits: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures.

baseFeats.name: Redirect Elements
baseFeats.benefits: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area.

baseFeats.name: Reverberate
baseFeats.benefits: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

baseFeats.name: Ricochet Feint
baseFeats.benefits: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

baseFeats.name: Rugged Survivalist
baseFeats.benefits: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.

baseFeats.name: School Counterspell
baseFeats.benefits: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school.

baseFeats.name: Second Sting
baseFeats.benefits: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

baseFeats.name: Secrets of Shadow
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm.

baseFeats.name: Sense Ki
baseFeats.benefits: You can read the presence of ki in your area.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Illusion
baseFeats.benefits: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms.

baseFeats.name: Shaped Contaminant
baseFeats.benefits: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

baseFeats.name: Shared Assault
baseFeats.benefits: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

baseFeats.name: Shared Replenishment
baseFeats.benefits: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

baseFeats.name: Shield Salvation
baseFeats.benefits: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.

baseFeats.name: Shoulder Catastrophe
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself.

baseFeats.name: Side by Side (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.

baseFeats.name: Signifer Armor Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well.

baseFeats.name: Silver's Refrain
baseFeats.benefits: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.

baseFeats.name: Sing to the Steel
baseFeats.benefits: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat.

baseFeats.name: Speaking Sky
baseFeats.benefits: You can hear air movement like soft whispers.

baseFeats.name: Spellmaster's Resilience
baseFeats.benefits: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it.

baseFeats.name: Spirit's Wrath
baseFeats.benefits: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

baseFeats.name: Splendid Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion continues to develop.

baseFeats.name: Spring Attack
baseFeats.benefits: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

baseFeats.name: Spring from the Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.

baseFeats.name: Stance Savant (Monk)
baseFeats.benefits: You enter a stance without a thought.

baseFeats.name: Student of the Dueling Arts
baseFeats.benefits: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day.

baseFeats.name: Summoner's Call
baseFeats.benefits: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side.

baseFeats.name: Sunder Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

baseFeats.name: Swap Investment
baseFeats.benefits: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.

baseFeats.name: Tense Negotiator
baseFeats.benefits: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place.

baseFeats.name: Titan's Stature
baseFeats.benefits: You grow to even greater size.

baseFeats.name: Towering Size
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon becomes even bigger.

baseFeats.name: Unbalancing Sweep
baseFeats.benefits: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Bombs
baseFeats.benefits: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

baseFeats.name: Uncanny Suction
baseFeats.benefits: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.

baseFeats.name: Vernai Training
baseFeats.prereqs: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
baseFeats.benefits: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death.

baseFeats.name: Wandering Oasis
baseFeats.benefits: You're surrounded by soothing energy.

baseFeats.name: Warden's Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.

baseFeats.name: Wave Spiral
baseFeats.benefits: You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water.

baseFeats.name: Wild Strider
baseFeats.benefits: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you.

baseFeats.name: Wings of the Dragon
baseFeats.benefits: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.

baseFeats.name: Words of Unraveling
baseFeats.benefits: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual.

baseFeats.name: Aasimar's Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.

baseFeats.name: Advanced General Training
baseFeats.benefits: Over the course of adventuring, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities.

baseFeats.name: Airy Step
baseFeats.benefits: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space.

baseFeats.name: Alter Resistance
baseFeats.benefits: You focus on your protean forebears to change your energy resistance.

baseFeats.name: Ancestor's Rage
baseFeats.benefits: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena.

baseFeats.name: Ancestor's Transformation
baseFeats.benefits: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Adaptation
baseFeats.benefits: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water.

baseFeats.name: Aquatic Camouflage
baseFeats.benefits: You blend into the waves.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Sight
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast the detect magic cantrip
baseFeats.benefits: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things.

baseFeats.name: Arise, ye Worthy!
baseFeats.benefits: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp.

baseFeats.name: Augment Senses
baseFeats.benefits: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses.

baseFeats.name: Avenge Ally
baseFeats.benefits: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks.

baseFeats.name: Azarketi Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched.

baseFeats.name: Black Cat Curse
baseFeats.benefits: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature.

baseFeats.name: Bone Investiture
baseFeats.benefits: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.

baseFeats.name: Bounce Back
baseFeats.benefits: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.

baseFeats.name: Calaca's Showstopper
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels.

baseFeats.name: Call of the Green Man
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.

baseFeats.name: Can't Fall Here
baseFeats.benefits: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds.

baseFeats.name: Caterwaul
baseFeats.benefits: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

baseFeats.name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons

baseFeats.name: Ceaseless Shadows
baseFeats.benefits: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Growth
baseFeats.benefits: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.

baseFeats.name: Cloak of Poison
baseFeats.benefits: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you.

baseFeats.name: Cobble Dancer
baseFeats.benefits: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments.

baseFeats.name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for conrasu weapons.

baseFeats.name: Consistent Surge
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly.

baseFeats.name: Continuous Assault
baseFeats.benefits: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

baseFeats.name: Daywalker
baseFeats.benefits: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light.

baseFeats.name: Delver
baseFeats.benefits: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water.

baseFeats.name: Dire Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast.

baseFeats.name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons.

baseFeats.name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings.

baseFeats.name: Elite Dracomancer
baseFeats.benefits: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.

baseFeats.name: Elven Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.

baseFeats.name: Enforced Order
baseFeats.benefits: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos.

baseFeats.name: Envenomed Edge
baseFeats.benefits: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points.

baseFeats.name: Ferocious Beasts
baseFeats.prereqs: Beast Trainer or animal companion; Orc Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood.

baseFeats.name: Fey Skin
baseFeats.benefits: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack.

baseFeats.name: Fiend's Door
baseFeats.benefits: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.

baseFeats.name: Finest Trick
baseFeats.benefits: Many fiends—rakshasa rajas and demonic succubi most famously—can take on the forms of others.

baseFeats.name: Flame Jump
baseFeats.benefits: Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.

baseFeats.name: Form of the Bat
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform into a harmless bat.

baseFeats.name: Formation Master
baseFeats.benefits: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies.

baseFeats.name: Fully Flighted
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

baseFeats.name: Genie Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in falchions, ranseurs, scimitars, tridents, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Gift of the Moon
baseFeats.benefits: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.

baseFeats.name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with gnoll weapons.

baseFeats.name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons.

baseFeats.name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons.

baseFeats.name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons.

baseFeats.name: Hag Magic
baseFeats.benefits: Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic.

baseFeats.name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons.

baseFeats.name: Harbinger's Caw
baseFeats.benefits: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune.

baseFeats.name: Hatchling Flight
baseFeats.benefits: You can fly a little!

baseFeats.name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.

baseFeats.name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
baseFeats.benefits: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.

baseFeats.name: Impose Order
baseFeats.benefits: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order.

baseFeats.name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
baseFeats.benefits: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
baseFeats.benefits: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky.

baseFeats.name: Inspirit Hazard
baseFeats.benefits: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard.

baseFeats.name: Instinctive Obfuscation
baseFeats.prereqs: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
baseFeats.benefits: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats.

baseFeats.name: Invisible Trickster
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so.

baseFeats.name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
baseFeats.benefits: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.

baseFeats.name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
baseFeats.benefits: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors.

baseFeats.name: Jinx Glutton
