baseFeats.benefits: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

baseFeats.name: Killing Stone
baseFeats.benefits: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.

baseFeats.name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your tails show your magical mastery.

baseFeats.name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.

baseFeats.name: Lifeblood's Call
baseFeats.benefits: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you.

baseFeats.name: Mask of Fear
baseFeats.benefits: Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension.

baseFeats.name: Metal-Veined Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.

baseFeats.name: Mischievous Tail
baseFeats.benefits: Your tail can bedevil your foes.

baseFeats.name: Mist Strider
baseFeats.benefits: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight.

baseFeats.name: None Shall Know
baseFeats.benefits: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you.

baseFeats.name: One with Earth
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it.

baseFeats.name: Orc Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.

baseFeats.name: Primal Rampage
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin.

baseFeats.name: Purge Sins
baseFeats.benefits: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Burst
baseFeats.benefits: Your skin glows with intensity.

baseFeats.name: Rehydration
baseFeats.benefits: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air.

baseFeats.name: Resist Ruin
baseFeats.benefits: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need.

baseFeats.name: Revivification Protocal
baseFeats.benefits: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you.

baseFeats.name: Secret Eyes
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets.

baseFeats.name: See the Unseen
baseFeats.benefits: You notice things that others can't see at all.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Pact
baseFeats.benefits: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.

baseFeats.name: Shadow's Assault
baseFeats.benefits: Your shadow assaults your foes.

baseFeats.name: Shaitan Skin
baseFeats.benefits: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan.

baseFeats.name: Shinstabber
baseFeats.benefits: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up.

baseFeats.name: Shory Aerialist
baseFeats.prereqs: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast fly
baseFeats.benefits: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.

baseFeats.name: Skirt the Light
baseFeats.benefits: You can travel the border between the Material and Shadow Planes and even bring others along.

baseFeats.name: Skittering Sneak
baseFeats.benefits: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.

baseFeats.name: Spell Devourer
baseFeats.benefits: You don't just resist magic; you devour it.

baseFeats.name: Spew Tentacles
baseFeats.benefits: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.

baseFeats.name: Spiteful Rake
baseFeats.benefits: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes.

baseFeats.name: Steadfast Ally
baseFeats.benefits: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support.

baseFeats.name: Stubborn Persistence
baseFeats.benefits: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials.

baseFeats.name: Suli Amir
baseFeats.benefits: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.

baseFeats.name: Summon Air Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

baseFeats.name: Summon Celestial Kin
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally.

baseFeats.name: Summon Earth Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

baseFeats.name: Summon Fiendish Kin
baseFeats.benefits: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.

baseFeats.name: Summon Fire Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.

baseFeats.name: Summon Water Elemental
baseFeats.benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.

baseFeats.name: Telluric Power
baseFeats.benefits: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Tengu Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons.

baseFeats.name: Thunder God's Fan
baseFeats.benefits: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm.

baseFeats.name: Toppling Dance
baseFeats.benefits: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the trip trait, but only against the creature whose space you share.

baseFeats.name: Translucent Skin
baseFeats.benefits: Your body is translucent while underwater.

baseFeats.name: Truespeech
baseFeats.benefits: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.

baseFeats.name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
baseFeats.benefits: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break.

baseFeats.name: Unconventional Expertise
baseFeats.prereqs: Unconventional Weaponry; trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.

baseFeats.name: Universal Longevity
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life.

baseFeats.name: Unrivaled Builder
baseFeats.benefits: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done.

baseFeats.name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
baseFeats.benefits: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper.

baseFeats.name: Very, Very Sneaky
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to hide is so great, you can disappear straight from vision.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Snares
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries.

baseFeats.name: Wandering Heart
baseFeats.prereqs: Arctic Elf, Cavern Elf, Desert Elf, Woodland Elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment
baseFeats.benefits: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.

baseFeats.name: War Conditioning
baseFeats.benefits: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.

baseFeats.name: Warren Digger
baseFeats.benefits: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth.

baseFeats.name: We March On
baseFeats.benefits: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling.

baseFeats.name: Webslinger
baseFeats.benefits: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.

baseFeats.name: Absorb Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: Spellmaster Dedication; spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells
baseFeats.benefits: You absorb a spell and store it in your body.

baseFeats.name: Airborne Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon can fly.

baseFeats.name: Allegro
baseFeats.benefits: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

baseFeats.name: Anchoring Aura
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

baseFeats.name: Arcane Shroud
baseFeats.benefits: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast.

baseFeats.name: Armored Exercise
baseFeats.prereqs: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
baseFeats.benefits: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Life
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Preservation
baseFeats.benefits: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Righteousness
baseFeats.benefits: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Vengeance
baseFeats.benefits: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

baseFeats.name: Awesome Blow
baseFeats.benefits: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

baseFeats.name: Bonded Focus
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

baseFeats.name: Consume Spell
baseFeats.benefits: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

baseFeats.name: Death's Door
baseFeats.benefits: You continue to fight when others would fall.

baseFeats.name: Defensive Roll
baseFeats.benefits: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

baseFeats.name: Deity's Protection

baseFeats.name: Dual Onslaught

baseFeats.name: Fast Channel

baseFeats.name: Flamboyant Leap

baseFeats.name: Forceful Shot

baseFeats.name: Forestall Curse

baseFeats.name: Glib Mutagen

baseFeats.name: Greater Merciful Elixir

baseFeats.name: Hasted Assault

baseFeats.name: Impaling Thrust

baseFeats.name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)

baseFeats.name: Incredible Recollection

baseFeats.name: Innocent Butterfly

baseFeats.name: Litany of Depravity

baseFeats.name: Litany of Righteousness
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

baseFeats.name: Peculiar Anatomy

baseFeats.name: Perfect Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

baseFeats.name: Plot the Future
baseFeats.benefits: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

baseFeats.name: Prayer Attack
baseFeats.benefits: You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis.

baseFeats.name: Premonition of Clarity
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

baseFeats.name: Preternatural Parry

baseFeats.name: Resilient Shell
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon is resilient against attacks.

baseFeats.name: Rites of Transfiguration

baseFeats.name: Seeker Arrow
baseFeats.benefits: Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target.

baseFeats.name: Sense the Unseen

baseFeats.name: Shadow Power

baseFeats.name: Shadow's Web
baseFeats.benefits: You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place.

baseFeats.name: Share Eidolon Magic

baseFeats.name: Shared Prey

baseFeats.name: Soothing Ballad

baseFeats.name: Sow Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You fold your spell into a seed.

baseFeats.name: Specialized Mount

baseFeats.name: Speedy Rituals
baseFeats.benefits: You can perform rituals in only a fraction of the usual time.

baseFeats.name: Spell Shroud
baseFeats.benefits: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

baseFeats.name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way.

baseFeats.name: Stance Savant (Fighter)

baseFeats.name: Stay Down!
baseFeats.benefits: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

baseFeats.name: Stealthy Companion
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

baseFeats.name: Stone Communion

baseFeats.name: Swift Banishment

baseFeats.name: Tactical Cadence

baseFeats.name: Talismanic Sage

baseFeats.name: Target of Opportunity

baseFeats.name: Targeting Shot

baseFeats.name: Timeless Body

baseFeats.name: Timeless Nature

baseFeats.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
baseFeats.benefits: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

baseFeats.benefits: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

baseFeats.name: Cloud Jump

baseFeats.name: Divine Guidance

baseFeats.name: Legendary Codebreaker

baseFeats.name: Legendary Professional
baseFeats.benefits: Gain renown for your Lore.

baseFeats.name: Legendary Sneak

baseFeats.benefits: Survive extreme conditions.

baseFeats.benefits: Steal what would normally be impossible to steal.

baseFeats.benefits: You instill great swiftness into your allies.

baseFeats.name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized.

baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

baseFeats.name: Stunning Appearance

baseFeats.benefits: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

baseFeats.name: Ubiquitous Snares

baseFeats.name: Blazing Aura

baseFeats.benefits: The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Word
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes.

baseFeats.name: Ceremony of Sun's Gift
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to the sun has become an unbreakable bond.

baseFeats.name: Channel the Godmind
baseFeats.benefits: You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings.

baseFeats.name: Crone's Cruelty
baseFeats.benefits: Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you.

baseFeats.name: Elude Trouble
baseFeats.benefits: You slip through your foe's opening.

baseFeats.name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)
baseFeats.benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

baseFeats.name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
baseFeats.benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

baseFeats.name: Favor of Heaven
baseFeats.benefits: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Word
baseFeats.benefits: You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.

baseFeats.name: Final Form
baseFeats.benefits: You embrace your monstrous blood and make it your own, screaming out to the heavens and hells alike in rage, pain, and defiance.

baseFeats.name: Flourish and Ruin
baseFeats.benefits: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes.

baseFeats.name: Fountain of Secrets
baseFeats.benefits: You constantly remember details about the world.

baseFeats.name: Great Tengu Form
baseFeats.benefits: You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

baseFeats.name: Heroic Presence
baseFeats.benefits: The blood of heroes courses through your veins, and you inspire your allies to dig deep and find a new level of resolve.

baseFeats.name: Hero's Wings
baseFeats.benefits: You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential.

baseFeats.name: Homeward Bound
baseFeats.benefits: The connection between you and the First World resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between the Material Plane and the First World.

baseFeats.name: Hurricane Swing
baseFeats.benefits: Choose either lightning bolt or gust of wind.

baseFeats.name: Magic Rider
baseFeats.benefits: Your people used powerful magic to travel between distant worlds, and the remnants of that magic make such transportation easier for you.

baseFeats.name: Olethros's Decree
baseFeats.benefits: You have a connection to olethroses, the enigmatic psychopomps who successfully swayed the yamaraj to permit the creation of the first duskwalkers.

baseFeats.name: Pierce the Light
baseFeats.benefits: You tear the veil between the Material Plane and its shadow.

baseFeats.name: Radiate Glory
baseFeats.benefits: Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

baseFeats.name: Rallying Cry
baseFeats.benefits: You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat.

baseFeats.name: Rampaging Ferocity
baseFeats.benefits: You lash out viciously even as you fend off death.

baseFeats.name: Rampaging Form
baseFeats.prereqs: Change Shape with a fox alternate form
baseFeats.benefits: Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level animal form and 7th-level fiery body for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

baseFeats.name: Ratfolk Growth
baseFeats.benefits: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle.

baseFeats.name: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
baseFeats.benefits: Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions.

baseFeats.name: Regrowth
baseFeats.benefits: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds.

baseFeats.name: Relentless Wings
baseFeats.benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology.

baseFeats.name: Reliable Luck
baseFeats.benefits: You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity.

baseFeats.name: Scion Transformation
baseFeats.benefits: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Self
baseFeats.benefits: With a powerful talent for misdirection, you slip from your adversaries' notice so thoroughly you appear to be somewhere else.

baseFeats.name: Soaring Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your wings grow stronger.

baseFeats.name: Stone Form
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental.

baseFeats.name: Stonegate
baseFeats.benefits: Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress.

baseFeats.name: Storm Form
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform into an elemental.

baseFeats.name: Stormy Heart
baseFeats.benefits: The elemental power in your blood is a raging storm.

baseFeats.name: Symphony of Blood
baseFeats.benefits: You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor.

baseFeats.name: Ten Lives
baseFeats.benefits: When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check.

baseFeats.name: Tidal Shield
baseFeats.benefits: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

baseFeats.name: Trickster Tengu
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure.

baseFeats.name: True Gaze
baseFeats.benefits: When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones.

baseFeats.name: Twist Healing
baseFeats.prereqs: ability to cast heal and harm
baseFeats.benefits: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims.

baseFeats.name: Underwater Volcano
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast volcanic eruption as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

baseFeats.name: Wyrmling Flight
baseFeats.benefits: Your draconic wings have grown large and strong enough for flight.

baseFeats.name: Yamaraj's Grandeur
baseFeats.benefits: You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all.

baseFeats.name: All in my Head
baseFeats.benefits: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

baseFeats.name: Arrow of Death
baseFeats.benefits: You modify an arrow or bolt to bring death to your target in a single potent hit.

baseFeats.name: Blaze of Revelation
baseFeats.benefits: Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

baseFeats.name: Brutal Critical
baseFeats.benefits: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Form
baseFeats.benefits: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

baseFeats.name: Conflux Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: You've achieved perfect magical and physical balance, allowing magic to flow into and through you more easily.

baseFeats.name: Deep Lore
baseFeats.benefits: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

baseFeats.name: Diamond Fists
baseFeats.benefits: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

baseFeats.name: Discordant Voice
baseFeats.benefits: Your inspire courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

baseFeats.name: Divine Effusion
baseFeats.benefits: The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

baseFeats.name: Domain Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

baseFeats.name: Echoing Channel
baseFeats.benefits: When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

baseFeats.name: Echoing Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

baseFeats.name: Effortless Reach
baseFeats.benefits: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic.

baseFeats.name: Empty Body
baseFeats.benefits: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

baseFeats.name: Eternal Composition
baseFeats.benefits: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Form
baseFeats.benefits: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

baseFeats.name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
baseFeats.benefits: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

baseFeats.name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
baseFeats.prereqs: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept; legendary in either Arcana or Nature, master in the other
baseFeats.benefits: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched.

baseFeats.name: Hex Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

baseFeats.name: Implausible Infiltration
baseFeats.benefits: You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them.

baseFeats.name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
baseFeats.benefits: Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Flurry
baseFeats.benefits: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Polymath
baseFeats.prereqs: Esoteric Polymath; trained in Arcana, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Volley
baseFeats.benefits: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

baseFeats.name: Improbable Elixirs
baseFeats.benefits: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

baseFeats.name: Improved Swift Banishment
baseFeats.benefits: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

baseFeats.name: Incredible Luck
baseFeats.benefits: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

baseFeats.name: Infinite Possibilities
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve found a way to prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

baseFeats.name: Invoke Disaster
baseFeats.benefits: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

baseFeats.name: Ki Center
baseFeats.prereqs: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
baseFeats.benefits: You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power.

baseFeats.name: Ki Form
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air.

baseFeats.name: Lead Investigator
baseFeats.benefits: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

baseFeats.name: Lethal Finisher
baseFeats.benefits: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

baseFeats.name: Link Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: Your bond replenishes your focus.

baseFeats.name: Magical Master
baseFeats.benefits: Your eidolon gains a bevy of lower-level spells.

baseFeats.name: Manifold Edge
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

baseFeats.name: Master Bard Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Bard Spellcasting; legendary in Occultism
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Master Cathartic Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Cleric Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Master Druid Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Druid Spellcasting; legendary in Nature
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Magus Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Magus Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Oracle Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Oracle Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Scroll Cache
baseFeats.benefits: Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster.

baseFeats.name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Master Spellcasting
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting archetype benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Summoner Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Summoner Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Witch Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Witch Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

baseFeats.name: Master Wizard Spellcasting
baseFeats.prereqs: Expert Wizard Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana
baseFeats.benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Masterful Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

baseFeats.name: Meditative Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

baseFeats.name: Mighty Dragon Shape
baseFeats.benefits: You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often.

baseFeats.name: Mindblank Mutagen
baseFeats.benefits: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

baseFeats.name: Miracle Worker
baseFeats.benefits: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

baseFeats.name: Miraculous Possibility
baseFeats.benefits: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

baseFeats.name: Parry and Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Clarity
baseFeats.benefits: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Debilitation
baseFeats.benefits: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Form Control
baseFeats.benefits: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Shot
baseFeats.benefits: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

baseFeats.name: Powerful Sneak
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to exploit your enemies’ lowered defenses.

baseFeats.name: Primal Aegis
baseFeats.benefits: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

baseFeats.name: Primal Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

baseFeats.name: Rejuvenating Touch
baseFeats.benefits: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

baseFeats.name: Reprepare Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

baseFeats.name: Retain Absorbed Spell
baseFeats.benefits: When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly—potentially for a greater period of time.

baseFeats.name: Savage Critical
baseFeats.benefits: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

baseFeats.name: School Spell Redirection
baseFeats.benefits: When you Counterspell a spell with a school matching your specialization, if you critically succeed at your counteract check, or if you succeed while using a spell of a higher level than the spell you countered, you can redirect the spell you countered.

baseFeats.name: Second Chance Spell
baseFeats.benefits: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Hunter
baseFeats.benefits: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

baseFeats.name: Shadow Master
baseFeats.benefits: The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

baseFeats.name: Shared Clarity
baseFeats.benefits: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

baseFeats.name: Smash from the Air
baseFeats.benefits: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

baseFeats.name: Specialized Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Your animal companion gains a specialization.

baseFeats.name: Split Hex
baseFeats.benefits: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

baseFeats.name: Stave Off Catastrophe
baseFeats.benefits: You fully protect your allies from the worst blows.

baseFeats.name: Swift River
baseFeats.benefits: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

baseFeats.name: Triangle Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You string three arrows to your bow and fire them all at once.

baseFeats.name: Trickster's Ace
baseFeats.benefits: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

baseFeats.name: True Transmogrification
baseFeats.benefits: You transmogrify your eidolon each day.

baseFeats.name: Ultimate Mercy
baseFeats.benefits: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

baseFeats.name: Versatile Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: You can channel the entire realm of possibilities of your spellbook into an attack.

baseFeats.name: Vicious Evisceration
baseFeats.benefits: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

baseFeats.name: Warden's Wellspring
baseFeats.benefits: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

baseFeats.name: True Perception
baseFeats.benefits: Gain constant effects of true seeing.

baseFeats.name: Accurate Flurry
baseFeats.benefits: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

baseFeats.name: All the Time in the World
baseFeats.benefits: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

baseFeats.name: Annihilating Swing
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

baseFeats.name: Apex Companion
baseFeats.benefits: Gain the apex companion focus spell.

baseFeats.name: Archwizard's Might
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

baseFeats.name: Astonishing Explosion
baseFeats.benefits: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

baseFeats.name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
baseFeats.benefits: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

baseFeats.name: Avatar's Audience
baseFeats.benefits: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

baseFeats.name: Banishing Blow
baseFeats.benefits: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Conduit
baseFeats.benefits: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
baseFeats.benefits: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Mutation
baseFeats.prereqs: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
baseFeats.benefits: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

baseFeats.name: Bloodline Perfection
baseFeats.benefits: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

baseFeats.name: Boundless Reprisals
baseFeats.benefits: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

baseFeats.name: Celestial Mount
baseFeats.benefits: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

baseFeats.name: Contagious Rage
baseFeats.benefits: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

baseFeats.name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
baseFeats.benefits: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

baseFeats.name: Cross the Final Horizon
baseFeats.benefits: You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy.

baseFeats.name: Dance of Intercession
baseFeats.benefits: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

baseFeats.name: Deadly Strikes
baseFeats.benefits: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus.

baseFeats.name: Demon's Hair
baseFeats.benefits: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

baseFeats.name: Denier of Destruction
baseFeats.benefits: You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life.

baseFeats.name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
baseFeats.benefits: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

baseFeats.name: Emblazon Divinity
baseFeats.benefits: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

baseFeats.name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
baseFeats.benefits: Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment.

baseFeats.name: Enduring Debilitation
baseFeats.benefits: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

baseFeats.name: Enduring Quickness
baseFeats.benefits: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

baseFeats.name: Eternal Boost
baseFeats.benefits: Your link with your eidolon is so intense that you continuously reinforce its abilities.

baseFeats.name: Everdistant Defense
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

baseFeats.name: Everyone's a Suspect
baseFeats.benefits: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

baseFeats.name: Extradimensional Stash
baseFeats.benefits: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

baseFeats.name: Fatal Aria
baseFeats.benefits: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion.

baseFeats.name: Fiendish Mount
baseFeats.benefits: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

baseFeats.name: Fuse Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

baseFeats.name: Golden Body
baseFeats.benefits: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

baseFeats.name: Head of the Night Parade
baseFeats.benefits: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display.

baseFeats.name: Heart of the Kaiju
baseFeats.benefits: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

baseFeats.name: Hex Master
baseFeats.benefits: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

baseFeats.name: Hidden Paragon
baseFeats.benefits: When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

baseFeats.name: Hierophant's Power
baseFeats.benefits: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Snares
baseFeats.benefits: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Striker
baseFeats.benefits: Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation.

baseFeats.name: Impossible Technique
baseFeats.benefits: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.

baseFeats.name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
baseFeats.benefits: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

baseFeats.name: Just the Facts
baseFeats.benefits: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

baseFeats.name: Legendary Rider
baseFeats.benefits: You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals.

baseFeats.name: Legendary Shot
baseFeats.prereqs: masterful hunter; legendary in Perception; Far Shot
baseFeats.benefits: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would af ect your ranged attack.

baseFeats.name: Legendary Summoner
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to summon extends past your other spellcasting.

baseFeats.name: Leyline Conduit
baseFeats.benefits: You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world.

baseFeats.name: Maker of Miracles
baseFeats.benefits: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

baseFeats.name: Mega Bomb
baseFeats.benefits: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

baseFeats.name: Metamagic Channel
baseFeats.benefits: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

baseFeats.name: Metamagic Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

baseFeats.name: Mimic Protections
baseFeats.benefits: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

baseFeats.name: Mystery Conduit
baseFeats.benefits: The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

baseFeats.name: Oracular Providence
baseFeats.benefits: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power.

baseFeats.name: Panache Paragon
baseFeats.benefits: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

baseFeats.name: Paradoxical Mystery
baseFeats.benefits: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom.

baseFeats.name: Patron's Truth
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron's magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Encore
baseFeats.benefits: You develop another incredible creation.

baseFeats.name: Perfect Mutagen
baseFeats.benefits: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

baseFeats.name: Pied Piping
baseFeats.benefits: You learn the pied piping composition spell, which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

baseFeats.name: Plum Deluge
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

baseFeats.name: Quaking Stomp
baseFeats.benefits: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

baseFeats.name: Radiant Blade Master
baseFeats.benefits: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

baseFeats.name: Reactive Distraction
baseFeats.benefits: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

baseFeats.name: Reclaim Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

baseFeats.name: Reflecting Riposte
baseFeats.prereqs: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
baseFeats.benefits: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

baseFeats.name: Ringmaster's Introduction
baseFeats.benefits: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

baseFeats.name: Ruby Resurrection
baseFeats.benefits: In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes.

baseFeats.name: Sacred Defender
baseFeats.benefits: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

baseFeats.name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
baseFeats.benefits: You've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse.

baseFeats.name: Sever Space
baseFeats.benefits: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

baseFeats.name: Shield Paragon
baseFeats.benefits: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

baseFeats.name: Song of the Fallen
baseFeats.benefits: Gain the song of the fallen focus spell.

baseFeats.name: Spell Combination
baseFeats.benefits: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

baseFeats.name: Spell Mastery
baseFeats.benefits: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven't prepared them in advance.

baseFeats.name: Steal Essence
baseFeats.prereqs: legendary in Thievery, master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
baseFeats.benefits: Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

baseFeats.name: Superior Sight
baseFeats.benefits: Increase your visual acuity.

baseFeats.name: Supreme Spellstrike
baseFeats.benefits: You've made it almost effortless to combine spells and attacks.

baseFeats.name: Symphony of the Muses
baseFeats.benefits: You are able to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony.

baseFeats.name: Synergistic Spell
baseFeats.prereqs: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; Fulminating Synergy; legendary in Arcana and Nature
baseFeats.benefits: You combine your synergy and spells into a fantastic web of magic, allowing you to cast two spells at once.

baseFeats.name: Tenacious Blood Magic
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

baseFeats.name: Time Dilation Cascade
baseFeats.benefits: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

baseFeats.name: To the Ends of the Earth
baseFeats.benefits: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

baseFeats.name: Triple Threat
baseFeats.benefits: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

baseFeats.name: True Shapeshifter
baseFeats.benefits: You transcend the limitations of form.

baseFeats.name: Twin Eidolon
baseFeats.benefits: You can transform to match your eidolon.

baseFeats.name: Ultimate Flexibility
baseFeats.benefits: Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges.

baseFeats.name: Ultimate Polymath
baseFeats.benefits: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

baseFeats.name: Ultimate Skirmisher
baseFeats.benefits: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

baseFeats.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
baseFeats.benefits: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

baseFeats.name: Verdant Presence
baseFeats.benefits: The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you.

baseFeats.name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points.

baseFeats.name: Vivacious Afterimage
baseFeats.benefits: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.

baseFeats.name: Weapon Supremacy
baseFeats.benefits: Your skill with weapons lets you attack swiftly at all times.

baseFeats.name: Whirlwind Spell
baseFeats.benefits: You combine the might of a multitarget spell with a whirling flurry of attacks.

baseFeats.name: Whirlwind Toss
baseFeats.benefits: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.

baseFeats.name: Wish Alchemy
baseFeats.benefits: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

baseFeats.name: Witch's Hut
baseFeats.benefits: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.

baseFeats.name: Worldsphere Gravity
baseFeats.benefits: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.
